End

scn aaLambdaCommanderGhoulSCRIPT
int iDead float iTimer float iTimer2 short releaseghouls
begin GameMode
if getdead == 0
if iTimer2 > 1
RestoreActorValue Health 2 set iTimer2 to 0 else set iTimer2 to iTimer2 + GetSecondsPassed
endif
if iTimer > 3 set iTimer to 0 PlaceAtMe vGlowingOneRadiationAuraExplosion else set iTimer to iTimer + GetSecondsPassed endif endif
end
Begin OnDeath if releaseghouls == 0 aaReactorGhouls07ParentRef.disable aaReactorGhouls07ParentRef.markfordelete aaReactorGhouls09ParentRef.enable set releaseghouls to 1 endif End

scn aaInheritancePost06QuestScript
short GoldGrabbed short MessageSent short CourierStared short CapsGiven short CapsExtra short OrphanageFound short EvidenceFound short CutTaken short SlavesFreed short Chanted short SeverusGreeted ; 1= greet, 2 = nothing, 8 = Cottonwood, 10 = kill Vipers, 12 =
short ProfitAssessed short ProfitCount
Short StartDay Short Cleanup Short StartCleanupDay Short State
Short ProfitStartDay Short ProfitState
Short CapsStartDay Short CapsState
Begin Gamemode
If State == 0 && GoldGrabbed == 1 Set StartDay to GameDaysPassed Set State to 1 ElseIf State == 1 if GameDaysPassed - StartDay >= 3 aaCourier03Ref.enable set MessageSent to 1 aaCourier03Ref.evp Set State to 2 EndIf endif
If CapsState == 0 && CapsGiven == 1 Set CapsStartDay to GameDaysPassed Set CapsState to 1 ElseIf CapsState == 1 if GameDaysPassed - CapsStartDay >= 3 showmessage aaOrphanageOpenMessage setstage aaInheritancePost06 15 Set CapsState to 2 EndIf endif
If MessageSent == 2 If aaCourier03Ref.getdistance aaCourier01ReturnRef <= 1500 aaCourier03Ref.disable aaCourier03Ref.markfordelete set MessageSent to 3 endif endif
If ProfitState == 1 Set ProfitStartDay to GameDaysPassed Set ProfitState to 2 ElseIf ProfitState == 2 if GameDaysPassed - ProfitStartDay >= 7 Set ProfitState to 3 Set ProfitAssessed to 1 EndIf endif
If ProfitAssessed == 1 set ProfitCount to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 10/ 100 set ProfitAssessed to 2 endif
;If Cleanup == 0 && GetStage aaInheritancePost06 >= 180 ;Set StartCleanupDay to GameDaysPassed ;Set Cleanup to 1 ;Elseif Cleanup == 1 ;If GameDaysPassed - StartCleanupDay >= 3 ;aaRansomCleanupParentRef.disable set Cleanup to 2 ;stopquest aaInheritancePost06 ;endif ;endif
END

scn aaViperSlaveSpecialNPCScript
Short SpecialFreed Short disabled
Short Button Short DoOnce
Float Timer
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) && (DoOnce != 1) ;RemoveFromFaction WastelandFreedCaptiveFACTION ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load set DoOnce to 1 setRestrained 0 endif
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( GetIsSex Male == 1 ) ShowMessage aaViperSlaveCaptiveMALMessage elseif ( GetIsSex Female == 1 ) ShowMessage aaViperSlaveCaptiveFEMMessage endif else ShowMessage FFSupermutantCaptiveNoActivateMessage endif endif endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; restrain me once I'm in position if ( DoOnce == 1 ) if ( GetSitting == 3 ) set DoOnce to 2 setRestrained 1 endif endif
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed
if ( button == 1 ) SetRestrained 0 ; rewardkarma 25 RemoveFromFaction aaViperUniqueSlaveFaction removescriptpackage aaViperSpecialCaptivePackage addscriptpackage aaViperSpecialRunForItPackage evp set SpecialFreed to 1 ; stop ignoring crime ignoreCrime 0 endif endif
If SpecialFreed == 1 If GetDistance ArcadeHomeMarker <= 1000 set disabled to 1 disable markfordelete endif endif
END

If GetStage aaInheritance01 == 115 If Player.GetHasNote aaChaseSafeNote == 1 setstage aaInheritance01 120 endif endif
End

scn aaGrantNPCScript
short DoOnce ;Script blocker float Timer ;Timer used for animation control
BEGIN GameMode
;When set to 1, plays medical animations for eight seconds then restarts conversation with the player if ( GetAV Variable01 == 1 ) if ( DoOnce== 0 ) disablePlayerControls set Timer to 8 set DoOnce to 1 resetai endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 6 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) setstage VDoctors 10 enablePlayerControls SetAv Variable01 3 resetai Set DoOnce to 0 endif
endif
;When set to 1, plays medical animations for eight seconds then restarts conversation with the player if ( GetAV Variable01 == 2 ) if ( DoOnce== 0 ) disablePlayerControls set Timer to 10 set DoOnce to 1 resetai endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 6 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) setstage VDoctors 20 enablePlayerControls SetAv Variable01 3 resetai Set DoOnce to 0 endif
endif
END
Begin OnDeath
If aaInheritancePost07.GrantKilled == 0 set aaInheritancePost07.GrantKilled to 1 endif
if getstage aaInheritancePost07 <= 40 setstage aaInheritancePost07 200 endif
End

scn aaCharlieBattleQuestScript
short BattleStarted
short Wave02Sent short Wave03Sent short Wave04Sent short Wave05Sent short Wave06Sent short Wave07Sent short Wave08Sent short Wave09Sent short FinalSent
short LegionKilled
BEGIN Gamemode
If BattleStarted == 1 ;set up NPC's to ignore friendly hits, send in first wave aaRangerBeaumontRef.sifh 1 aaCharlieRanger01Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieRanger02Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieRanger03Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieRanger04Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieRanger05Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieTrooper01Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieTrooper02Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieTrooper03Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieTrooper04Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieTrooper05Ref.sifh 1 aaCharlieTrooper06Ref.sifh 1 aaLegionCharlieNorthWave01ParentRef.enable aaRangerBeaumontRef.sayto player aaInheritancePost09BARKFirstWave 0 1 set BattleStarted to 2 endif
If Wave02Sent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 6 ;enable second wave aaLegionCharlieEastWave01ParentRef.enable aaRangerBeaumontRef.sayto player aaInheritancePost09BARKSecondWave 0 1 set Wave02Sent to 1 endif endif
If Wave03Sent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 12; 14 ;enable third wave aaLegionCharlieNorthWave01ParentRef.disable aaLegionCharlieNorthWave01ParentRef.markfordelete aaLegionCharlieSouthWave01ParentRef.enable set Wave03Sent to 1 endif endif
If Wave04Sent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 19; 21 ;enable 4th wave aaLegionCharlieEastWave01ParentRef.disable aaLegionCharlieEastWave01ParentRef.markfordelete aaLegionCharlieEastWave02ParentRef.enable aaRangerBeaumontRef.sayto player aaInheritancePost09BARKFourthWave 0 1 set Wave04Sent to 1 endif endif
If Wave05Sent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 28 ;31 ;enable 5th wave aaLegionCharlieSouthWave01ParentRef.disable aaLegionCharlieSouthWave01ParentRef.markfordelete aaLegionCharlieNorthWave02ParentRef.enable set Wave05Sent to 1 endif endif
If Wave06Sent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 37 ;40 ;enable 6th wave aaLegionCharlieEastWave02ParentRef.disable aaLegionCharlieEastWave02ParentRef.markfordelete aaLegionCharlieSouthWave02ParentRef.enable set Wave06Sent to 1 endif endif
If Wave07Sent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 46 ;49 ;enable 7th wave aaLegionCharlieSouthWave01ParentRef.disable aaLegionCharlieSouthWave01ParentRef.markfordelete aaLegionCharlieSouthWave03ParentRef.enable aaRangerBeaumontRef.sayto player aaInheritancePost09BARKSeventhWave 0 1 set Wave07Sent to 1 endif endif
If Wave08Sent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 54 ;enable 8th wave aaLegionCharlieSouthWave02ParentRef.disable aaLegionCharlieSouthWave02ParentRef.markfordelete aaLegionCharlieEastWave03ParentRef.enable set Wave08Sent to 1 endif endif
If Wave09Sent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 58 ;58 ;enable 9th wave aaLegionCharlieSouthWave03ParentRef.disable aaLegionCharlieSouthWave03ParentRef.markfordelete aaLegionCharlieNorthWave03ParentRef.enable set Wave09Sent to 1 endif endif
If FinalSent == 0 If LegionKilled >= 64 ;showmessage GenericDebugMsg aaCharlieSouthBreachMarkerRef.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion aaCharlieSouthBreachMarkerRef.disable EnableNavMesh 0303bc95 setstage aaInheritancePost09 35 aaLegionCharlieEastWave03ParentRef.disable aaLegionCharlieEastWave03ParentRef.markfordelete aaLegionCharlieFINALParentRef.enable aaLegionCharlieFINAL02ParentRef.enable
if aaInheritancePost09.Reinforcements == 1 aaLegionCharlieFINAL03ParentRef.enable set aaInheritancePost09.Reinforcements to 2 endif
aaRangerBeaumontRef.sayto player aaInheritancePost09BARKFinalWave 0 1
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 34 endif
set FinalSent to 1 stopquest aaCharlieBattle endif endif
END

scn aaLegionSlaveNPCScript
Short SpecialFreed Short disabled
Short Button Short DoOnce
Float Timer
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) && (DoOnce != 1) ;RemoveFromFaction aaLegionSlaveFaction ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load set DoOnce to 1 setRestrained 0 endif
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( GetIsSex Male == 1 ) ShowMessage aaLegionSlaveCaptiveMALMessage elseif ( GetIsSex Female == 1 ) ShowMessage aaLegionSlaveCaptiveFEMMessage endif else ShowMessage FFSupermutantCaptiveNoActivateMessage endif endif endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; restrain me once I'm in position if ( DoOnce == 1 ) if ( GetSitting == 3 ) set DoOnce to 2 setRestrained 1 endif endif
if ( SpecialFreed == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed
if ( button == 1 ) SetRestrained 0 ; rewardkarma 25 RemoveFromFaction aaLegionSlaveFaction removescriptpackage DefaultTravelToLinkedPackage addscriptpackage aaViperSpecialRunForItPackage evp set SpecialFreed to 1 ; stop ignoring crime ignoreCrime 0 endif endif
If SpecialFreed == 1 If GetDistance ArcadeHomeMarker <= 1000 set disabled to 1 disable markfordelete endif endif
END

Short AmbushState Short StartDay
Begin OnTrigger Player
If AmbushState == 0 Set StartDay to GameDaysPassed aaJackalAmbushParentRef.enable Set AmbushState to 1 ElseIf AmbushState == 1 if GameDaysPassed - StartDay >= 2 aaJackalAmbushParentRef.disable aaJackalAmbushParentRef.markfordelete aaDragonAmbushParentRef.disable aaDragonAmbushParentRef.markfordelete Set AmbushState to 2 EndIf endif
END

scn aaBallarmsWWTriggerScript
SHORT doonce
begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if Player.HasPerk WildWasteland && doonce == 0 PlaySound UIWildWasteland showmessage WildWastelandMessage aaBallarmsWWParentRef.disable aaBallarmsWWParentRef.markfordelete aaBradleyBarkBallarmsTriggerRef.enable Set doonce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
End

scn aaKoestlerNPCScript
short deadstate short deadstartday
Begin OnDeath
If GetStage aaInheritancePost09 < 190 setstage aaInheritancePost09 200 endif
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
END
Begin Gamemode
ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END

scn aaHastingsNPCScript
Begin OnDeath
If GetStage aaInheritance01 < 100
If aaInheritance01.HastingsCrossed == 0 showmessage aaHastingsFailMessage setstage aaInheritance01 200 endif
If aaInheritance01.HastingsCrossed == 1 aaHastingsRef.additem aaHastingsFinger 1 endif
endif
End

ESP.ORIGINAL: Possible Contract
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能的合同

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;,
I understand you were one of the first individuals to discover the aftermath of the Legion's savage attack on Ranger Station Charlie. Some of my closest friends in the Rangers were killed or captured that day. I'm writing because the Rangers want to reckon with the Legion for this act, and I believe you are the person to see our operation through.
I also wrote you because of your past actions, as well as your reputation with the NCR here in the Mojave. Additionally, rumors of your stand against the Syndicate have only reinforced my inclination to employ you. If you elect to accept this contract, there is a signing bonus, as well as payment upon completion.
Undoubtedly, this will be a difficult, if not perilous contract. However, I hope you will at least discuss the details with me in person before making a decision. You can find me at Ranger Station Charlie.
Sincerely, Ranger Beaumont Commander, Ranger Station Charlie
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;,
我知道你第一个发现军团在游骑兵检查站的野蛮行径的人。我一些最亲密的朋友在那天的袭击中或被杀死或被捕获。我给你写信是因为，游骑兵这次想要找军团算账，而我相信你可以参与到我们的行动中来。
我给你写信还因为你过去的行为，你在NCR中的名声和你在莫哈维的响亮。此外，有传闻说你反抗了辛迪加，这使我更倾向雇佣你。如果你决定接受了这份合同，将会得到一份签约金，在结束后还会有一份报酬。
显然，这将会是场困难的战斗，这是个有风险的合同。不管怎样，我希望你在做决定之前，至少亲自来跟我讨论下细节。你可以再游骑兵驻地检查站找到我。
真诚地， 游骑兵博蒙特 游骑兵驻地检查站指挥官

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chester is the Man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 切斯特是混蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jake,
Chester is the motherfucking man!
How about this gear? We are tooled the fuck up now, man. Nobody will fucking look at us wrong. Westside bitches are running scared, and even the NCR won't cross us now!
I heard that Chester took the baddest militiaman hostage, then came face to face with the mailman, &PCName;, then talked that little bitch down, made that fucker piss right then and there. So much for the legendary Courier! We are fucking rolling now, motherfuckers!
Have you seen Chester? Motherfucker is jacked, got that hypertension breather, or whatever the fuck implant. I don't know what they put in him, but he is fucking beast now. Amazing what a few caps can get you.
Gonna hit the range later tonight. We got some fresh captives to blast. I can't stop laughing when they turn into the fucking goo piles. The kids are the best, screeching, their eyes staring at you while the rest of them melts into green mush. Fucking awesome!
- Chris
ESP.TRADUIT:
伙计，
切斯特是他妈的混蛋！
这是怎么一回事？ 我们现在他妈的一团糟了，伙计。没有人会在乎我们的出问题了。西区婊子们现在杀气腾腾的，甚至NCR要干掉我们了。
我听说切斯特将那邪恶的民办作为人质，然后希望跟邮差,&PCName;面对面谈。然后那个小婊子谈妥了，然后他们当场就屈从了。 那个邮差是多么的传奇啊！我们他妈的现在被卷进来了，操他妈的！
你看见切斯特了吗？按个混账现在很暴力，还有高血压等等，都怪那操蛋的植入体。我不知道他们给他装了什么，但是他现在他妈的就是个野兽。这种震惊不是瓶盖可以给与的。
今晚就要突围。我们在那些新俘虏身上安置了炸药。我一想到他们变成一片片的就忍不住的大笑。那些孩子表现的最好，他们尖叫，他们用眼睛盯着你，而其他人却吓破了胆。真他妈棒极了！
- 克里斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
05/22/2078
It happened again.
Yesterday, I threw my rank around, blustered about discipline, and tried to pretend it didn't happen, but it did.
The fact is, there may well not be an army up there, or an "Enclave". It's just me and Josh, trapped in this stupid fucking vault. It was probably bound to happen.
What bothers me is how much I liked it.
It sure as hell beats being alone.
ESP.TRADUIT:
05/22/2078
又这样了。.
昨天，我仍了我军衔，叫嚣着惩罚，试图假装什么事业没有，但是这真的发生了。
事实上，没有一个军队，或者一个“英克雷”。这里只有我和乔什，被困在这他妈愚蠢的避难所里。这是注定要发生的。
困扰我的是，我到底有多喜欢它。
.显然只有心脏还在孤独的跳动。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
05/22/2079
We celebrated our anniversary. I read my old UCMJ report aloud, we both laughed.
Baseball, reading, and then wine. That's as good as it gets down here in the arsenal.
Josh has kept up with his writing, trying to put some kind of novel together. Sometimes it irritates me because he's so caught up in it, taking time away from me, but it makes him happy.
Happiness - not something you would expect down in this place, after the world committed suicide. It's weird, but we've got it. There are the fights, but it's hard to stay angry, especially when raised voices get the Protectrons worked up.
Food stores and medicine are solid, systems are all green. 2079 has been a good year, all things considered.
ESP.TRADUIT:
05/22/2079
我们庆祝了我们的周年纪念日。大声的朗诵了我以前的那份UCMJ报告，我们都笑了。
我们打棒球，阅读，然后喝酒。我们在军械库尽情享受。
乔什还在继续他的写作，想要写出一些新奇的小说。这有时会刺激到我，因为他太专注于此了，没有时间跟我在一切，但是这能让他快乐。
幸福 - 在世界自取灭亡之后，不是你可以奢望的东西。这简直不可思议，但是我们办到了。我们有争斗，但是很难生气，特别是当声音提高到让机器人有反应的时候。
食物储备和药品是可靠的，系统一切正常。总体来看，2079年是一个愉快的一年。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chubbs' Menu
ESP.TRADUIT: 恰普斯的菜谱

ESP.ORIGINAL:
CHUBBS' DINER
This week's special: Dog steak, baked potatoes, banana yucca shake, and slice of apple pie, 15 caps
Soda - 2 caps
Beer - 5 caps
Dog steak - 10 caps
Pre-war food - 10 caps
Iguana on a stick - 10 caps
Brahmin steak - 20 caps
Geck steak - 20 caps
Everything else priced on availability.
Prices are not subject to negotiation. Complain and I will throw your ass out.
WE DO NOT HAVE ALBERT BREACH MUFFINS! So don't ask.
ESP.TRADUIT:
恰普斯的餐厅
这周的特色菜： 狗肉排，烤土豆，香蕉奶昔，还有苹果派切片，共15 瓶盖
汽水 - 2 瓶盖
啤酒 - 5 瓶盖
狗肉排 - 10 瓶盖
战前食物 - 10 瓶盖
蜥蜴肉串 - 10 瓶盖
Brahmin steak - 20 caps
Geck steak - 20 caps
Everything else priced on availability.
Prices are not subject to negotiation. Complain and I will throw your ass out.
WE DO NOT HAVE ALBERT BREACH MUFFINS! So don't ask.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
05/22/2089
Ten years.
Still no noise from above, but everything is running down here.
Josh keep tinkering with the endless novel, and I keep playing baseball. At least I've gotten him to play chess, though he insists on winning every game. It's hardly sporting, but these are things you do for love.
We would both give our eyeteeth for some fresh literature. We've read Heart of Darkness, Hamlet, and every damned book in here over and over, till we can recite entire chapters from memory. Of course, Josh refuses to let me read a single sentence of his novel.
I know it must sound cliched, but I do miss the sunlight. I think about what it would be like to walk out of here with Josh, taking a stroll back in time. The irony is that we couldn't have made it together in the old world.
Josh has been complaining about headaches for a few days. I don't know what the problem is, since I burned through the cigarettes eight years ago. Maybe we should rotate the mattress.
ESP.TRADUIT:
05/22/2089 十年了。.
上面还是没有动静，但是这里还是一切照常运作。
乔什依然胡乱的拼凑那烂尾的小说，而我还是在玩棒球。至少我让他开始下棋了，尽管他坚持每次都要赢。这是个艰难的娱乐，但是这些事情都是为了爱。
我们一起为新鲜的文学作品斗嘴。我们读完了黑暗之心，哈姆雷特，并一遍又一遍的读在这里的该死的全部书籍，甚至我们能根据记忆背诵整个章节。当然，乔什拒绝让我读一次他的小说。
我知道那听起来是陈词滥调，但是我还是想念阳光。我想象我和乔什会怎样离开这里，跟他散着步。值得讽刺的是，我们在旧世界不可能在一起。
乔什已经抱怨头疼好几天了。我不知道出了什么问题，直到我时隔八年再次点燃香烟。也许我们该换个位置了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My Reminders
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的备忘录

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To do: - Buy more cleaning supplies - Buy antiobiotics for Brahmin - Hire a guard - Sign a trade agreement with Westside
Also, speak with NCR about Ronnie, see if they have any background information. He keeps bitching about wages, blowing up when I tell him to get on task. I wonder if he's ever had an honest job in his life. I appreciate what &PCName; did for us, but Ronnie just rubs me the wrong way sometimes. I saw him looking at Jane the other day, and it made my blood boil. He might just have to go after all.
ESP.TRADUIT:
要做这些： - 买更多的清洁用品 - 为双头牛买抗生素 - 雇佣一个护卫 - 跟西区签署贸易协定
另外，跟NCR谈谈罗尼的事情，看看他们有什么背景。当我给他分配工作的时候，他总是抱怨，大发脾气。我想知道他以前是不是干正事的。我感激&PCName;为我们做的一切，但是罗尼有时跟我不对头。不久之前，我发现罗尼在看简，这让我火冒三丈。他也许是该滚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got it coming
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快死了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I got it coming. Gutshot, just waiting to pass out from the blood loss.
Ronnie told us it would be a holdup, then we'd split. All the workers got behind him, since Jim was cutting wages and upping the hours. We figured we'd get our fair due since we'd been breaking our backs for that asshole.
Ronnie lied to us all. If I had known what he was, I might have put him down myself, but we were committed, caught up in the moment. There was no turning back once he shot those customers. The Andersons were witnesses. I guess we didn't have a choice.
Ronnie had a look in his eyes when we took them upstairs, like he was getting a birthday present or something. We were scared shitless, and he was acting like it was a fucking party.
What a coward I've been. I ran from my girl, all my responsibilities, thought I'd strike it rich here. Got caught up with that sick fuck, just nodded my head and did what he said. "Break Jim's kneecaps," he said. I took to the boss with that slugger, no questions asked. He begged for his wife and children, even after the bones started breaking. He never tried to save himself.
We held him down, made him watch as Ronnie did the girls. We figured he was so busted from the bat that he'd stay down. I didn't notice till he pressed that Dillinger against my stomach, then I heard the pop. Ronnie finished him with the shovel, and just laughed at me when I started screaming.
They took turns with the females, then slit their throats. They left me here, all of them too scared to second-guess Ronnie. They said they were taking the little one east, gonna sell him to the Vipers. I guess Robert got away after they wounded him outside. I didn't see it go down.
It's strange, the blood loss. I feel light, empty. Fading. I got it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我快死了。我中弹了，仅仅在等待失血过多晕过去。
罗尼告诉我这是抢劫，然后我们决裂了。所有的工人都支持他，因为吉姆削减工资还增加劳动时间。在罗尼突然背叛之前，我都以为我们会受到公平的对待。
罗尼骗了我们所有人。如果我知道他是什么样的人，我就会拒绝他。但是我们同意了，在那一刻被他迷惑住了，一旦他向顾客射击，那么一切就没有退路了。安德森家族为证，我觉得我们没有选择了。
当我们带他们去楼上的时候，罗尼的眼神很不安分，就像他获得了生日礼物之类的东西那样。我们非常的害怕，而他却像是开展一场该死的派对那样。
我真是个懦夫。 我逃离了我的女儿，我所有的责任，以为我会在这里发财。我被那该死的杂种迷惑住了，只是对他的说话不断的点头。“打断吉姆的膝盖”，他说。我走向老板然后重击了他，没有问任何问题。他为他的老婆和孩子求情，甚至在膝盖碎了之后也是。他没有为自己求饶。
我们控制住了他，让他看看罗尼怎样对待那些女人。我们认为他遭受这样的对待崩溃了，所以他只是蹲着。我没有注意到罗尼的逼近直到他朝我的肚子来上一拳，然后我听见了枪声。罗尼用铁铲干掉了他，而当我开始尖叫的时候他只是朝我大笑。
他们轮奸了那些女人，然后割掉了她们的喉咙。他们把我留在这里，他们太害怕受到罗尼的责问。他们在谈论要将最小的孩子带到东边，然后卖给毒蛇帮。在他们从外面挂着上回来后，我猜罗伯特已经逃走了。我不知道接下来的事情了。
真奇怪，鲜血一直在流。我感觉好轻，好空虚。越来越虚弱了。我快死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
11/15/2089
The headaches have gotten worse. I've been managing the maintenance for a week, all while taking care of him. The only thing that helps the pain is morphine, and I'm worried about getting him hooked. We've only got so much of it to go around.
I think there's an old auto-doc somewhere in storage. I'm going to dig it out, see if I can rig it up to give him an examination.
It's just a headache. It will pass.
ESP.TRADUIT:
11/15/2089
头痛更严重了。我一边继续做维修工作，一边照顾他。唯一缓解痛苦的东西只有吗啡，但是我担心他上瘾。我们只能这样了。
我认为在仓库的某处有一个老旧的自动医生。我会去把它挖出来，看看我是否能操纵机器对他进行一次检查。
这只是个头痛。这会过去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry for Your Loss
ESP.TRADUIT: 为你的损失默哀

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Dixon,
One of my lieutenants informed me that you were seeking information on the untimely death of your teenage son. With your permission, I allowed one of our physicians to perform a private autopsy.
The results are disturbing, though they confirm your suspicions. Your son did not succumb to an overdose, but was deliberately poisoned in what I suspect is a systematic campaign by the NCR to kill hapless addicts and the homeless.
Compelled to act, I ordered a thorough investigation of the rehab clinic near Westside. It seems that &PCName; is responsible for this merciless scheme. Unfortunately, the NCR doesn't have the inclination or power to prosecute &PCName;. Until someone takes action, I'm afraid more people will suffer.
I hope these facts put your mind at ease. To lose a child, barely fifteen years old - I cannot imagine. You are in my prayers.
Sincerely, K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
迪克森先生，
我的助手告诉我，你要寻找的儿子已经英年早逝。我让我的一个医生进行了私人的尸体解剖。
结果令人很不安，尽管他们认为你会怀疑。你的儿子不是死于服药过量，而是死于一场来自NCR的有预谋的投毒事件，他们的目的是杀死倒霉的毒瘾者和无家可归的人。
必须要采取行动，我已经下令对康复诊所进行一次彻底的检查。看起来&PCName;要对这个残忍的计划负责。不幸的是，NCR没有权利向&PCName;起诉。除非有人采取行动，否则将有更多的人受害。
我希望这些事实能让你感到舒服一点。失去一个不到15岁的孩子 - 我简直无法想象。我为你祈祷。
真诚地， K.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
11/15/2089
It's Christmas Eve, and Josh is dying.
I've been by him for a week now.
Autodoc detected an inoperable brain tumor. Malignant. I'm rationing the morphine so he doesn't hurt. He's not even himself anymore, just delirious.
I thought we'd get old together, that there would be more time.
It wasn't enough to end the world, was it, God? Fuck you and all your infinite wisdom.
I keep saying, "I love you" but I can't tell if he can understand me. Christ, just let it end.
ESP.TRADUIT:
11/15/2089
现在是圣诞节前夕，而乔什躺下了。
我照顾他已经一周了。
自动医生检查到一个不能做手术的脑肿瘤。该死的。我给了他吗啡，所以他感觉不到痛苦。他现在生活不能自理了，神志不清了。
我以为我们会一起到老，会有很长一段的时间。
这个世界还没完，不是吗，上帝？操你还有你那无穷的智慧。
我只能说，“我爱你”，但是我不知道他是否能听到我。 基督啊，让一切都结束吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry for Your Loss
ESP.TRADUIT: 为你的损失默哀

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Harris,
Please accept my sincerest condolences for the loss of your wife. By all accounts she was a beautiful, charming woman.
One of my lieutenants informed me that you were seeking information behind the attempted rehabilitation of the Fiend population around New Vegas. After what those animals did to your spouse, I understand your acute interest in determining who loosed them upon Westside.
While conducted by the Followers, this naive crusade has been spearheaded by &PCName;, who was all too willing to put the innocent citizens of Westside at risk by releasing tame Fiends into a civilized setting. I fear your wife will be the first of many to fall prey to these creatures, who are nothing more than ticking bombs, set to turn rabid at a moment's notice. They cannot be trusted or saved, only killed.
I hope you can find some peace with this information, Mr. Harris.
Sincerely, K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
哈里斯先生，
请接受我们为你死去的妻子的哀悼。据说她是一个美丽而又迷人的女人。
我的助手告诉我，你在寻找企图恢复新维加斯附近的恶魔帮人数的幕后黑手。在这些畜生对你的夫人做了这些事情之后，我能理解你迫切的想知道谁在西区逍遥法外。
而指挥那些追随者的，带领他们的正是&PCName;，就是他让无辜的西区市民冒着被恶魔帮侵入文明世界的危险。我知道你的夫人成为了这些畜生的第一批牺牲品，这些畜生不过是一些定时炸弹，他们一旦触发就是最猛烈的袭击。他们不可靠，也不可能被拯救，他们只能被杀死。
我希望你知道这些信息之后能获得一丝平静，哈里斯先生。
真诚地， K.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will find them
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会找到他们

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Today I buried my father, mother, and sister. Tomorrow I will search for my brother, who is now a slave.
After that, I will find the man responsible and make him taste God's judgment. It will be slow. It will be painful. Above all, it will be righteous.
I used to believe that men could be saved, but I have learned the truth: there is no place for mercy or restraint here. I will make my own way and deliver justice by my own hand, guided by God.
In time, they will fear me, and when my knife is at their throat, they'll beg for mercy.
And I'll say no.
It begins with Ronnie. It will end with &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
今天我埋了父亲，母亲，还有妹妹。明天我会去找我的弟弟，现在他是一个奴隶了。.
在那之后，我会找到那个该为此负责的男人，然后让他尝尝上帝的审判。这将是漫长的。这将是痛苦的。不过，这是正义的。
我曾经相信一个人能够被拯救，但是我知道了一个事实：这里没有仁慈和约束的能够存活的地方。我会使用自己的方式并用自己的双手实现正义，在上帝的指导下。
随着时间的推移，他们会害怕我，并且当我的刀子架到他们脖子上的时候，他们就会求饶。
而我会拒绝。
从罗尼开始。到&PCName;结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
01/02/2090
I found the last pack of cigarettes, hidden in this old desk. I think Josh was trying to hide them from me, back when he was policing my health.
He passed last night, just before the morphine was going to run out. I guess that was God's token gesture.
I'm going to make a gesture of my own, right after this smoke. The ten millimeter should do the trick.
I'm putting the bots on high alert, in case any of those fucks come in here. This place should have been buried back in '77, and I should have been buried with it.
Sgt. Henry Budd United States Army
ESP.TRADUIT:
01/02/2090
我找到了最后一盒香烟，它藏在这个旧办公桌里。我认为是乔什试图将他们藏起来的，当时他是为了我健康着想。
在吗啡耗尽之前，他昨晚去世了。我猜这是上帝的决定。
在这根烟抽完之后，我要做一个自己的决定。一个10毫米口径的子弹应该能实现这个决定。
我把机器人设置为高境界范围，以防有任何混蛋进来。这个该死的地方应该在77年就被埋葬，而我应该跟它一起被埋葬。
亨利.巴德中士 美国陆军

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ronald
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗纳德

ESP.ORIGINAL:
They say there's a boy named Ronald. He escaped his mean master, and is still running today. I hope I can escape like him, get away from this place.
I don't know if we'll ever leave. The lady brings us rat meat and water every day, but we're stuck in this basement. Timmy has a cough. Lady doesn't seem to care about us.
I just wish we had stayed in California. It was nice. I remember the sun and the trees. Now it's just dark and smelly. I wish my parents had stayed alive.
Maybe one day I'll get out of here like Ronald. Maybe one day I'll meet him.
ESP.TRADUIT:
他们说有个叫做罗纳德的男孩。他逃离了他所谓的主人，而且现在还在逃。我希望我可以像他那样逃走，离开这个地方。
我不知道我们究竟能否逃走。那个女人每天带来老鼠肉和水，而我们被陷在这个地下室了。蒂米有点咳嗽，但是那个女人一点也不关心我们。
我只是希望我们呆在加州。那很美妙。我记得那太阳，还有那些树木。现在这里只有黑暗和臭味。我希望我的父母还活着。
也许有一天我能像罗纳德那样离开这里。也许有一天我能碰见他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Urgent
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧急

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;,
A situation has developed in Westside that requires your assistance. I'll share the details when you arrive. Someone's life is at stake, so please hurry.
- Brad Heinz
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;,
一个西区的开放地需要你的帮助，当你到达时我将告诉你细节。某个人的生命处于危险之中。所以请赶快来。
- 布拉德·海因茨

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cannot get out
ESP.TRADUIT: 出不去了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We have barred the passage. The door is sealed.
A few families are left, holding out here. The ammunition will run out soon. More keep coming from below.
They told us it was safe, nothing to worry about.
We cannot get out.
I can hear them. The scratching, the screams.
They are coming.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们已经封住了通道。门被封闭了。
一些家庭被遗弃，坚守在这里。 军火不久将会耗尽。下方来了更多
他们告诉我们这很安全，不用担心任何事。
我们不能出去。
我能听见他们了。刺耳的刮擦声，和尖叫。
他们来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ransom
ESP.TRADUIT: 赎金

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We have the kid. Tell that rich courier that we want 50,000 caps, or the boy dies. Deliver the money to the abandoned house just west of town. Tell the Courier to come alone.
If the Courier shows up without the money, we kill the kid.
If you involve the NCR, we kill the kid.
If you try to strongarm us in any way, we kill the kid.
Bring us the caps, and the kid will live. Stall or string us along and we'll carve him up.
- Chester
ESP.TRADUIT:
孩子在我们手上。告诉那个富有的邮差，我们要50,000瓶盖，否则孩子就得死。将钱带到那个镇子西边的废弃的房子里。告诉邮差一个人过来。
如果邮差没有带钱来，我们会杀死那孩子。
如果你让NCR卷进来，我们会杀死那孩子。
如果你对我采取任何暴力手段，我们会杀死那孩子。
给我们瓶盖，孩子就能活。拖延时间或者欺骗我们的话，孩子就会被我们撕票。
- 切斯特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Payday, bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 发财日，我操！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Saul,
Fucking outfit put out a fat bounty on &PCName;! 10,000 caps! Fuck, we could buy our way into the strip, get enough jet for a year, or anything we want.
This &PCName; is some kind of killer, so we need to round everyone up. We'll keep lookouts and jump this fucker near the strip.
10,000 caps! We're gonna be fucking rich!
-Dex
ESP.TRADUIT:
索尔，
狗日的机构用一大笔钱悬赏&PCName;！10,000瓶盖！我操，这可以让我们在罪恶城大花特花一年，或者买下我们想要的任何东西。
那个&PCName; 是个杀手，所以我们要召集所有人。我们可以再者蹲点，然后将那个蠢蛋转移到罪恶城附近。
10,000瓶盖！ 我们他妈的就要发财啦！
-迪克斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
When the nuke hit the surface nearby, I thought we had bought it. The cave-ins only got a few of us, but the reactor... something happened to it. The engineers didn't say anything, they just sealed off the entire level to non-essentials. I knew it was all wrong.
All this time, I thought it would be something outside, breaking in, overwhelming us.
I never imagined it would come from within. There are too many now. Elphinstone said it would be safe, that the meltdown was under control.
I don't want to die like the others. I told Sally and Jeff to go to bed and ignore the screams downstairs. I promised them it would be over soon.
I'm holding her now, looking into those baby blues. I don't know why I'm writing this. After the last ten minutes, I've got it coming. I can hear them scratching the door. The screams never stop.
This is it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
当核弹击中了地表的时候，我以为我们玩了。虽然我们只有少数地方塌方了，但是反应堆...出了点故障。工程师什么都没说，他们只是封住了整个楼层。我知道这是错误的。
一直以来，我以为外面会发生什么，会闯进来，然后淹没我们。
我从未想过会是内部出问题。就在此时此刻。埃尔芬斯通说灾难处于控制之下，我们很安全。
我不想像其他人那样死去。我让莎莉和杰夫去睡觉，不要管楼下的尖叫。我向他们承诺事情很快就会结束。
我现在抱着她，深深凝望着她蓝色的眼睛。我不知道我为什么写下这些。十分钟后，我知道一切将会结束。我能听到他们在门外的尖叫。尖叫从未停止。
就这样了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Philanthropic Venture
ESP.TRADUIT: 一份慈善投资

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;,
I recently heard the story of how you came to possess a large quantity of gold. I am certain that you are continuously harangued by scores of suppliants, sycophants, and other parasites seeking to feed off your hard-earned wealth. However, I hope you will first consider my forthcoming request before lumping me in with such miscreants.
Having lived in the Mojave for decades, I have long been witness to the suffering endured by its most vulnerable denizens: orphans.
I would like to meet with you briefly to discuss my dream - the construction of a full-fledged orphanage to assist the disadvantaged and abandoned children of the Mojave. With your help, I believe an orphanage could shield these poor souls from the dangers of drugs, gangs, and predatory adults seeking to enslave or otherwise abuse them.
You can find me at Novac, where I've been working as a trader for some time. I hope you find it within your heart to meet with me.
Sincerely, Esther Hall
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;，
我最近听说你获得了一大笔黄金的传闻。我确信有很多说客，马屁精，和其他各种寄生虫想要分享你的宝贵的财富。不管怎样，我希望你在考虑其它恶棍之前，先考虑下我接下来的请求。
在莫哈维居住的这段时间里，我见到了挣扎在生存线上最脆弱的居民：孤儿。
我想跟你见一见，简略的谈论下我的梦想 - 为那些在莫哈维上的弱势群体和孤儿建造一个孤儿院。有了你的帮助，我相信孤儿院将会保护那些处于毒品，帮派，被贪婪的成年人奴役或其他虐待的威胁之中的孤儿们。
你可以在诺瓦克找到我，我在那里曾做过一段时间的贸易商人。我希望你带着自己的善心来找我。
真诚地， 以斯贴.霍尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Muscle

Tony,
I'm sending more muscle your way this week. The front outside North Vegas is working out nicely. I figured we'd keep the name, since "St. Peter's" is too good to pass up. Besides, I don't like offending higher powers.
If Courier Six shows up, be tactful and bide your time. We can take care of the Courier when we've got a better foothold in town. Right now the priority is selling protection to Westside, which is a hot commodity since we've got the Fiends stirred up.
Keep working the Omertas. It's just a matter of time before we absorb them. Our employer is expecting results after recent setbacks in the Mojave. No excuses.
- Zimmer
ESP.TRADUIT:
托尼，
我这个星期向你发送了更多的商品。你在北维加斯以外的工作干的很不错。我们继续使用那个名字，因为“圣彼得”太棒了。此外，我不会再提供更多的人手了。
如果信使六号出现了，要机灵点然后等待时机。在我们更好的在城镇立足之后再来处理邮差。现在的首要任务是向西区贩卖止痛剂，这东西因为恶魔帮的存在，变成了畅销货。
继续跟黑手党合作。吸收他们只是个时间问题。我们的老板期待莫哈维受挫之后的结果。不要找借口。
- 吉玛

ESP.ORIGINAL: Private Bounty
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人悬赏

ESP.ORIGINAL: More Drugs
ESP.TRADUIT: 更多的毒品

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Billy,
Somebody offed Shulgin, so most of the group are drifting back to the ruins around Vault 3. Lucky for us, the outfit keeps supplying a lot of Jet for odd jobs.
They mainly want us to keep pressure on Westside, though he said not to get carried away. Just holdups, kidnappings, and the occasional murder. He also said to let the militia use the worst junkies for target practice.
As long as the dope is flowing, I'm down for anything. I'm going to push off tonight, you're welcome to join in. Ever get high and watch Eileen work a prisoner? Crazy shit, man.
- Jack
P.S. If you need extra work, just talk to Hastings over in the Thorn. Big bastard has some juicy contacts with the outfit, can hook you up. See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT:
比利，
有人干掉了舒尔金，所以大多数小团队都回到了3号避难所。我们很幸运，只有打点零活就能得到组织持续提供的杰特。只是抢劫，绑架，和偶尔的谋杀。
他们主要希望我们保持西区的压力，尽管他让我们别太得意忘形。他还说让民兵利用最糟糕的毒瘾患者作为打靶训练。
只要那些毒品源源不断。我愿意做任何事情。我今晚要嗨一下，欢迎你加入进来。究竟是要嗨一下还是像一个犯人一样看着艾琳？真他妈的疯狂，伙计。
- 杰克
P.S. 如果你需要额外的工作，跟荆棘城的海斯廷斯说下就可以了。大混蛋有一些触油水多工作，不过需要接触组织，应该能使你满意。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't Fuck Up
ESP.TRADUIT: 别搞砸了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Shulgin,
If you give me one more excuse about the drop-off in attacks, you can forget about the drugs and weapons. We dug you out of the gutter and put you in power - we can find a replacement just as easily.
Lay off the Jet and stop believing your own bullshit sermons. You can't hide in that mine forever, having an endless orgy. If you stall or try to run, we'll find you and cut your fucking balls off, understand?
Get those junkies off their asses and keep the pressure on Westside. I don't give a fuck about mercenaries or bounty hunters. Hastings let me know about them, and I don't give a shit. Make it happen, or you'll be singing castrato, bitch.
- Chase
ESP.TRADUIT:
尼美舒利，
如果你要为逐渐减少的袭击找更多借口的话，你就别想那些毒品和武器了。我们让你摆脱了贫困，还你让你获得了力量 - 我们很容易找到一个替代者。
停止吸杰特，停止对你自己的自以为是吧。你不可能永远躲在矿洞里，日夜狂欢。如果你试图拖延或者逃跑，我们会找到你然后砍掉你那该死的卵蛋，你明白吗？
让那些吸毒的蠢货动起来，继续袭击西区。我他妈的不关心雇佣兵或者赏金猎人之类的。海斯廷斯向我说明了他们的存在，但是我还是不会在乎的。赶快行动，否则你会变成一个没有蛋的歌手，婊子。
- 切斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Live it up
ESP.TRADUIT: 狂欢一场

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;,
I hope you're having a great time in the Mojave. Gambling, drinking, sex - everything we live for. Enjoy it, because soon you're going to be a corpse.
I know what happened to Zimmer. He was the closest thing to a son I've ever had, and you cut him down, just as he was getting on his feet. You could have walked away and left us to our business. Perhaps in time we could even have been allies.
You can forget about that now - mercy, forgiveness, reconciliation. You are now marked by our organization. I want you to know this: men are coming to kill you. You won't know the time or the method, but they're coming, sure as God's vengeance. I want you to taste the fear and the anxiety of knowing - but not really knowing.
So have a shot of expensive Scotch, eat a good meal, and sleep in a comfortable bed with your favorite whore. But know that we're coming, and you'll soon answer for everything you've done.
- K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;，
我希望你在莫哈维玩的愉快。赌博，喝酒，性 - 所有我们盼望的事。享受它吧，因为很快你会变成一具尸体。
我知道吉玛发生了什么事。他就像我的儿子那样，而你杀了他。你可以一走了之，而我们还有事业。也许某些时候我们还会成为盟友。
你可能忘记了这些 - 仁慈，宽恕，和解。你已经上了我们的组织的名单。我想让你明白：有人会去杀了你。你不知道何时和何种方式，但是他们来了，显然是上帝的复仇。我想让你尝尝“了解”的恐惧和焦虑 - 但不是真正的了解。
所以尝尝昂贵的苏格兰酒吧，吃美食吧，在舒适的床上跟你最喜爱的妓女睡觉吧。但是要知道我们来了，而你将很快就对你所做的事情负责了。
- K.

ESP.ORIGINAL: PRAISE HIM!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赞美他！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
PRAISE HIM!
PRAISE HIM!
PRAISE HIM!
The great hunter walked with us. Killed many Brahmin. We honor him.
Bitch Tabitha rejects us, rejects the great Brahmin Hunter.
Take him to big square, offer hot meat. He will rise again!
PRAISE HIM!
PRAISE HIM!
PRAISE HIM!
ESP.TRADUIT:
赞美他！
赞美他！
赞美他！
最伟大的猎人与我们同在。他杀了很多毒品贩子。我们敬重他。
狗日的塔贝萨抛弃了我们，抛弃了伟大的双头牛猎人。
带他去大广场，提供热食物。他会再次苏醒的！
赞美他！
赞美他！
赞美他！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last words of the Brahmin Hunter
ESP.TRADUIT: 双头牛猎人的遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Legs are crushed, think I'm bleeding inside. Won't last much longer.
It's this city - so dark. It was one of the dark figures. Goodman, I know it was him. Told the mutants I was coming, got me ambushed. They bashed my ribcage in like a bag of fucking carrots, and now they think I'm some kind of God.
Strange... I'd give anything for a muffin right now.
ESP.TRADUIT:
腿断了，我觉得我内出血了。活不了多久了。
这个社会 - 很黑暗。一定是个阴险的家伙弄的。古德曼，我知道就是他。就是他告诉那些变种人我来了，让我中了埋伏。他们像捣碎一袋胡萝卜那样重击了我的胸腔，而现在他们认为我是某种神。
真奇怪... 我现在愿意用任何东西来换一个小松饼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Final Log
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的日志

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Something happened down there, the engineers can't explain it. The AI just "switched", and went crazy, started killing everyone. I knew something was wrong with it, something different. The scientists said Vulcan 4 would change everything, ensure our victory when we emerged. It could destroy us all.
Most of the garrison is gone. I've ordered the men to use our remaining explosives to seal off the lower levels and contain this thing.
May God have mercy on our souls.
Col. Dick Phillips Commanding Officer, Outpost Linus
ESP.TRADUIT:
这里出现了一些状况，工程师们无法解释这种现象。AI只是“切换了”，而且暴乱了，他们开始杀人。我知道这里面肯定出错了，有些东西被改变了。科学家们说火神4号回改变所有的事情，当我们出现时会确保我们的胜利。现在它会毁了我们。
驻军都出去了。我已经下令让留下的人用炸药封锁下层节制这种状况。
愿上帝保佑我们这些可怜人。
科尔.迪克 菲利普斯 莱纳斯前哨站指挥官

ESP.ORIGINAL: On Our Feet
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在我们脚下

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Garth,
Fuck Motor-Runner, Shulgin, and the rest of them. We're going to carve out our own piece of the Wasteland, right here. Fucking outfit was playing us like puppets all long. Now we've got their little hideaway, right by Freeside and the highway. Lot of good stuff falling our lap right now, so swing by if you want to trade.
Oh, if you see Maestro, hit him up for that recipe. We've got a nice supply of meat right now.
Fucking noise upstairs! Assholes can't stay quiet for a second!
ESP.TRADUIT:
加思，
操他妈的摩托手尼美舒利，和他的人。我们要在莫哈维开拓出自己的一片天地，就在这里。他妈的一直把我们当做人偶一样玩弄。现在我们离开了他们的小巢穴，离开自由城和高速公路。好东西现在都是我们的了，只要你愿意，你就能很轻松的买到东西。
哦，如果你看到了曼斯特，就跟他要配方。我们现在有很好的食物供应了。
他妈的楼下真吵！那帮混蛋就不能静一下吗！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adipem Pictura
ESP.TRADUIT: 宏伟的前景

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Pollux S.P.D. Castori.
Frater, we were doubtless blessed by Caesar when he gifted us this grand painting, but the bulbous, flayling figures seem overwhelmingly grotesque at times. Caesar said it was a depiction of our namesakes in action, ravaging some corpulent tribals in a distant land. He said it was made by a man named "Rubens" who apparently enjoyed depicting these monstrous cows and then calling it art.
Interestingly, I have noticed that great Caesar favors slave girls with girth and fleshy backsides. Small wonder he gravitated towards the work of this pre-war profligate.
Regardless, I recommend we display it with pride, should he or the Legate make a chance inspection of the cave. Worse yet, those damned speculatores always seem to be afoot, watching our every move.
A raiding party reported that the NCR has re-occupied Ranger Station Charlie. This could be a stubborn ploy to save face, or some species of shallow strategem. We will watch them closely. Fortunately, our patrols are garnering a bevy of captured and killed profligates, along with a constant flow of siezed supplies and armament. In time, we will win. Fortune smiles on us, brother.
S.V.B.E.E.V.!
ESP.TRADUIT:
波利克斯S.P.D. 卡斯托利。
兄弟，当凯撒给予我们这宏伟的蓝图的时候，我们无疑会受到他的祝福，但有时形式不可抵挡。凯撒说，这是对我们的行动的一个叙述，在遥远的土地上袭击一些富裕的部落。他说是一个叫做“鲁滨逊”人画的，这个喜欢描绘巨大的奶牛，然后称之为艺术。
有趣的是，我注意到伟大的凯撒喜好细腰还有丰满屁股的女人。难怪他被战前的那些淫秽的书籍所吸引。
无论如何，我建议我们应该展示我们的骄傲，应该让他或者他的特使来视察洞穴。然后很糟糕，那些混球们似乎在准备一场战争，他们在侦查我们每一次的行动。
一个突击小队回报，NCR重新占领了游骑兵驻地检查站。这可能是为了挽回面子的顽固策略，或者是一些肤浅的计谋。我们会密切关注他们。幸运的是，我们的巡逻队杀死一些养尊处优的家伙，并那里获得了源源不断的武器和物资。随着时间的推移，我们会获得胜利的。命运在向我们微笑，我的兄弟。
S.V.B.E.E.V.!

ESP.ORIGINAL: End It
ESP.TRADUIT: 自杀

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Militia told us it was safe, that somebody had cleared out the bad guys around here. We thought the north road would be a sure thing.
They hit us at night, came out of nowhere. Grabbed us up like Brahmin calves and dragged us into this hole. I think they just moved in here.
I don't know how long it's been.
They cooked Jill, then ate her in front of us. They fed Danny to the dogs while he was still breathing.
God, help me end this. The bars are hard enough... if I hit it just right I can break my skull, or snap my neck. That would be quick enough. Anything is better than what they did to the others.
Most of these animals can't even read. They've been burning the old books or using them as shitpaper. Fucking barbarians.
If you find this note, my name is Jim Murphy. Tell my son, Adam, I love him. Tell him I died quickly. I'm ending it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
民兵告诉我们这里安全了，有人清理了那些游荡在附近的坏家伙。于是我们决定去北边的公路
他们在晚上袭击了我们，突然出现。像对待双头牛小崽子那样洗劫了我们，然后将我们带到了这个洞穴。我认为他们只是在这里暂住。
我不知道过去了多长时间。
他们煮了吉尔，然后在我们面前吃了她。他们把丹尼喂了够，而当时他还有呼吸。
上帝啊，帮助我们结束这一切吧。那些柱子足够硬...如果我能正确撞击的话，我能撞碎我的头盖骨，或者折断我的脖子。这必须足够快。不管做什么事都好过他们对其他人做的那些事。
这些畜生大部分都不识字。他们焚烧那些旧书或者用他们当做卫生纸。该死的野蛮人。
如果你找到了这份笔记，我叫做吉姆.墨菲。告诉我的儿子亚当，我爱他。告诉他我死去的过程很快。我要结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Update
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务更新

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Zimmer,
I understand you've made considerable progress in your short time in the Mojave. I knew I could count on you.
However, I recieved word that you allowed &PCName; to escape certain death. You should never hesitate to finish an opponent, particularly one like &PCName;. I trust in your ability, but do not make the same mistake twice. I put you in New Vegas because I trust you, and because you're capable. Prove me right.
Take care of yourself, attend to your duties, and soon enough you'll find yourself in a powerful position. You're like a son to me - I only want to see you succeed.
One final matter - do you have any information on the individual known as "Marko"? I've been vexed by the paucity of reliable data concerning his motives and whereabouts. Some report he is still in the plains, while others say he is running a town in the mountains of Utah. It's difficult to imagine that beast fitting into any civilized setting.
This is all hearsay, mind you. That's why I need hard proof of his whereabouts, as I believe it's crucial to make contact and ascertain his intentions. He has quite a reputation, but if he tries to oppose or undermine our interests, we will crush him.
It's a dangerous time we're living in, my boy. Ill-bred outlaws and self-righteous vigilantes, all with no regard for civilization or our shared humanity. In time, we'll bend them to our needs.
If they don't bend, we will break them. It starts with &PCName;. Do what must be done.
Sincerely, K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
吉玛，
我知道你在莫哈维的努力，你在这么短的时间内就取得了这么大的进展。我就知道我得指望你。
不管怎样，我收到消息说，你让&PCName;逃离了死亡。你在处理对手的时候绝不要犹豫，特别是对待 &PCName;。我相信你的能力，不过不要再犯同样的错误了。我把你放在新维加斯是因为我信任你，而且还因为你很适合这份工作。证明给我看。
你自己多加小心，注意你的职责，而且不久之后你就发现你将会得到一份有力的职位。你对于我来说就像是我的儿子 - 我只想看到你成功。
最后一个问题 - 你有任何关于“马尔科”的消息吗？我已经对那些他的行踪的可靠消息感到厌烦。一些报告说，他仍在平原，而其他的一些报告说他前往了一个犹他州的小镇。很难相信那样的一个野兽会适应任何文明的城市。
这是全部的传闻，你多留意。至于我什么要打听他的下落，是因为我相信确定他的行踪和信息是至关重要的。但是，如果他试图破坏我们的利益，我们就会毁灭他。
这是我们危险时期，我的孩子。无教养的亡命徒和自以为是的治安官，都不尊重文明和我们共同的人性。随着时间的推移，我们会让他们在我们需要的时候屈服。
如果他们不屈服，我们就毁灭他们。从 &PCName;开始。做我们必须做的事。
真诚地， K.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Las Vegas Arsenal
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉斯维加斯军械库

ESP.ORIGINAL:
DEPARTMENT OF THE ARMY FEDERAL RESERVE LAS VEGAS ARSENAL
RRD-HA24-P R27-954-88
WELCOME:
1. You have been chosen by our great President to secure and defend the bullion reserves stored inside the Las Vegas Arsenal.
2. You will have a number of Protectrons at your disposal, as well as our cutting edge prototype Sentry Bot, the RY-600.
3. Should a critical malfunction occur, authorized users may power down the RY-600 at this terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT:
军部 美联储 拉斯维加斯
RRD-HA24-P R27-954-88
欢迎：
1. 你已经被我们伟大的总统选中来保护拉斯维加斯军械库内部的黄金储备。
2. 你将获得一些任你支配的装备，此外还有我们前沿阵地的原型哨兵机器人RY-600。
3. 考虑到危险故障的发生，授权用户可以在这个终端上对RY-600进行紧急掉电。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Private Bounty
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人悬赏

ESP.ORIGINAL:
10/14/2077
I'm just settling in here with Cpl. Melville, still getting used to being underground all the time. Judging by the past entries, it seems this log is more of a tool to document drama between personnel here in the reserve. Melville seems pretty quiet, knows his stuff. Funny, we even brought a few of the same books along.
I suppose six months sealed in this vault is no worse than a tour in a boomer. God knows it's better than Alaska or Thule. The way things are going out there, maybe we're better off fifty feet under the surface.
I got Shelley's letter. Said she and her family bought their way into one of those vaults. I asked Melville if he had a girl or family, he just shook his head. I just hope he isn't some closet psychopath. Some guys crack up when they go without seeing the sun for too long.
I performed my initial inspection, and everything checks out. Security is online, the entrance is sealed, and the vault is secure. I can understand taking extra precautions, but the nerve gas fail-safe seems like overkill. It's unsettling to know this place is holding enough VX to kill New York.
- Sgt. Henry Budd
ESP.TRADUIT:
10/14/2077
我和梅尔维尔下士在这里安顿下来，尽管大部分时间仍是处在地下。从过去的记录来看，这个日志似乎是作为记录人事的备用工具。梅尔维尔似乎相当的镇定，知道他的处境。有趣的是，我们都带了相同的书。
我想没有比六个月被困于有炸弹的避难所中更糟糕的事情了。上帝知道这好过于阿拉斯加和图勒。事情进展到先，也许我们好过于50米之上的地表。
我收到了雪莉的来信。她说她和她的家庭进了其中一个避难所。问梅尔维尔有没有一个女朋友或者家庭，他只是摇了摇头。我只是希望他不是一个特殊的精神病人。一些家伙因为太久没有看见太阳而崩溃了。
我做了初步的检查，而且一切都没问题。保安系统上线了，入口被封死了，而避难所是安全的。我可以理解做一些额外的防护措施，但神经毒气自动防护装置似乎有点小题大做了。这令人很不安，这里的乙基毒气足够杀死整个纽约。.
- 亨利.巴德中士

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Real Chance
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个真正的机会

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sandy,
I'm writing this letter from Goodsprings. I know I haven't always done right by you, taking care of the kids and all. It's been pretty hard for me wandering the road, doing odd jobs. But I think that Lady Luck may finally have thrown something my way.
I'm working on a job that could set us for life. This time it's the real deal. I'm going to get you and the kids out of that shithole. We'll have our own land and our own Brahmin. We can make it work. All I have to do is make one shot.
Love, Juan
P.S. One more thing,
ESP.TRADUIT:
桑迪，
我在清泉镇写下了这封信。我知道我总是在照顾孩子和其他的事情上跟你合不来。虽然我一直在漂泊，在打零工，但是我觉得最终幸运女神会眷顾我的。
我现在的工作可以让我们维持生计。这回是真正的工作。我会将你和孩子们从鬼地方接过来。我们很快会有我们自己的土地和双头牛。我们能做到的。我所要做的只是开一枪。
亲爱的， 胡安
P.S. 还有一件事

ESP.ORIGINAL:
10/23/2077
Our system picked up the EAM, locked everything down. The birds are away.
Christ, they actually did it.
We both hunkered down, half-expecting this place to get caved in. With Nellis, the Test Site, and Groom Lake, I assumed the Chinese would drop dozens of strategic warheads in and around the city. Only a few distant rumbles, though. Maybe piss-drinking House actually intercepted those birds, or maybe we're just lucky.
Melville stayed in the head, vomiting and sobbing. He has family in Chicago. It's gone now. I have to let that sink in for a moment.
I don't know what to feel. I just chain smoke and think about Shelley, hope that she's safe. Her last letter mentioned "Vault 22", though I don't know where it is. It doesn't matter. The arsenal is our coffin. Only one of the senior officers from the rig can open this place, and there's not telling when they'll be moving out. It could be decades.
I never thought I'd be happy that Mom and Dad got in that wreck last year, but at least I know it was quick. Better than lingering on in the hell above us. I keep thinking about the crash, that head-on with the drunk. You're moving along, everything is fine, then there's a flash of light, a split second of fear and agony, then it's over. Maybe it's not so different.
I'll keep praying for them, and for the others. I hope someone is left to pray for us.
ESP.TRADUIT:
10/23/2077
我们的系统被计算机接管了，所有的东西都被锁定了。那些核弹起飞了。
基督啊，他们真的这么做了。
我们全都蹲了下来，不完全期待这地方坍塌。在内利斯，试验场，还有马夫湖，我猜中国人在城市周围降下了大量的战略核弹头。尽管只有少数爆炸声响。也许实际上是喝尿的豪斯在拦截那些核弹，也许只是我们走运。
梅尔维尔呆在原地，呕吐并哭泣着。他在芝加哥还有亲人。现在全都消失了。我不得不从那种情形中脱离出来。
我不知道是怎么样的感觉。我只是不停的抽烟，想着雪莉，希望她是安全的。他最后一封信提到了“22号避难所”，尽管我不知道它在哪。这不要紧，这个军械库是我们的棺材。只有一个幕后操控的高级军官才能打开这个地方，当他们逃走时什么也没说。也许这将会持续数十年。
我从未想过我会对母亲和父亲在去年失事感到高兴，至少那个过程相当快。好过于我们垂死挣扎。我继续思考会崩溃，就像醉酒一样。你独自上路，一切都很好，然后一道闪光，一瞬间的恐惧和痛苦，然后一切结束了。也许没有什么不同。
我一直为他们，还有其他人祈祷。我希望有人能为我们祈祷。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
11/02/2077
Today we laughed for the first time since it happened. I was doing inventory, checking the rations, when I slipped on some water. Corporal Melville walked in right as I hit the floor. The fall must have jostled something in my bowels, because I farted out loud when I landed.
Apparently this was a source of humor for Cpl. Melville, who began laughing uncontrollably. I tried to pull rank to make him stop, but stripes don't matter when you're ripping ass. When the fumes finally struck Melville, I was the one with the last laugh, though.
The food should hold out for fifty years, assuming we keep our caloric intake at check. Rationing sucks, but we don't really have a choice.
Medical supplies are adequate, but God help us if something serious happens. I've got a bit of first aid training, but I'm no doctor. Melville says he gets squeamish at the sight of blood. I sometimes wonder how he ended up in the service to begin with.
ESP.TRADUIT:
11/02/2077
今天是我们在灾难以来第一次大笑。当时我在整理库存，而我因为一些水渍而滑倒。梅尔维尔下士走过来的时候我倒在了地上。这次跌倒肯定搅动了我的内脏，因为我站起来的时候还放了个屁。
显然这是梅尔维尔下士幽默的来源，他开始禁不住的笑起来。我试图用职位压住他让他停下来，但是裤子显然挡不住你的屁。当臭气散去的时候，梅尔维尔才停止，尽管我后来也笑起来了。
食物应该够用50年，如果我们摄入的卡路里在标准内的话。供应的食物很糟糕，但我们没得选择。
医疗用品十分充足，但是如果有什么严重的事情发生，希望上帝能够保佑我们。我有一些急救的训练，但是我不是医生。梅尔维尔说他看见血会晕。我怀疑他是怎么熬到服役最后的。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
10/31/2077
It's quiet topside. Not even a peep on the sensors.
Cpl. Melville is still keeping to himself. I think I saw him writing a letter last night. Maybe that's his way of coping with it all. I think about Shelley, what she's doing in the vault. Based on the advertising, you'd think the vault dwellers are better off now than they were before the war. It has to be better than it is here, that's for certain. At least she's got her family.
I keep smoking through the cigarette rations. Maintenance work keeps us both busy, but it's not enough to clear your mind.
I tried talking Melville into playing chess, but he refused. He's content to read that Conrad novel, the one set in Africa, so I play by myself.
God, I hate the quiet.
Happy fucking Halloween.
ESP.TRADUIT:
10/31/2077
上层相当安静。甚至能听见传感器的吱吱声。
梅尔维尔下士状态还行。我认为我昨天晚上见到他在写信。也许这是他应对这一切的方式。我在想雪莉，想知道她在避难所做什么。根据广告上说的，你会认为避难所居民会比战前过的还要好。显然比这里要好。至少她跟她的家人在一起。
我凭着香烟的供给还能继续抽烟。维修工作使我们都很忙，但这不足以让你的头脑清醒。
我试过跟梅尔维尔谈谈下棋的事，但是他拒绝了。他对阅读康拉德的小说感到满足，所以我只好自娱自乐。
上帝啊，我讨厌安静。
他妈的万圣节快乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Meeting
ESP.TRADUIT: 一次会面

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;,
My name is Grant, and I'm a physician with the Followers of the Apocalypse. I want to thank you for freeing New Vegas from the influence of the Syndicate.
Also, congratulations on acquiring the hard-earned spoils from your adventure. I have heard a variety of colorful, laudatory accounts detailing your exploits. However, every anecdote has included a recurring element: you retrieving a considerable sum of gold.
Ultimately, what you do with this newfound wealth is your business. However, I urge you to meet with me to discuss a charitable initiative that would greatly benefit Westside and all of New Vegas.
You have done great things in New Vegas, but the poor, the sick, and the homeless all continue to suffer. We are not asking for a handout, but an investment in the community. Help the Followers, and you will help everyone. I hope to meet with you soon.
Best Regards, Thomas Grant, M.D. Followers of the Apocalypse
P.S. My sincerest apologies if the courier is of an odd sort - a shortage of funds has compelled us to use discount shipping rates with the Mojave Express.
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;,
我叫格兰特，是一名天启追随者的医生。我感谢你将西区从辛迪加的阴影中解放出来。
同时，我还要祝贺你从冒险获得了来之不易的战利品。我听过很多对于你壮举的美妙而又奇特的赞美。不管怎样，所有的传闻都包含一个成分：你获得了相当大的一笔黄金。
最后，你要如何处理你的这笔财富。不管怎样，我强烈的希望你跟我见一面，谈论一下对西区，甚至包括整个新维加斯都有益的慈善事业。
你为新维加斯做出了很大的贡献，但是那些穷人，那些病人，还有那些无家可归的人还在承受痛苦。我们不是在索取一次施舍，而是一份投资。帮助了追随者，你就能帮助所有人。我希望不久之后能够见到你。
最真诚的问候， 托马斯.格兰特, M.D. 天启追随者
P.S.如果你见到的邮差是个怪人，我表示抱歉 - 为资金的短所迫，我们付了一份打折扣的运费给莫哈维快递。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
11/25/2077
Thanksgiving. Double rations.
I might be sick. We've been getting by on less than 2,000 calories a day, so when we inhale that much freeze-dried turkey and dressing, it's not good.
We did the basic checks in the morning, not much else. Robots are running fine, including that behemoth prototype. I pity the poor bastard who tries to waltz past that monster.
Odd thing happened with Melville yesterday. He was struggling to pull a spanner with his skinny arms, when I reached to help him. Our forearms and hands were touching as I yanked on it. It came free, and I walked off as if nothing happened. Still, I felt strange about it.
I'm still awake because of it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
11/25/2077
感恩节。双份口粮。
我也许有点恶心了。我们每天摄入2,000卡路里，所以当我们猛吃那么大的冷冻火鸡，这不太好。
我们早上坐了基本的检查，没有其他的事项。机器人运作良好，包括那个巨大的原型机。我对想要跳着华尔兹绕过那个怪物的可怜蛋表示怜悯。
昨天梅尔维尔发生了奇怪的事情。他在用他瘦小的手臂费力的拉扳手，然后我过去帮他。我们的前臂和手猛然接触到一起。然后松开了，而我走开了，当做什么也没发生。尽管，我感觉到奇怪。.
我因为这件事还没睡觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck this shit
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈狗日的

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Danny,
That asshole has us pulling shifts, filling sandbags, sweating like pigs. I didn't throw in with this outfit to work like a dog.
I joined because we get high, we take what we want, and nobody fucks with us. Just because some stupid fucking mailman kills a few of our own, we gotta hunker down like fucking animals? Fuck this. We should do like Lobo said - take the fight to that mailman!
And while we're building stupid fucking walls and collecting rats? The Vipers are moving in on our turf. They're weak, but they aren't stupid.
At least we can still get high. Dumbass wastelanders and Westside maggots always got cash, and we can ransom survivors. The supply might not be what it was, but at least it's there.
I'm pushing off at eight, if you wanna get in on it.
- Oscar
ESP.TRADUIT:
丹尼，
那些混蛋让我们轮流值班，填充沙袋，忙的像猪一样。我这身工作服从未离身，我像狗一样工作。
我来这里是因为我们能够嗨，我们能得到任何想要的，而且没有人瞎指挥我们。 只是因为某个愚蠢的邮差杀死了我们一些人，我们就像该死的动物一样蹲着？我操，我们应该像罗伯说的那样 - 跟那个邮差战斗！
然而我们却在建造一个愚蠢的围墙并聚集老鼠？那些毒蛇帮正在我们的地盘上。他们虚弱，但并不愚蠢。
至少我们还能够嗨。愚蠢的游荡者和西区的蛆虫总是要现金，而我们可以赎回幸存者。补给不像原来那样了，但至少还有。
我会在8点离开，如果你也想，那就赶紧。
- 奥斯卡

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rats?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老鼠？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Oscar,
What's the deal with the rats? So he lured them in, and now he keeps them as pets? Fucking sick, even by our standards. I'd rather share a needle with this whole crew than be in the same room as that vermin. Fucking diseases, and those teeth. They make me sick.
Anyway, boss says he wants them. Yesterday he fed them a kid from Westside. The parents couldn't afford the ransom. Life's a bitch, right?
Maybe he's not all crazy, though - robbing those saps and then using their bodies as booby traps. It's a fucking mess setting it up, though. Gary blew his fucking nuts off when he set one wrong, started screaming like a girl. We put him out of his misery, then set another trap.
Fuck, I want to make a real score... like a move on Westside. Everyone is pussified, talking scared since that mailman showed up. Fuck that noise, brother. We've got to stay strong.
-Danny
ESP.TRADUIT:
奥斯卡，
老鼠该怎么处理？他引诱它们进来，然后现在他将它们当作了宠物？ 甚至以我们的标准，也他妈的觉得恶心。我宁愿跟房间里的所有人分享一根针管，也不愿意和这些害虫同处一室。该死的疾病，还有它们该死的牙齿。它们让我生病了。
无论如何，老板说他想要它们。他将一个来自西区的孩子喂给了他们。那些父母负担不起赎金。生命被糟蹋了，不是吗？
也许他没有完全疯，尽管 - 抢夺那些狗屎然后用他们的身体作为诱饵。虽然，他妈的这是一个胡乱的布置。当盖里犯了一个错误之后，他失去了他的蛋，像女人一样尖叫。我们将他从痛苦中解脱出来，然后布置了另一个诱饵。
操，我想做点实际的事...比如说离开西区。所有人都对邮差的出现表示恐惧。真他妈吵，兄弟。我们要坚强。.
-丹尼

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got it made!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这么安排！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Danny,
We got if fucking made! Dickbag doctors at the clinic are giving out Fixer and Jet for "Rehabilitation"! Fucking dumbasses! We are gonna get high tonight! Come meet me at the old apartment, we'll push off after dark. I hear this shit is strong!
- Rod
ESP.TRADUIT:
丹尼，
我们就他妈这么安排！那些操蛋的诊所医生拿走了稳定剂和杰特说是为了“康复”！该死的！我们今晚就要过下瘾!！来旧公寓见我，我们将会在天黑后离开。我听说这狗屎玩意很带劲！
- 罗德

ESP.ORIGINAL:
01/13/2078
The new year is starting slow. It's a cycle of working, counting, reading, playing chess. We don't talk about the war. We talk about family, friends, childhood memories, everything before it happened. We paint a picture of a world that's still alive. We kid ourselves.
I caught some kind of cold, and was laid up for a few days last week. Melville stepped up and took over my duties. He also brought me meds and food. He's a good guy, always looking out for me.
He's still writing those letters.
ESP.TRADUIT:
01/13/2078
这十年过得很慢。只是日复一日的工作，计算，阅读，下棋。我们没有谈论那场战争。我们讨论了家庭，朋友，童年的回忆和所有在那灾难之前的事情。我们勾勒一个还有生机的世界。我们在欺骗自己。
我得了某种感冒，而且上个星期已经卧床不起好几天了。梅尔维尔加强并接管了我的工作。他还给我带来了食物和药物。他是个好家伙，总是照顾我。
他还在写那些信。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
05/20/2078
I managed to find a couple gloves and some baseballs down in storage. It's been great to unwind by playing catch in the halls. It's better than jogging through the facility, trying not to get stepped on by the fucking robots. Those goddamn Protectrons are a walking clusterfuck, always making a racket, running into shit when they're on patrol.
It seems like Josh's (we're on a first name basis now) spirits are picking up a bit. He still won't say what he's writing, but he seems more upbeat about it than before.
God help me for writing this, but it's hard to think about Shelley anymore. Josh is the only friend I've got in the world. Him and the fucking Protectrons.
I'm thinking about getting drunk tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT:
05/20/2078
我设法在仓库里找到一对手套和一些棒球。这用来在大厅中作为放松的娱乐显然十分不错。这比绕着设备慢跑好多了，不用担心踩到那些该死的机器人。当那些该死的机器在巡逻的时候，总是慢吞吞的走路，还很吵。
看起来乔什（我们现在用一个姓了）的精神好了一点。他还是不说他在写什么，但是他比之前乐观多了。
上帝指引我写下这个，但是现在很难想象雪莉怎么样了。乔什是我在世界上唯一的朋友。他和那些该死的机器人。
我考虑今晚喝个痛快。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
05/21/2078
I feel it is necessary to report my misconduct last night, in the interest of good order and discipline. The dire circumstances of my post are no excuse for my behavior.
Last night, at roughly 2200 hours, Corporal Joshua Melville and I became extremely inebriated. Soon thereafter, innappropriate acts and "Fraternization" took place that is unbecoming for a Non-Commissioned Officer in the United States Army and the Enclave. Under the guidelines of the UCMJ, I have revoked our access to alcoholic beverages, pornography, and other entertainment for a period of one month.
Furthermore, we conducted a meeting this morning, in which I reiterated the necessity of chain of command, proper conduct, and moral behavior. We both agreed that our focus should be on our duties. I believe this will bring the matter to a close, with no further infractions or misconduct.
Sgt. Henry A. Budd, USA Las Vegas Arsenal
ESP.TRADUIT:
05/21/2078
我觉得很有必要记下我昨晚的不当行为，一切为了良好的纪律和秩序。在这严峻的情势下，我责无旁贷。
昨天晚上，大概在2200个小时，约书亚.梅尔维尔下士和我喝的非常醉。在那之后，发生了不当的行为和“同性恋”，这在无委任状的美国军官和英克雷之中都是不当的。根据UCMJ指导方针，我禁止在一个月内，我们享有酒精，色情文学，和其他娱乐设施的权利。
此外，我们还在今天早上开了一个会，我重申了一下指挥系统和道德行为的必要性。我们都同意我们应该致力于我们的工作。我相信这能让事情结束，不会有更进一步的违规和不当行为。
亨利.A.巴德下士， USA 拉斯维加斯军械库

ESP.ORIGINAL: Certificate of Rehabilitation
ESP.TRADUIT: 康复证书

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sir/Ma'am,
Congratulations on finishing the road to rehabilitation! You can now begin your life as a healthy, responsible citizen, free from the dangers of drug abuse.
Thanks to the Followers' ongoing cooperation with Westside, you should find shelter and steady work as a manual laborer. This will provide you with exercise, steady income, and a sense of belonging in the community. We encourage you to remember the Followers of the Apocalypse in the future, as public donations help ensure that more individuals are saved from addiction and criminality.
As a precaution, you should assume a different name, and avoid any contact with citizens that you may have interacted with prior to rehabilitation. This should minimize any friction as you transition into society. Good luck in your new life!
Sincerely, The Followers of the Apocalypse
ESP.TRADUIT:
先生/女生，
祝贺你完成了康复！你现在可以像一个健康的，有责任的市民那样开始新生活，你已经从那些毒品解脱出来了。
感谢追随者为西区进行的不间断的努力，你可以找到居住的地方然后像一个体力劳动者那样稳定的工作。这将能够锻炼你，为你提供稳定的收入和社会归属感。我们鼓励你在未来成为天启追随者的一员，为公益捐款以确保更多的人从毒瘾和犯罪中解脱出来。
为保险期间，你应该起一个新名字，在你康复之前避免和居民接触。这应该能让你在最小阻力下过渡到社会中。祝你开始新的生活！
真诚地， 天启追随者

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: <The Courier hastily passes you a crumpled letter>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使慌忙地给你递来一张皱巴巴的信封>

set aaInheritancePost09.MessageSent to 2 setstage aaInheritancePost09 5
Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard ya'll had quite a fight down there at the station. What's the report on Beaumont?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说年轻人在驻地打了一仗。那么博蒙特怎么说？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_GREETING_0004003E_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_GREETING_00048C8E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh... I'm hurting for a fix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额...我需要修理一下。

ESP.TRADUIT: {Sighs}我有东西要给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_GREETING_00024E36_1.ogg
NPC : Zeke [03024E3B] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you! What do you think of the place? We've already found homes for over a dozen children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你！你觉得这地方怎么样？我们已经为超过一打的小孩找到了家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_GREETING_00025540_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost06.OrphanageFound to 1
Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_GREETING_00025541_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salve, barbarus. Quaero servis meis?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_GREETING_0002D059_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me adiuvare potes?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_GREETING_0002D059_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Es stultus? Ubi sunt servis meis?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_GREETING_0002D059_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost06.SeverusGreeted to 2
Excuse me, I have an urgent delivery from Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打扰一下，我有一个来自西区的包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0301D0C9] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0CD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaHeinzNote 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0301D0C9] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for coming. We've got a situation that we can't handle ourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你的到来。我们无法自行处理我们的处境。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you kicked the Syndicate out of town, it seems the Fiends are running low on chems and weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从你将辛迪加踢出了城镇，恶魔帮似乎即将用尽他们的武器和药品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0D5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally they're just like a pack of dumb dogs, content when they're doped up, easy to kill or scare off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常来说他们就像一群愚蠢的狗，当他们满足于毒品的时候，将会很容易吓跑或杀死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0D5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now... they're rabid. They're getting bolder and bolder, desperate to get caps for chems. The Khans are more than happy to profit from this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是现在...他们发狂了。为了得到瓶盖来购买药品，他们变得越来越疯狂。而大汗帮会很高兴地坐收渔翁之利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0D5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few days ago a group of them ambushed the Burke family. They were good people. Everybody knew them. Only their boy is alive now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天之前他们一队人伏击了巴基一家。他们一家是好人。所有人都知道他们。现在只有他们的儿子还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0D5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking Fiends are holding him ransom. They said they want 50,000 caps or the kid dies. See the letter for yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的恶魔帮绑票了他。他们声称要么拿50,000瓶盖要么那孩子就得死。你自己看看这封信吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0D5_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They mentioned you specifically, said something about outfit gold. I didn't know what to make of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们特别提到了你，还说了关于供应黄金的事，我不知道该怎么办了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0D5_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I know is they will only negotiate with you. They're in an abandoned house not far from the west entrance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只知道他们只想跟你谈判。他们在西边入口的一个废弃的房子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D0D5_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost05.HeinzGreeted to 1 player.additem aaFiendRansomNote 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold it right the fuck there! No sudden movements, dickshit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的站在那里！不要轻举妄动，狗屎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_GREETING_0001D3CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're that Courier who got rich, right? Good, I knew you'd come. You hand over the caps, and we'll let the boy live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是哪个发财的邮差，是吗？好的，我知道你会来。你交出瓶盖，然后我们让那小男孩活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost05.ChesterGreeted to 1
I got nothing to say to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你无话可说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <The child looks up at you silently; he is clearly traumatized by his recent captivity>
ESP.TRADUIT: <这个小孩默默的看着你；显然他因为最近的囚禁受到了精神创伤>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Burke [0301D0C7] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, Courier. Ironic, isn't it? I'm bringing a message to the messenger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，邮差。我给“邮差”送信，这很讽刺，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_GREETING_0001B63B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost04.FelixGreeted to 1
Excuse me, I have an urgent delivery for you. Here, it's just this letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打扰一下，我有一个紧急信件要给你。给，就是这封信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03019677] (mod) Quest : ([03019675]aaInheritancePost02) Encounter: Courier with Revenge Letter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_GREETING_0001967D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_GREETING_0000484D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you reconsidered my offer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不重新考虑一下我的报价吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInheritance01_GREETING_000016F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please deliver the package. Leave me be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请带走包裹，别管我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInheritance01_GREETING_000016F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm on duty. If you've got something to say, make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我在值班。如果你有什么话要说，请赶快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_000019D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.BradleyMet to 1
Shut your suck and kill some Fiends!
ESP.TRADUIT: 屏住呼吸然后杀死几个恶魔帮崽子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_000019DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，开始吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_000172B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn, I haven't seen that many raiders since I guarded a caravan passing through 80's territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，从我开始护卫商队穿过80号公路以来，我从未见过这么多的袭击者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00002E2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a courier, right? After that little fracas, you can color me surprised. You moved like a merc. Glad you were here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个邮差，对不对？在刚才的小打小闹之后，你让我刮目相看。你走路像个雇佣兵。很高兴你在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00002E2E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that we've got a little breathing room, I'd like to check out that package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们获得了一些喘息的空间，我想要看看包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00002E2E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseNPCTaking aaBradleyRef.removescriptpackage aaBradleyGreetPlayerPostWestsideFiendAttackPackage set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 2 aaBradleyRef.evp player.removeitem aaSealedLetter 1
You reconsidered the deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不再考虑一下这份交易码？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_000036D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta stand guard. We'll talk when you've taken care of the Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须站岗放哨。我们谈谈你什么时候留意一下恶魔帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00003734_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the intrepid explorers! Let me just say, it's been a pleasure tracking your adventures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，勇敢的探险家！我只想说，能跟你一起冒险是一件愉快的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00010DE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some close calls... you even found places we didn't know about. Truly commendable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有好些死里逃生的经历...还发现了一些我们都不知道的地方，这些真的是值得称赞的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00010DE0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaInheritance01 65 1
set aaInheritance01.ZimmerMet to 2 SetEssential aaBradley 0

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00012869_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I wasn't sure if I'd actually get to meet you. I guess it's something of an honor, you know, all things considered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，我不确定我是否真的能碰见你。总的来说，我猜这是侥幸，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00013135_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of the outfit calls me Tony... {Correcting himself}well, Mr. Chase. I know you're "The Courier" or whatever. What's your real name, pal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人都称我为托尼...{Correcting himself}好的,切斯先生。我知道你是个“邮差”之类的。你的真实姓名是什么，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00013135_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ChaseGreeted to 3

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, Courier. No ambuscades down here. Have a seat if you like. We have a lot to talk about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别急，邮差。这里没有伏兵。如果你想坐，你可以找个地方坐着，我们有很多事情要谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00014C37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ZimmerFinale to 2
I'm curious as to what brought you here. I've heard so many stories... please forgive my fascination. I seldom get to meet a legend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我好奇是什么风把你吹来了。我听过很多关于你的故事...请原谅我的困惑。我很少见到一个传说中的人物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paulie, you need to cut out the smoke break...
ESP.TRADUIT: 保利，你需要把烟给灭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Syndicate Thug [03014C7D] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult03\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00014C84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Shocked, dismayed}Fuck! Fuck me, it's you!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Shocked, dismayed}操！我操，是你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Syndicate Thug [03014C7D] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult03\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00014C84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ThugGreeted to 2 setenemy aaSyndicateStPetersFaction playerfaction aaThugGreeterRef.startcombat player
What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInheritance01_GREETING_0001228A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No bullshit - is this some kind of con? Come clean or I'll buttstroke your fucking skull!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInheritance01_GREETING_00059626_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseFingerShakeWarning
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 30
What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoctor_GREETING_00045E56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩家扔手雷

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaBradleyC_PLAYERTHROWGREN_00004B59_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
That's not a cap gun, fucknuts. Watch it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是玩具手枪，混蛋。当心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_PLAYERFIREWEAPO_00004B52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Annoyed}What is your major malfunction?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Annoyed}你的主要疾病是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_PLAYERFIREWEAPO_00004B53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER LAY MINE
{Sarcastic}This is going to end well.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sarcastic}这结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_PLAYERLAYMINE_00004B57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't fuck around with that thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别瞎摆弄那东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_PLAYERLAYMINE_00004B58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
Keep it up and I'll take that piece from you, stick it up your ass, and pull the trigger till it goes click.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续吧，而我会撕下你身体的一部分，塞进你的屁眼里，然后扣动扳机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_PLAYERINIRONSIT_00004B54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's because of assholes like you that the world was nuked in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是因为有像你这样的混蛋，世界才会被核打击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_PLAYERINIRONSIT_00004B55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就试试看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_PLAYERINIRONSIT_00004B56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击
