ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, just hold steady. Want a shot of whiskey to calm your nerves? Mind if I have one? Heh heh, little doctor humor there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，坐稳。要不要先来点威士忌压压惊？介不介意我也来一口？呵呵，咱们医生这行的小笑话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Sawbones [00155A03] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetAv Variable01 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 75
Okay, fix me. Here's 75 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，治好我。这是75瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighs}Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sighs}当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.Waiting to 1 aaBradleyRef.evp
Let's trade equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们交易装备吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even think about touching my rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要打我的枪的主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTrade_00004B4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Ok, but I'm not your fucking dress-up doll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，但我他妈的不是你的洋娃娃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTrade_000242A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Of course. Make the merc carry all your shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。让雇佣兵带着你所有不要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTrade_000242AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Enough about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不说战术了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen to you, laying down{Mispronunciation for effect} strategery. I'm on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听你的，趴下来{Mispronunciation for effect} 这是策略，我会照做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyRef.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaBradleyRef.evp
All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在你身后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaBradleyRef.evp
Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. How do you want to do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。你想怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're talking. One shot, one kill, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的对。一次瞄准，一次杀敌，他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleMelee to 0
Switch to a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换到近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every heard the adage "Don't bring a knife to a gunfight"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人听过“不要在一场枪战中带着小刀”这个谚语吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleRanged to 0 set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleMelee to 1
Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How so?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么做到的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all ears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听着呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, take point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersLetsGo_00004B40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyRef.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 aaBradleyRef.evp
It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersFired_00004B38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该同行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm locked and loaded. Lead on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。带路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersHired_00004B3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 1 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 1 aaBradleyRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaBradleyREF.evp
StartCombatResponse
I'll cover you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我掩护你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_StartCombatResp_000242A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这就去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_StartCombatResp_000242A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, then let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我们行动吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersFiredN_00004B39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll be in Westside if you need me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你需要我，我会在西区等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersFiredY_00004B3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage aaBradleyFollowerLeaveMessage Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 aaBradleyREF.evp
aaBradleyRef.moveto aaBradleyGuardMarkerRef
FollowersAcknowledgeMyOrder
Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersAcknow_00004E38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you're laying down rules of engagement? This isn't a peace-keeping mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你制定了交战规则？这不是维和任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyRef.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0
I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不客气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersTactic_00004B43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
HealthQuarter
{Dying}Fuck, I'm on my way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Dying}操, 我快死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_HealthQuarter_00024284_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dying}Shit, I don't know if I can stay on my feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Dying}狗屎, 我不知道我是否能站起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_HealthQuarter_00024285_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dying}Jesus, this is it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Dying}耶稣，就这样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_HealthQuarter_00024286_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HealthHalf
Got a spare Stimpak?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有多余的治疗针吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_HealthHalf_00024282_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Grunting in pain}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_HealthHalf_00024283_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ArmorIneffective
This armor is dogshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这护甲真次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_ArmorIneffectiv_00024273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WeaponIneffective
I need an upgrade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一次换装。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_WeaponIneffecti_00024295_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This piece of shit is finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这狗屎完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: NoAmmo
I'm running on empty here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的弹药快要耗尽了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_NoAmmo_0002428C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a spare magazine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有多余的弹药吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_NoAmmo_0002428D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: UsedDoctorBag
Oh, hell yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，该死的好极了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_UsedDoctorBag_00024293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crippled
ESP.TRADUIT: 残废

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn it, I'm falling apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，我伤残了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_Crippled_0002427B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Medic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_Crippled_0002427C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regenerating
ESP.TRADUIT: 治愈中

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rush of health}God, that feels better than sex.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rush of health}天呐，这比做爱还爽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_Regenerating_00024290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rush of health}I'm good to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rush of health}我准备好了。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_Regenerating_00024291_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poison
ESP.TRADUIT: 中毒

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Poisoned}Fuck, I... can't see straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Poisoned}操，我...看不清了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_Poisoned_0002428E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I need anti-venom... something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗屎， 我需要抗毒素...之类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_Poisoned_0002428F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting... woozy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得…恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need a snakebite kit, fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要蛇毒血清，快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersOverburdened
{Straining}There's no fucking way I am humping more of your shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Straining}我没办法背更多你的狗屎东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersOverbu_00004B51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYERENTERSIRONSIGHTS
FollowersStealthing
Speaking from experience, this stealth shit is overrated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 依我来看，这么个操蛋的潜行显然被高估了价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersStealt_00004E3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Straining}This shit is gonna give me a charlie horse.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Straining}这狗屎玩意儿让我抽筋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersStealt_00004E3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sarcastic}Yes, waddling around like jackasses, this is gonna help.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sarcastic}是的，像一头公驴那样行走，这需要帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersStealt_00004E3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, this squatting chafes my balls.{Sighs} Fuck my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，这种蹲姿擦伤了我的蛋。{Sighs}我了个草。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_FollowersStealt_00004E3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01SellersIntroGreeting
You, you there! Are you here for the delivery job? Come closer, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，就是你！你是来交货的吗？请跟紧我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJoeSellersRef.playidle MS11SitComeHere
set aaInheritance01.SellersMet to 2 aaJoeSellersRef.evp
aaInheritance01SellersGreeting02
Yes, I recognize you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我认出了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A regular courier would suffice, but you... well, this is fortuitous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个普通的邮差就足够了，但是你...好吧，这是个意外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016E9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a person of many parts, aren't you? I heard you cheated death... left quite a mark around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是普通人，不是吗？我听说死里逃生...你在这里很有名气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016E9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing like being dug out of a shallow grave to give you perspective, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点也不想被人从坟墓里挖出来的，嗯哼？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016E9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.SellersMet to 3
How do you know about that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么知道的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this time, everything you've done, your choices, the people you've killed... you can't control that story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一直以来，你所做的每一件事，每一个选择和每一个你杀死的人...你都控制不了它们的流传。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may not realize it, but you're becoming the stuff of legend, whether you like it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能没有意识到，你成了传说中的人物，不管你喜欢与否。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016ED_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If not for my infirm condition, I'd be apt to hear your take on things. {Sighs}But time, I'm afraid, is of the essence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是我虚弱的身体，我很乐意与你唠叨一下。{Sighs}但是节省时间恐怕更重要一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016ED_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have made your choices, seen the consequences. I did much the same, long ago, in another life. I am still paying for those choices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做出了很多你的选择，见证了后果。在很久之前另一种生活中，我也做了很多类似的。我为我那些选择付出了代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016ED_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couriers have a special role, one of trust. I hope you will maintain that fidelity, as this delivery... it's... I can't put this off any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差是一个受信任的角色。我希望你在这次运送中尽职尽责...这是...我不能再延误这个包裹了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016ED_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to deliver a package to a man in Westside. His name is Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你给西区的某个人送一个包裹。他叫做布拉德利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016ED_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exchange, I will pay you five hundred caps, all up front. Consider a gesture of good will and trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到一个善意和信任的表示，我将支付500个瓶盖作为预付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016ED_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is the proposal satisfactory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个提议你满意吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016ED_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but I'd like to discuss the delivery job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我想商量一下运送工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's well enough, no offense taken. I know you're a person of gravity, so I will cleave to the matter at hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打扰一下，请勿见怪。我知道你是个重量级的人物，所以我想托付手头上的事儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to deliver a package to a man in Westside. His name is Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你给西区的某个人送一个包裹。他叫做布拉德利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exchange, I will pay you five hundred caps, all up front. I know your reputation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为交换，我将支付500瓶盖作为预付。我了解你的名气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is the proposal satisfactory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个提议你满意吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stow it, pops. You want something delivered, start talking turkey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别说废话了。你想要运送一些东西，直说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a world I'm leaving behind... a haven for brutes, savages, and the uncouth. It certainly fits you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么世道啊...一个对野蛮人，野兽和土人来说的天堂。这显然适用于你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever your temperament, I know your reputation as a courier. Thus, I will get to my offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你的性格怎样，我都了解到你是一个有名气的邮差。因此，我想委托你一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to deliver a package to a man in Westside. His name is Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你给西区的某个人送一个包裹。他叫做布拉德利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exchange, I will pay you five hundred caps, all up front. Consider it a gesture of good will and trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到一个善意和信任的表示，我将支付500个瓶盖作为预付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is the proposal satisfactory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个提议你满意吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I expected, you are perfect for the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如我所料，你十分适合这份工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deliver this letter and key to Bradley, a mercenary under the employ of the Westside Militia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将这个信封和钥匙交给布拉德利，他现在是西区民兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the letter is delivered, you are free of any responsibility to me. However, if you elect to assist Bradley, I will be in your debt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦信送到了，你就不用向我负责了。而且，如果你帮助布拉德利的话，我还会给你额外的酬劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope this will be an end to things... a just settlement. Good luck, courier. I would like to be alone now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这将是一个结束...一个了结。祝你好运，邮差。我现在想单独呆一会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.SellersMet to 4 player.additem caps001 500 setstage aaInheritance01 10 player.additem aaSealedLetter 1 player.additem aaKeyCard01 1
I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you will reconsider. Please return if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你重新考虑下。如果你改变了主意请回到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01SellersBarter
The opportunistic avarice of the wasteland never ceases to surprise me. Very well. This is all I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废土上贪婪的机会主义者从来不会使我感到惊讶。很好。只是我拥有的全部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deliver this letter and key to Bradley, a mercenary under the employ of the Westside Militia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将这个信封和钥匙交给布拉德利，他现在是西区民兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the letter is delivered, you are free of any responsibility to me. However, if you elect to assist Bradley, I will be in your debt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦信送到了，你就不用向我负责了。而且，如果你帮助布拉德利的话，我还会给你额外的酬劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope this will be an end to things... a just settlement. Good luck, courier. I would like to be alone now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这将是一个结束...一个了结。祝你好运，邮差。我现在想单独呆一会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.SellersMet to 4 player.additem caps001 1000 setstage aaInheritance01 10 player.additem aaSealedLetter 1 player.additem aaKeyCard01 1
I suspect there is more to this package than meets the eye. Make it 1,000 and we have a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑有很多双眼睛盯着这个包裹。拿走这1,000瓶盖达成我们的交易吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're trying to squeeze water from a dry sponge, courier. I have nothing left to give.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是想从一个干燥的海绵中挤出水，邮差。我已经没有东西可以给你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Five hundred caps - nothing more, nothing less. Do you accept?
ESP.TRADUIT: 500个瓶盖 - 不多不少。你接受吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Sellers [03000B63] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleOld01\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000016F9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since that incident in Goodsprings my rates have gone up. Make it 1,500 and we're good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于清泉镇的发生的事件，我的房租有所增长。拿走这1,500个瓶盖达成我们的协议。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyIntro01
I've got a delivery for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个货物要交付给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Are you sure it's for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你确定这是给我的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000019DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, give me a second... hold on. Thought I heard something...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给我一点时间...等一等。我听到了一些声音...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000019DB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritance01 15 aaLvlWestsideMilitia03Ref.placeatme C4Explosion aaBradleyRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
aaInheritance01BradleyIntroDeliveryAsshole
Service with a smile, huh? I'm on watch right now. I don't have time for this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 微笑的服务，呵？我立马就看。我没太多时间浪费在这狗屎上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000022AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, don't get your panties in a wad. Let me finish this shift and I'll sign for the package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看吧，不要把这卷成一团塞进你的内裤里。让我搞定这团狗屎然后我会签收那个包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000022AE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... wait, I thought I heard something...
ESP.TRADUIT: 实在是...等等，我认为我听到一些声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000022AE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritance01 15 aaLvlWestsideMilitia03Ref.placeatme C4Explosion aaBradleyRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
Listen, jagoff - I just hauled this letter across the desert for you. How about some gratitude?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，欢呼吧 - 我穿过沙漠只为将这封信交给你。你不感谢一下？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyPostFiendAttackWestside
Goddamn, I haven't seen that many raiders since I guarded a caravan passing through 80's territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，从我开始护卫商队穿过80号公路以来，我从未见过这么多的袭击者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00001CEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a courier, right? After that little fracas, color me impressed. You moved like a merc. Glad you were here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个邮差，对不对？在刚才的小打小闹之后，你让我刮目相看。你走路像个雇佣兵。很高兴你在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00001CEB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since we've got a little breathing room, I'd like to check out that package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们获得了一些喘息的空间，我想要看看包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00001CEB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A sealed letter. Let's see what it says...
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个密封的信。让我们看看上面说了什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00001CEB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.removescriptpackage aaBradleyGreetPlayerPostWestsideFiendAttackPackage set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 2 aaBradleyRef.addscriptpackage aaBradleyReadLetter01Package
player.removeitem aaSealedLetter 1 player.removeitem aaKeyCard01 1 aaBradleyRef.evp
aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter
{Clears Throat}Dear Bradley, my name is Joe Sellers. I'm almost certain you've never heard of me. {Responding}No shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Clears Throat}亲爱的布拉德利,我的名字叫做乔·塞拉斯。我肯定你从未听说过我。{Responding}真是废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00001CF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 3 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
Consider this my last will and testament. {Contemplative Pause}Your father, Joe Sellers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑一下我的这份遗嘱。{Contemplative Pause}你的父亲，乔·塞拉斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 25 aaBradleyRef.evp
I understand if you wish to dispose of this note and erase any notion of connection to me. You would be more than justified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白如果可以，你会销毁这分笔记并擦去任何有关于我的联系。这对你来说是合情合理的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 18 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
It's been so long since these measures were put in place - I have no idea what you'll find there, aside from the next key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这些行为落实到位之前已经过了很长时间了 - 我不知道没有下一把钥匙的话，你能不能发现那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 17 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
Enclosed with this letter is a key, the first of three required to open the vault. The next key is in Linus Caverns, in the Mesquite Mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙附在信里，这是打开避难所的所需的三把钥匙之一。下一把钥匙在梅斯基特山脉的莱纳斯洞穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 16 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
However, I believe your profession has given you the skills and necessary fortitude to see this through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我相信你的职业给了你顺利达成目的的技能和必要的勇气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 15 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
Make no mistake: this is not a simple salvage. You must walk a dangerous path to collect the means to access the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别搞错了：这不是一个简单的遗产。你必须冒着危险想办法进入那个避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 14 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
There is nothing I can offer to make up for the pain I inflicted on you and your mother. But I still owe you this birthright. It is all I have left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么可以弥补我对你和你母亲的伤害。但是我还欠你一份与生俱来的权利。这是我所能付出的所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 13 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
There is a vault in the Mojave that contains enough wealth to let you start anew. You could leave the hazards of the frontier behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个处于莫哈维之中的避难所，那里藏有的财富足够让你重新开始。在此之后你就可以离开危险的前线了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 12 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
I know you have subsisted as a soldier of fortune for some time. I never wanted that life for you. {Responding} Better than your life, cocksucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你为维持生计曾当过一段时间的雇佣兵。我从未想让你过那样的生活。{Responding} 总比你的生活好，老混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 11 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
If you hate me or only wish to ignore me, I only beg you accept my parting gift. Consider it my feeble attempt to reckon for your abandonment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你恨我或者只是希望无视我，我也只是请求你接受我离别的礼物。考虑一下我为抛弃你所做的无力补偿吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 10 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
As a result, I cut all ties with your mother. She went to Reno, and I wandered. I've no doubt you harbor resentment for my actions. {Responding} Fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我断了与你母亲的所有联系。她离婚，而我流浪。我毫不怀疑你对我心怀怨恨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 9 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
Not long after I met your mother, there was a war, and I was on the losing side. Mere association with me could be mistaken for complicity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我遇见你的母亲不久之后，就爆发了一场战争，而我是失败的一方。仅仅是因为我被误认为是同谋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 8 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
It was not for a lack of feeling or to shirk responsibility. {Responding} Bull-fucking-shit. {Resumes reading} On the contrary, I became an exile to ensure your safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是缺乏感情或是逃避责任。 {Responding}他妈的。 {Resumes reading}恰恰相反，我逃离是为了确保你的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 7 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
I will get to the point: I am your father. I separated with your mother not long after you were born. The reasons for my decision are complicated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 言归正传吧：我是你的父亲。我跟你母亲分开后没多久你就出生了。我做出决定的原因是复杂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 6 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
I made choices long ago that impacted you more than you may know. I often question my decisions, how things turned out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很久之前做出的决定对你的冲击超出你的想象。我常常质疑我的决定，如果我没有那样做，事情的结果会怎样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 5 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
When I wrote this letter, I was unsure if I'd summon the nerve to send it. {Responding with unease}Ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我写下这封信的时候，我不确定我是否能鼓起勇气将它发出去。{Responding with unease}好吧。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseReadPaperOnHandA
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 4 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaInheritance01BradleyReadLetter 0 1
aaInheritance01BradleyPostLetter
No bullshit - is this some kind of con? Come clean or I'll buttstroke your fucking skull!
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说八道 - 这是一种耍人的把戏吗？要么坦白交待要么我将会拧开你那该死的头盖骨！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00001CF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseFingerShakeWarning
set aaInheritance01.LetterRead to 30
aaInheritance01BradleyPostLetterDontKnowPolite
Excuse my skepticism, but what the fuck am I supposed to make of this? Some old coot writes me, says I inherited his stash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原谅我的疑惑，但是他妈的我该怎么设法接受这个？某些老傻瓜写信给我，跟我说我继承了他的宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if it's a con, it's shit. He expects me to go digging through fuck knows what kind of shitholes to get some keys? Fuck that noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这是个骗局，该死的。但是他指望我去挖什么钥匙，鬼才知道那是什么狗屎？真他吗的扯谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036C9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just deliver the goods. I'm not privy to what's inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是负责运送货物。我毫不知情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back off, asshole. I'm just the courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开，蠢蛋。我只是个邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse my skepticism, but what the fuck am I supposed to make of this? Some old coot writes me, says I can grab a legendary stash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原谅我的疑惑，但是他妈的我该怎么设法接受这个？某些老傻瓜写信给我，跟我说我可以得到传说中的宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if it's a con, it's shit. He expects me to go digging through fuck knows what kind of shitholes to get some keys? Fuck that noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这是个骗局，该死的。但是他指望我去挖什么钥匙，鬼才知道那是什么狗屎？真他吗的扯谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036D0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do my job and you want to get fresh? Fuck you and your daddy issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是做了我的工作而你如此无礼？去你的，这是你父亲的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful - "Shoot the messenger" can take on a literal quality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长点心吧 - “射杀信使”会承担报纸的压力的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to be sure you're not pulling one on me. {Sarcastic, Patronizing}Sorry I got you all hot and bothered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想确定你不是在跟我开玩笑。{Sarcastic, Patronizing}抱歉，我让你如此暴躁不安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036D1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck am I supposed to make of this letter, anyway? Some old coot writes me, says I can have his legendary stash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之他妈的我该怎么设法接受这封信？某些老傻瓜写信给我，跟我说我可以得继承他的宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036D1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if it's a con, it's shit. He expects me to go digging through fuck knows what kind of shitholes to get some keys? Fuck that noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这是个骗局，该死的。但是他指望我去挖什么钥匙，鬼才知道那是什么狗屎？真他吗的扯谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036D1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyLetterCouldBeTrue
Still, I have no way of knowing if he's just another asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我不知道他是否是另外的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's what I think he is... ex-Enclave... that could be worth my time. Those old bastards still have munitions dumps scattered around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他是我想的那样....前英克雷...那还是值得花费我的时间。那些老混蛋还有些军火藏在附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Contemplative}A lot of that pre-war tech sells for a mean price out here. {Pleased with himself}Fucking Van Graffs gouge the shit out of everyone. It would be fun to undercut them.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Contemplative}许多战前科技在这里能卖出一个合理的价钱。{Pleased with himself}该死的范格里夫家族将每个人都拔了一层皮。削弱他们将会很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not opposed to investigating this, and I'd be willing to split some of the goods if you help out. Seems you know how to handle yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不反对调查这件事。并且如果你帮忙的话我会分给你一部分物品。看起来你知道如何自行处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing is that I'm under contract to Westside, and as you just saw, there's something of a Fiend problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在唯一的麻烦是，我现在有西区的合约在身，而且你看到了，这里有恶魔帮的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know where they get the manpower, but Fiends keep coming out of the woodwork to attack Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他们哪里来的人力，但是恶魔帮突然冒出许多人袭击西区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even though badass bounty hunters killed some of their ringleaders, it seems someone else is stepping in to stir them into a frenzy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管到处惹是生非的赏金猎人杀了他们的一些头目，但是看起来有其他人介入让他们陷入疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it some strung-out witch doctor has the Fiends on a drug-fueled holy war against Westside. Really, I couldn't make this up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说一些毒瘾发作的巫医挑起恶魔帮发动毒品圣战来反对西区。实际上，这不是我编造的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems he's holed up in the old Hofmann mine just west of here. If you can take him out, the Fiend attacks should taper off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他似乎躲在这西边的就霍夫曼矿洞中。如果你能做掉他，恶魔帮的进攻应该会减少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Fiends are neutralized, I should be clear of my duties here, at least long enough to track down that vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果恶魔帮正常了，我将会辞职一段时间，至少足够我们找到那个避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to stand watch, but I'll throw in some caps if you take care of this for me. Afterwards we can strike off together. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不旁观，不过如果你按我说的照做我会付给你一些瓶盖。事后就结账，怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CD_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sellers didn't strike me as a liar or huckster. This letter could be the real deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞拉斯不会骗我。这封信是真的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyLetterIwillTakeIt
No, no, no. I know better than that. I don't have any illusions of some Sierra Madre treasure buried in the desert, but there could be something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，不。我不至于蠢到那种程度。我对埋葬在沙漠中的马德雷山脉的财富没有任何想法，不过这个应该是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's what I think he is... ex-Enclave... that could be worth my time. Those old bastards still have munitions dumps scattered around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他是我想的那样....前英克雷...那还是值得花费我的时间。那些老混蛋还有些军火藏在附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of that pre-war tech sells for a mean price out here. Fucking Van Graffs gouge the shit out of everyone. It would be fun to undercut them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 许多战前科技在这里能卖出一个合理的价钱。该死的范格里夫家族将每个人都拔了一层皮。削弱他们将会很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not opposed to investigating this, and I'd be willing to split some of the goods if you help out. Seems you know how to handle yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不反对调查这件事。并且如果你帮忙的话我会分给你一部分物品。看起来你知道如何自行处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing is that I'm under contract to Westside, and as you just saw, there's something of a Fiend problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在唯一的麻烦是，我现在有西区的合约在身，而且你看到了，这里有恶魔帮的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know where they get the manpower, but Fiends keep coming out of the woodwork to attack Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他们哪里来的人力，但是恶魔帮突然冒出许多人袭击西区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even though badass bounty hunters killed some of their ringleaders, it seems someone else is stepping in to stir them into a frenzy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管到处惹是生非的赏金猎人杀了他们的一些头目，但是看起来有其他人介入让他们陷入疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it some strung-out witch doctor has the Fiends on a drug-fueled holy war against Westside. Really, I couldn't make this up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说一些毒瘾发作的巫医挑起恶魔帮发动毒品圣战来反对西区。实际上，这不是我编造的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems he's holed up in the old Hofmann mine just west of here. If you can take him out, the Fiend attacks should taper off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他似乎躲在这西边的就霍夫曼矿洞中。如果你能做掉他，恶魔帮的进攻应该会减少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Fiends are neutralized, I should be clear of my duties here, at least long enough to track down that vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果恶魔帮正常了，我将会辞职一段时间，至少足够我们找到那个避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to stand watch, but I'll throw in some caps if you take care of this for me. Afterwards we can strike off together. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不旁观，不过如果你按我说的照做我会付给你一些瓶盖。事后就结账，怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CC_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're not interested, I'd be happy to take that key off your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不感兴趣，我会很乐意从你手中拿着那把钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyLetterMeetFather
Let's get something real clear: I don't have a father. Let's say, however unlikely it may be, that this old fuck knocked up my mom back in '41.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们搞清楚一件事：我没有父亲。让我们假设一个事实，这个混蛋在41岁的时候把我母亲的肚子搞大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blowing your wad and walking away doesn't make you a father. This cocksucker has some nerve if he thinks he can just pay me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是自吹和逃避不能使你成为一个父亲。如果这个混蛋认为他可以补偿我，那他确实是有些神经病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Him and this Long John Silver bullshit, giving me a fucking treasure map to fuckall... to hell with that... to hell with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和他的“海盗寻宝记”，给了我一个该死的藏宝图....见鬼去吧...让他见鬼去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000036CF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This man could very well be your father. Don't you want to at least look into it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人很可能是你父亲。难道你不想调查一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyAttackFiendsYes
Good. Here's a few things I was holding on to. They should help you clear those fuckers out. Just check back with me when it's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。这是我保留的一些东西。它们应该能帮你将那些混蛋清出去。当事情办完了跟我核实一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00003733_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem WeapNVC4PlasticExplosive 3 player.additem WeapNVDetonator 1 player.additem Stealthboy 1 setstage aaInheritance01 25 aaBradleyRef.evp
I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不那么想。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a shame. If you change your mind, I'll be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个耻辱。如果你改变你的想法，我会将留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00003732_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.FiendsNeutralized to 10
I took care of Shulgin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我“关照”了一下舒尔金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't sure if you were serious when you took that on. There's no questioning your commitment now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定在你承诺的时候是否是认真的。 现在你的承诺无需置疑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000484F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should dampen the Fiends' spirits for a while, so I'm free to travel. Are you ready to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那应该能暂时抑制恶魔帮的活力，所以我能自由的旅行。你准备走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000484F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyCompanion01.BradleyConvinced to 1
aaInheritance01BradleyTravel01Yes
Ok, let's put that Pip-Boy to good use. Here are the coordinates for the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我们好好利用下哔哔小子吧。这里是避难所的坐标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00004B3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But before we head out there, I want to see this old man for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是在我们去那里之前，我想去亲自去看看这个老人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00004B3B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he is who he claims to be, I at least want to look him in the eyes, see what sort of man he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他是他声称的那样，我至少看他一眼，看看他到底是个什么样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00004B3B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chalk it up to dumb curiosity. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这显然是愚蠢的好奇心。我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00004B3B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 1 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 1 aaBradleyRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaBradleyREF.evp
set aaBradleyCompanion01.BradleyConvinced to 2 setstage aaInheritance01 35 setally aaBradleyFaction playerfaction
Sure, let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不准备走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I'll be here when you get your shit together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好。当你跟你的狗屎在一起的时候我会呆在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00004B3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was thinking of going after that stash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想怎么寻找那个藏身处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't want to waste your time or mine. Are you sure about this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看吧，我不想浪费你和我的时间。你确定这样吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00004B3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyCompanionHeavyArmor
Fuck my life, this shit is heavy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操，这狗屎真重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBradleyCompan_00004E3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyDadsDeadComment01
Alright, let's see if... {Genuinely Surprised}fuck me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们看看是否...{Genuinely Surprised}我操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBradleyDadsDe_0000512A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyCompanion01.DadsDead to 2 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaBradleyDadsDeadComment01 0 1
Jesus, he's dead. Here I was, ready to spit in his eye, and he... hold on, that's blood... small caliber headshot, very clean, professional.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶稣啊，他死了。我来这里，准备下朝他眼睛里吐口水，而他...等一等，这是血...小口径枪械爆头，非常利索，非常专业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBradleyDadsDe_0004671F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyCompanion01.DadsDead to 3 aaBradleyRef.sayto playerref aaBradleyDadsDeadComment01 0 1
Somebody was after him... why would they go to the trouble when he was on his deathbed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人找到了他...为什么他们会在他临终的时候找他的麻烦？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBradleyDadsDe_00046720_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyCompanion01.DadsDead to 5 aaBradleyRef.StartConversation playerref, aaBradleyDadsDeadStartConvoPlayer
aaBradleyDadsDeadStartConvoPlayer
What the hell have you gotten me into here? Did he say anything else about that stash?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的你怎么把我带到了这里？他有说过任何关于宝藏的事情吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBradleyDadsDe_0000512C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he mention other interested parties? What the fuck is going on here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有提及过其他有关的团体吗？这他妈的到底怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBradleyDadsDe_0000512C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyCompanion01.DadsDead to 10
I just agreed to deliver a package. He didn't mention anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是同意运送包裹。他没有提到其他事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing at all? Really? Shit, I'm at a loss. This is not amateur work, I can tell you that much. I just wanted a payoff, not this mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都没有？你确定？狗屎，我很困惑。这不是一次业余活动，我敢肯定。我只是想要回报，而不是这种混乱的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006544_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we walk out of here and forget about this entire thing. It isn't worth the trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说我们离开这里然后忘了这全部的事情吧。这不值得我们陷入麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006544_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know shit about shit. I'm as much in the dark as you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这些狗屎东西。我像你一样全然不知。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you keep saying. This was not a robbery or some random murder, it was an expert execution. Believe me, I can distinguish the handiwork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你说个不停。这不是一个盗窃或者某些偶然的谋杀，这是专业的技巧。相信我，我可以辨别这种手法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006545_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we walk out of here and forget about this entire thing. It isn't worth the trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说我们离开这里然后忘了这全部的事情吧。这不值得我们陷入麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006545_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he really was ex-Enclave, maybe it was a bounty hunter. They seem to be everywhere these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他真的是个前英克雷，也许这会是赏金猎人干的。他们这些天无处不在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most bounty hunters are sloppy and stupid. To the untrained eye that would fit, but I'm telling you it was a precision shot made by a professional.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数赏金猎人显得愚蠢而又草率。在未经训练的人的眼中这或许成立，但是我要告诉你这是一个专业人士的精确一击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006542_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we walk out of here and forget about this entire thing. It isn't worth the trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说我们离开这里然后忘了这全部的事情吧。这不值得我们陷入麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006542_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got the impression you didn't like this guy. I figured you'd be happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得你不喜欢这家伙。我以为你会很高兴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, it's the principle of it, not to mention that we may be caught up in a real shitstorm now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，这是原则问题，更不用说现在我们或许卷入一场真正屎尿横流的暴风雨当中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006543_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we walk out of here and forget about this entire thing. It isn't worth the trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说我们离开这里然后忘了这全部的事情吧。这不值得我们陷入麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006543_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no telling what could turn up. I say we keep going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前还不知道会发生什么。我觉得我们要继续前进。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the record, I think this is a mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 郑重声明，我认为这是个错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006548_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But a deal is a deal, and I can't stomach the idea of you claiming that loot without me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过一言为定，而且我不能忍受你收获战利品的时候没有我的份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006548_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to tool up before we do anything else. Let's head back to Westside and then we'll set off for the bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们做任何事之前我想要准备一下。让我们回西区一趟然后出发去地堡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006548_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritance01 36
I agree, this wasn't part of the bargain. Let's go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意，这不是协议的一部分。我们回家吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said it. Let's head back to Westside. I'll settle up with you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所说。我们回西区吧。我会在那里跟你结算报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006549_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritance01 36
aaInheritance01HawkinsIntro
{Sincerely impressed}Well, this is an auspicious occasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sincerely impressed}好吧，这是个好日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000654B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought I was looking for a generic messenger, not {emphasizing "the"}the Courier. Quite a reputation you've developed in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为我会发现是个普通的信使，而不是{emphasizing "the"}“邮差”。你在莫哈维可是相当有名气啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000654B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritance01 40
set aaInheritance01.HawkinsDealt to 1
Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Drawing out Weeeellll}Well, that's circumstantial. For the purposes of our business, you can call me Hawkins.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Drawing out Weeeellll}好吧，这不重要。为了我们的事业，你可以称我为霍金斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006550_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The late Mr. Sellers had a certain key in his possession that was given to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已故的塞拉斯先生将他财产中的某个钥匙给了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006551_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently Mr. Sellers neglected to inform you of his contractual obligation to my employer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然塞拉斯先生忘了告诉你，他与我的老板有协议在身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006551_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The aforementioned key was to be passed to my employer upon Sellers' death. You could call it life insurance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚才说到的钥匙应该在塞拉斯死后传到我的老板那里。你可以称之为人身保险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006551_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, Mr. Sellers elected to break the contract, as he employed you to deliver the key to Mr. Bradley. This is a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，塞拉斯先生决定违背合同，而他雇用你将钥匙给给布拉德利先生。这是个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006551_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will not mince words, Courier. I know full well your reputation, your abilities. But I require that key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直截了当的说吧，邮差。我完全了解你的名气和能力。但是我需要那把钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006551_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that silence can reinforce the frontier mystique, but I can assure you, it's not impressive in the least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道沉默可以加强神秘感，但是我可以保证，这一点都让人感到印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006552_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01HawkinsFuckOff
Ah, the bravado of the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，虚张声势的废物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I forget sometimes, lose touch. In the spirit of mutual bellicosity, permit me to retort in kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有时会忘记提到。本着好斗的精神，允许我以同样的方式回敬你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006553_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me Sellers' key, or I'll cut your throat, and execute every person you've every cared about. Fair enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么给我塞拉斯的钥匙，要么我会割断你的喉咙，并杀死你所关心的每一人。怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006553_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you're selling, I'm not buying. Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你葫芦里卖什么药，我他妈的都不会买。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01HawkinsKeySpeech
I, I knew it when they told me it was the Courier, it was my death sentence. I don't deserve to die like this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，当他们告诉我那是邮差的时候我就知道，这是我的死亡判决。我不应该那样的死去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000655B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Courier. I am leaving this life behind me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，邮差。我将要离开这种生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000655B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.HawkinsDealt to 10 aaHawkinsRef.disable aaHawkinsRef.markfordelete showmessage aaHawkinsLeftMessage set aaInheritance01.PostHawkins to 1 aaBradleyRef.evp
How many have faced me and perished? Walk away and keep your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有多少人面对着我而死去？离开并过你自己的生活吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Genuinely laughing}You, you think I can't be charmed out of this? Do you know what my employer would do to me if I even hesitated?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Genuinely laughing}你，你觉得我会被这花言巧语迷惑？你知道如果我犹豫不决我的雇主会怎么对我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000655D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Laughing, chortling}He would kill me... and my entire family!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Laughing, chortling}他会杀了我... 和我全家！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000655D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHawkinsRef.PlayIdle LooseLaughA
You don't have to do this, Hawkins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不需要这么做，霍金斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01HawkinsKeyNotGivingIt
That brings us to a regrettable, though painfully familiar junction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真让人感到遗憾，不过是一次痛苦而亲切的会谈罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006562_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHawkinsRef.startcombat player
I'm not giving up the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会交出钥匙的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01HawkinsKeyGiveIt
aaInheritance01HawkinsKeyFuckYou
People say the darndest things right before they die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们在死之前都会说胡话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000655E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHawkinsRef.startcombat player
Fuck. You.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01HawkinsTerrifyingPresence
I already killed all the people I care about. Now I'm working on random assholes. You're next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经杀死所有留意的人。现在我对偶尔出现的混蛋这么做。你是下一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck me, you really are crazy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操，你真是疯了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000655A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHawkinsRef.startcombat player
aaInheritance01HawkinsKeyMakeFun
{Stuttering with Rage}You fuck, I'll... I'll...
