ESP.TRADUIT: {Stuttering with Rage}你个杂种, 我将....我将要...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006561_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Flustered, stuttering}Fuck, I'll cut your kidney!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Flustered, stuttering}操，我要切下你的肾脏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hawkins [0300625E] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006561_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHawkinsRef.startcombat player
I've met hobos with more attitude than you. Now get out of my face before you hurt yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你相比我更倾向于去见流浪汉们。现在在你伤到自己之前从我面前滚开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyHawkinsDead
We are now in a storm of fuck, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正处该死的风暴之中，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006843_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That guy was Syndicate, no doubt about it. Connected, and dangerous. {Sighing}Fuck my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那家伙是辛迪加，不用怀疑。专业而又危险。{Sighing}我操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006843_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.PostHawkins to 2
That... I did not see coming. Fuck being a courier, you should run for office!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个...我没想到会这样。别他妈的做邮差了，你应该去竞选！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You silver tongue may have bailed us out for the moment, but we are still in deep shit. That guy was Syndicate, I'm certain of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的口才使我们暂时摆脱了困境，但是我们仍然处于狗屎之中。那个家伙是辛迪加，我确信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.PostHawkins to 2
What's the Syndicate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛迪加是个什么样的组织？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Organized crime and then some. I butted heads with a few of their low-level guys outside New Reno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少是有组织的犯罪。我曾在新里诺外面见过一些他们的小角色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've all over the NCR, connected with Brahmin Barons, politicians, law enforcement. It was just a matter of time before they showed up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都在NCR，与双头牛贩毒者，政客，执法队有联系。他们露面只是时间问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B25_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, they wouldn't have sent that guy if the key wasn't worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，如果事情不值得做他们是不会去做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B25_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing as to how we're already on their radar, we may as well follow through and track down those keys. We've got nothing to lose now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们已经进入了他们的视线之中了，我们还不如坚持找到那些钥匙。我们已经没有什么可以失去的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B25_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The letter specified the coordinates for a place called Linus Cavern, located in the Mesquite Mountains. Let's see what we kind find there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信中的坐标指明了一个叫做莱纳斯洞穴的地方，坐落在梅斯基特山脉。让我们看看能找到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B25_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.removescriptpackage aaBradleyConvoPostHawkinsPackage
setstage aaInheritance01 45
I don't give a damn about the Syndicate. I'll bury those cockroaches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎辛迪加。我会埋葬这些蟑螂的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a damn foolish outlook. I know you've racked up quite a body count, but you don't understand. Once you're on their list, they never stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是个愚蠢的展望。我知道你你已经杀过相当数目的人，但是你不明白。一旦你在他们的名单上，他们绝不会停止的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And rest assured we are now on that list. The hell of it is that since we've got nothing to lose, we may as well look for those keys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且我绝对已经在那名单上了。该死的是我们没有什么可失去的了，我们还不如找出那些钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B26_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The letter specified the coordinates for a place called Linus Cavern, located in the Mesquite Mountains. Let's see what we kind find there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信中的坐标指明了一个叫做莱纳斯洞穴的地方，坐落在梅斯基特山脉。让我们看看能找到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B26_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.removescriptpackage aaBradleyConvoPostHawkinsPackage
setstage aaInheritance01 45
If the Syndicate wanted the key that badly, the stash must be something special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果辛迪加十分想要这钥匙，那说明这宝藏是什么了不得的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly. We're already on their hit list, so we may as well follow through and find those keys. We've got nothing to lose now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们肯定在他们的攻击名单上了，所以我还不如坚持找到那些钥匙。我们已经没什么可失去的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The letter specified the coordinates for a place called Linus Cavern, located in the Mesquite Mountains. Let's see what we kind find there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信中的坐标指明了一个叫做莱纳斯洞穴的地方，坐落在梅斯基特山脉。让我们看看能找到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00006B27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.removescriptpackage aaBradleyConvoPostHawkinsPackage
setstage aaInheritance01 45
aaInheritance01BradleyKeyCard02Found
Alright, you got it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你知道怎么做！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00007A16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's plug the's key's grid data into your Pip-Boy. {Hums while evaluating data}
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我把那些钥匙的坐标数据记录到你的哔哔小子里吧。{Hums while evaluating data}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00007A16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, if I'm reading this right, we're headed for BFE, east of Nellis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可恶，如果我没看错，我们正往内利斯东边的BFE走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00007A16_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck it, we've come this far. I didn't survive the nightkin revival just to quit now. Lead the way, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的，我已经走了这么远了。我现在就退出的话无法活着离开夜行者出没的地方。带路吧，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00007A16_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaKeyCard02 1
set aaInheritance01.Card02Found to 2
aaBradleyGoodbye
See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBradleyGoodby_00008732_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBradleyGoodby_00008733_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。继续前进。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyKeyCard03Found
So that's it - the last one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这将是 - 最后一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000BE24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's plug this in and get the fuck out of here. I can feel the Rad-X wearing off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们带着这个离开这个鬼地方。我感觉注射剂-X药效退却了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000BE24_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok... that's... odd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的...那真是...奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000BE24_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Says the stash is in the Vegas ruins... Fiend territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说箱子是在维加斯的废墟之中...恶魔帮的领土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000BE24_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, after fighting through fort zombie the Fiends will be nothing. Now let's get out of here before I start shitting plutonium.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，在攻破堡垒之后那些恶魔帮的行尸走肉将不复存在。现在在我开始呕吐之前让我们离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0000BE24_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaKeyCard03 1
set aaInheritance01.Card03Found to 2
aaInheritance01BradleyHubTrapped01
Fuck! Somebody just sealed that door up. We're trapped in this motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操！有人封住了门。我们被困在这狗屎中了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00010DDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think someone's using the intercom. Go ahead and see what these assholes want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为有人在用对讲机。过去看看这些狗杂种想要干什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00010DDF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.HubTrapped to 2
Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name is Zimmer. I'm a... representative for a certain organization which has a stake in this vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是吉玛，一个...驻扎在这个避难所的组织负责人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011682_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck do you think you are, locking us in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的认为你是谁，想将我们困在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name is Zimmer. I'm a... representative for a certain organization which has a stake in this vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是吉玛，一个...驻扎在这个避难所的组织负责人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011687_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty simple. We want the gold and weapons sealed up in those vaults.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相当简单。我们想要那些藏在避难所的黄金和武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011688_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Contractually, it belongs to us. I suppose Sellers neglected to mention that little caveat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按照合同上的，它归我们了。我猜塞拉斯忽视了这个小小的警告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011688_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Mr. Bradley were kind enough to lead my scouts here, and perhaps... I respect your commitment. So I offer you this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和布拉德利好心的将我的侦察兵带到这，同时也许...我该尊重你的承诺。所以我给提供了这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011688_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will let one of you leave, right now. Who leaves... is entirely up to you and Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让你们之中的一个离开，就现在。谁要离开...这取决于你和布拉德利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011688_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should inform you that my hacker friend has taken control of the security systems. I can fill that chamber with nerve gas in under a minute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要告诉你，我的黑客朋友已经控制了保安系统。我可以让这个小房间在几分钟内充满神经毒气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who would have thought a Fiend hacker could be so capable? I swear, they come from all walks of life. It never ceases to amaze me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁会想到一个恶魔帮的黑客会如此有能力？我发誓，他们来自各行各业。这总是给我带来惊喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011688_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you find yourselves unwilling to settle things... well, just say the word and you can huff some VX. I hear it does wonders for the sinus pressure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们发现自己不愿意解决事情...好吧，只要说一声然后你就可以远离毒气。我听说在压力下会产生奇迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011688_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be eagerly watching this little contest through the camera, so don't consider any... trickery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我迫切地想通过摄像头看看这个小小的争执，所以不要想任何的...诡计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill or be killed. Just as it should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死或被杀死。理因如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011688_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01ZimmerHubWhatYouWantCrazy
You're with the Syndicate, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟辛迪加在一块，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, it's only a name... some people call it the outfit, our thing... don't read into it too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，这只是个称谓...一些人称之为组织，我们的事情....不要过多的曲解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011689_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are just a group of businessmen with shared interests. There's nothing more to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只是一个分享利益的商业组织。没有别的什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011689_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... would be a twist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...将是错误的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001168A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I swear to God you'll pay for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向上帝发誓，你会付出代价的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swearing to god, are we? Do you know how many people have made the same threat? Did god help them? Such a fatuous statement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向上帝发誓，我们？你知道有多少人做出类似的威胁？上帝帮助他们了吗？真是个愚蠢的声明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001196E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ChoseCut to 1
setobjectivedisplayed aaInheritance01 70 1 aaBradleyRef.setalert 1 aaBradleyRef.StartConversation playerref, aaInheritance01BradleyHubChoseCut
If it's me or the other guy... it's going to be the other guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是我和其他家伙...死的会那个家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the spirit! I'll be watching. It's impossible to ignore such a Darwinian contest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才对！我会留意的。绝对不会忽视像达尔文进化论之类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011968_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ChoseCut to 1
setobjectivedisplayed aaInheritance01 70 1 aaBradleyRef.setalert 1 aaBradleyRef.StartConversation playerref, aaInheritance01BradleyHubChoseCut
We shouldn't have to kill each other like animals. This is unfair... and barbaric.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不应该像对待动物那样杀死对方。这不公平...而且野蛮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you just use "fair" in that sentence? After what happened with Hawkins, fair would be gassing you like lab rats right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要在这场判决中得到“公平”？在霍金斯发生了事情之后，公平将马上用毒气像攻击实验室的小白鼠那样攻击你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001196A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My organization has a reputation to uphold, and I can't let random wastelanders think they can piss on contracts and walk away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的组织是由信誉支撑起来的，而我不能让那些随便的废土游荡者认为他们能够在合约上撒尿而一走了之。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001196A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only reason I'm going to let one of you live is that we never would have found this place, much less accessed it, without your efforts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你们之中存活一个的原因是，没有你们的话，我们绝对不会找到这个地方，更不用说进入了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001196A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps I'm naive, but I don't like to spit in the face of fortune. I'm giving you the privilege of a trial by ordeal - the strongest wins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许我很天真，但是我不愿意在将面对财富的时候吐口水。我给你们提供判决的特权 - 最强壮的人胜出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001196A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyHubChoseWalk
I wasn't sure what you'd say for a second there, so thanks for not putting me in that position. Let's get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定你等会儿会说什么，所以感谢你没有把我放在那种职位上。让我们离开这该死的地方吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyHubChoseCut
Fuck, I don't want to do this, but... fuck me! I'm.... I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，我不想这么做，但是...我操!我...我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00011971_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0
aaInheritance01BradleyHubPostWalk
So much for the money. No doubt the Syndicate goons will clean this place out after we leave. Fuck my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些钱不过如此。毫无疑问，在我们离开之后，辛迪加暴徒将会洗劫这个地方。操蛋的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, that was a close call. I like money as much as anyone else, but... I sort of prefer living. I don't know if this whole thing is worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，真是好险啊。我也和许多人一样喜欢钱，不过...我更喜欢活着。我不知道这整件事是否值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell this isn't settled in your mind, and it may turn into some sort of quest for you. If that's the case, I say more power to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫你放弃这个念头，但是这对你来说是某种追求。早知道如果情况是这样，我应该花大力气说服你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for me... I'm going to pack my shit and head back to Reno. Sniping 80's is a lot safer than tangling with the Syndicate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于我来说也一样...我想收拾我的狗屎然后回到里诺。狙击80号公路上的强盗比跟辛迪加纠缠安全多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: This "Inheritance" is yours as much as it is mine, considering what we've been through. If you want it, you can have it. Consider this my blessing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这“遗产”是你的也是我的，想想我们经历了什么吧。如果你想要，你可以拥有它。考虑一下我的祝福吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, it's been good travelling with you. Best of luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，跟你一起旅行的日子很不错。祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Likewise, friend. If you find yourself in New Reno, look me up. Drinks will be on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也一样朋友。如果你来新里诺，要来看看我。我们一醉方休。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0
aaBradleyRef.disable showmessage aaBradleyLeftHubMessage
Fine, get the hell out of here. You've just been cramping my style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，离开这鬼地方。你限制了我的风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: An asshole to the end, huh? Alright, good luck taking down the Syndicate. See you around, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到头来还是个混蛋，哈？好吧，祝你能解决掉辛迪加。后会有期，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0
aaBradleyRef.disable showmessage aaBradleyLeftHubMessage
aaInheritance01BradleyHubWalkStickWithMeSpeech
I don't know why I keep agreeing to stick with you, but... ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白为什么我坚持与你同行，但是...好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't take you for a quitter. You really want to just walk away from your birthright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有把你当做一个懦夫。你真的要放弃你与生俱来的财产继承权吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not the issue. The Mojave... it isn't where I belong. There's been nothing but trouble since I moved here. I'm better off in Reno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是个问题。莫哈维...不是我的归宿。自从我来了这里总是遇到麻烦。我在里诺会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to let some thugs steal your inheritance? It's enough to set you for life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不想让某些暴徒偷走你的遗产吗？这足够你安置自己的生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're set on leaving, at least take this - severance pay. Take care of yourself. <Give 500 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要离开，至少带上这个 - 解雇费。照顾好自己。<交出500瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't sure about you at first, but you're a different sort than most of these animals. Even the best can lose their humanity in the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一开始我不太确认你是什么，但是你跟这些动物相比是个不同的种类。尽管这些野兽可能已经在废土上丧失了他们的人性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You travel enough and forget that some people can rise above this shit. Thanks for reminding me there's still some good out there, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你旅行的足够多了而忘了一些人可以不受这些狗屎的影响。谢谢你提醒我离开还是不错的。邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're ever in New Reno, look me up. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你到了新里诺，过来看我。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0
player.removeitem caps001 500 rewardkarma 50 aaBradleyRef.disable showmessage aaBradleyLeftHubMessage
I understand you're "connected."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你是“联络员”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. What of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许。那有怎样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001228E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen closely, freak. I'm going to ask you about the Syndicate, and you're going to answer me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好好听着，怪人。我要询问你关于辛迪加的事，而你需要回答我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Unimpressed by player's bravado}Are you high? That must be psycho talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Unimpressed by player's bravado}你上瘾了吗？看来需要做个心理测试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001228D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go take some fixer, see a doc, but don't talk to me again until you're head is screwed on straight, or I'll knock it the fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用一点镇定剂，然后去看医生，不要再跟我说话了，除非你不再晕头转向了，否则我他妈的会让你的脑袋感受一下敲击的快感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001228D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.HastingsMet to 1
aaInheritance01HastingsIntroTryAgain
I need to find Zimmer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要找到吉玛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know anyone named Zimmer. Even if I did, why would I tell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认识叫吉玛的人。即使我知道，我为什么要告诉你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaInheritance01 90 1 setobjectivecompleted aaInheritance01 95 1
I want to let the Syndicate know that things are settled between us. It's over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让辛迪加知道我们之间的事将会了解。一切结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good for you. I'll let them know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我会让他们知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.OutfitSettled to 1 showmessage aaSyndicateSettledMessage setstage aaInheritance01 185
aaInheritance01HastingsFindZimmerSpeech
Hold on, that's a serious accusation. I just want the dope and caps to flow freely, not rampaging Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，有个严重的警告。我只想要吸毒者和滚滚而来的瓶盖，而不是狂暴的恶魔帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't know Zimmer. Never even met him. But, I know a guy who can tell you. His name is Chase. He's shacked up in Gomorrah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意，我不认识吉玛。从未见过他。但是我知道有个家伙能告诉你。他叫做切斯。他暂时住在罪恶城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chase is a heavy hitter, muscle for the Syndicate. He's got his own room. Here's I'll point it out on your map.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切斯在辛迪加是个重量级人物。他在自己的家里。我将会在你的地图上指出位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you're wondering, I don't know you, and you don't know me. Don't speak to me again, and never mention my name in this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一你被怀疑，那我不认识你，而你也不认识我。不要再跟我说了，而且绝不要提及我的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritance01 100
If the Fiends found out that the Syndicate is just using them, things could get... ugly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果恶魔帮发现辛迪加只是在利用他们，事情将会变得...令人厌恶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please. The NCR doesn't give a fuck about junkies or the Syndicate. Even if they did, they got no manpower to follow through. Keep dreaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托。NCR一点都不在乎吸毒者或者辛迪加。即使他们在乎，他们也没有人力坚持去做。继续做梦吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet NCR authorities would be interested in your arrangment with the Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌NCR当局将会对你关于恶魔帮的计划感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01HastingsFindZimmerBribe
You realize you're just financing your own funeral, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你意识到了你在为你的葬礼筹备资金，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't know Zimmer. Never even met him. But, I know a guy who can tell you. His name is Chase. He's shacked up in Gomorrah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意，我不认识吉玛。从未见过他。但是我知道有个家伙能告诉你。他叫做切斯。他暂时住在罪恶城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chase is a heavy hitter, muscle for the Syndicate. He's got his own room. Here's I'll point it out on your map.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切斯在辛迪加是个重量级人物。他在自己的家里。我将会在你的地图上指出位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you're wondering, I don't know you, and you don't know me. Don't speak to me again, and never mention my name in this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一你被怀疑，那我不认识你，而你也不认识我。不要再跟我说了，而且绝不要提及我的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 1000 setstage aaInheritance01 100
<Pay 1,000 caps> This should jog your memory.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付1,000瓶盖>这应该能唤起你的记忆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01Hastings01FindZimmerBW
Baby, you are speaking my language.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老弟，你抢了我的台词。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to speak with Tony Chase up in Gomorrah. He'll tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要跟罪恶城的托尼·切斯谈谈。他会告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it's time for that exchange you spoke of...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是谈谈兑现你所说的时候了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001229E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX setstage aaInheritance01 100
All I need is a location, and in return... well, a good businessman like you wouldn't turn it down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是需要一个地点，而作为报答...好吧，一个好的商人是不会拒绝的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01HastingsFindZimmerExchange
If you don't mind a little blood on your hands, we could come to an agreement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意手上沾一点点血，我们就可以达成协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000122A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My problem... is a bounty hunter who's been tracking me for weeks. His name is Vaughn, he's like a fucking bloodhound, won't give up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的问题...一个赏金猎人跟踪我数个星期了。他加做沃恩，他就像个该死的狩猎犬，不会放弃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000122A0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm safe in the Thorn, but outside he could take a free shot at me. This is hurting my business, and making me a little more than paranoid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在荆棘城是安全的，但是在外面他就可以不受约束的杀死我。这打击了我的事业，并使我有一点害怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000122A0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care of this guy, and I'll help you find Zimmer. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意一下这个家伙，而我将会帮助你找到吉玛，一言为定？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000122A0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm something of a problem solver. Perhaps I can help you out, and then you can talk about Zimmer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个解决问题的能手。或许我能帮你解决麻烦，然后你就谈谈关于一下吉玛的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tend to kill people who offend me. Tell me about Zimmer before I get... upset.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我常常杀死冒犯我的人。赶快告诉我吉玛的事情在我...不耐烦之前。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you and your delicate sensibilities!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你和你的该死的微妙感觉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000122A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But hey - if you're feeling brave, make a move. You'll bring the whole Thorn down on you. Do what you feel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是嘿 - 如果你感觉到勇敢，那就行动吧。你会让整个荆棘城对你不满，你觉得呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000122A3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll take care of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我会注意一下他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I don't care if he leaves town or has an... "accident" - just make sure he won't fuck with me or my clients.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我不介意他是否离开了城镇或者出现了....“意外” - 只要保证他不在骚扰我和我的客户。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012866_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaInheritance01 96 1 aaVaughnRef.enable
I'm not going to do your dirty work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会去做你那肮脏的勾当。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your choice, Courier. But you've got a chance in fuck of finding Zimmer without my help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的选择，邮差。而我他妈的将不会帮你寻找吉玛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012865_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别介意。我会走的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to forget about the bounty on Hastings. Leave Westside, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要忘记海斯廷斯的赏金。现在就离开西区。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, Hastings is getting nervous? Sends the local badass to scare me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，海斯廷斯变得紧张了？派当地的恶棍来吓唬我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012870_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Won't work. If I gave up every time some mark sent thugs to try and intimidate me... I'd be broke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没用。任何时候如果我有放弃的迹象，他将会派暴徒来威胁我...我将一无所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012870_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01VaughnSpeech
What? Fuck me! I've been tracking that asshole for two months. Now I've got to pack up and head to Bullhead City? Fuck this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？该死的！我已经跟踪那个混蛋两个月了。而现在我要收拾东西然后去牛头城？这该死的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012871_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaInheritance01 96 1 aaVaughnRef.removescriptpackage aaVaughnWaitPackage set aaVaughnRef.VaughnLeft to 1 aaVaughnRef.evp set aaInheritance01.VaughnDealt to 1
<Lie> You already missed your chance. Hastings just left for Bullhead City.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎>你已经错过了你的机会。海斯廷斯已经离开去了牛头城。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please. Those junkies are on their last leg. Some asshole named Randall cleaned them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托了。那些毒贩子已经穷途末路了。一个叫兰道尔的组织清除了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012876_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, the Fiends would love to get their hands on a bounty hunter...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的，恶魔帮将会很喜欢一个赏金猎人拿走他们的手指...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave Westside and never come back, or I'll cut your fucking nuts off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开西区而且绝不要回来，否则我他妈的将你阉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I was just on my way out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，我只是准备离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012880_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaInheritance01 96 1 aaVaughnRef.removescriptpackage aaVaughnWaitPackage set aaVaughnRef.VaughnLeft to 1 aaVaughnRef.evp set aaInheritance01.VaughnDealt to 1
I'm carrying a .44 magnum, and you're going to threaten me with a knife? Shut the fuck up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带着一颗.44马格南子弹，而你想用一把小刀威胁我？他妈的闭嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012881_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's an offer - leave or I'll, uh... cut meticulously around... your abdominal region!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个提议 - 要么离开要么我会，嗯...仔细的剖开...你的腹部！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hastings is offering me information on Zimmer. Can you do better?
ESP.TRADUIT: 海斯廷斯向我提供吉玛的消息。你能做的更好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been tracking Hastings for months... believe me, he doesn't come close to Zimmer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经跟踪海斯廷斯两个月了..相信我，他没接触过吉玛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012879_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, he does meet up with an outfit man, someone higher up the food chain. I suppose he might know this Zimmer guy you're after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，他跟一个组织的人碰过面，某个站在食物链上层的人。我想他会知道你追赶的那个叫吉玛的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012879_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll raise the stakes - If you kill Hastings, bring back his finger... I'll tell you where this contact is, and throw in... 250 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会提供赏金 - 如果你杀了海斯廷斯，带回他的手指...我将会告诉你联系地方在哪，并且提供...250个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012879_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This way it works to both our benefit. So that's my offer - I'll leave it up to you whether or not to act on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种方式对我们都有好处。所以这是我的建议 - 我将会离开取决于你是否执行它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012879_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.HastingsCrossed to 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaInheritance01 97 1
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pack your shit and leave, hillbilly. Hastings doesn't want you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 整理你的狗屎东西然后离开吧，土人。海斯廷斯不想你在附近。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, Hastings is getting nervous? Sends the local badass to scare me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，海斯廷斯变得紧张了？派当地的恶棍来吓唬我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012877_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Won't work. If I gave up every time some mark sent thugs to try and intimidate me... I'd be broke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没用。任何时候如果我有放弃的迹象，他将会派暴徒来威胁我...我将一无所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012877_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hastings is dead. Here's the finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海斯廷斯已经死了。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never quite understood this part of the trade. It's one of those traditions, I guess... pretty sick if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来不是很理解这是交易的一部分。这是一种传统，我猜，我认为...很恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001287F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But this is no time to complain - thanks for stepping up and taking care of this for me. Here's the caps I promised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是没有时间去抱怨了 - 感谢你的亲近我并帮我留意这个。这是我承诺的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001287F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the contact... I know that Hastings will meet with a Syndicate man, guy named Tony Chase, up in Gomorrah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于那个接触...我知道海斯廷斯会见一个辛迪加人，那个家伙叫做托尼·切斯，住在罪恶城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001287F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's probably the man to tell you about Zimmer. Good luck getting it out of him, though. I heard he's a gorilla - likes to use his hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是最有可能告诉你关于吉玛的事情的人。不过祝你从他那里得到想要的。我听说他是个金牌打手 - 喜欢使用他的双手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001287F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You watch your back, kid. You could've dealt me a shit hand here, but you came through. Good luck getting whatever it is you're after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要留意一下你的背后，朋友。你本可以在这干掉我，但是你醒悟了。无论你追赶什么，祝你得到你想要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vaughn [03012863] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001287F_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaHastingsFinger 1

setobjectivecompleted aaInheritance01 96 1 setobjectivecompleted aaInheritance01 98 1 player.additem caps001 250 setstage aaInheritance01 100 aaVaughnRef.removescriptpackage aaVaughnWaitPackage set aaVaughnRef.VaughnLeft to 1 aaVaughnRef.evp
Vaughn won't be a problem anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃恩将不会是个问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already got word. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经得到消息了。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012883_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't know Zimmer. Never even met him. But, I know a guy who can tell you. His name is Chase. He's shacked up in Gomorrah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意，我不认识吉玛。从未见过他。但是我知道有个家伙能告诉你。他叫做切斯。他暂时住在罪恶城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012883_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chase is a heavy hitter, muscle for the Syndicate. He's got his own room. Here's I'll point it out on your map.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切斯在辛迪加是个重量级人物。他在自己的家里。我将会在你的地图上指出位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012883_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you're wondering, I don't know you, and you don't know me. Don't speak to me again, and never mention my name in this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一你被怀疑，那我不认识你，而你也不认识我。不要再跟我说了，而且绝不要提及我的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hastings [0301227C] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00012883_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritance01 100
aaInheritance01ChaseIntro01
Come in, make yourself comfortable. There's no strangers on the third floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进来吧，请随意。三楼没有陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance
Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001311F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, it will be nice to have some company. The Omertas, you know, gave us the whole floor, so it gets a bit lonely up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，这正适合谈一些业务。那些黑手党，你知道的，给我们提供了整个楼层，所以这里看起来有点冷清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001311F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ChaseGreeted to 2 aaTonyChaseRef.evp
What's to keep us from taking all the loot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么能够阻止我们获得全部的战利品？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides the fact that I can fumigate the vault with nerve gas? Well, you'll find it difficult to access the various chambers with your keys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了我可以使避难所充满毒气这个事实？好吧，你们会发现使用你们的钥匙将很难进入各个房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013134_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your keys opened the arsenal itself. My keys, however, provide access to... whatever is inside those vaults. Sellers didn't mention that, did he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们的钥匙打开了军工厂。然而我的钥匙，能够进入...在避难所中的任何房间。塞拉斯没有提及那个，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013134_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, when the good Mr. Sellers made that arrangement with us so long ago, he provided part of the access cards, but shrewdly kept the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看吧，当好心的塞拉斯先生在很久之前跟我们做协议时，他交出了访问卡，而机灵的保留了其他的钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013134_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone consented, knowing full well that neither side could easily rip off the other... Sellers had other plans, it seems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有人一致赞成，他完全知道双方都可以轻易做掉另一方...塞拉斯看起来有其他计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013134_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, one of those, are you? You imagine yourself the strong, silent type? In my experience, it's a fucking rarity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那些人中的一个，不是吗？你设想自己很强大，沉默型的？从我的经验来看，这真他妈的罕见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of the mutes I've known are idiots or psychopaths. Of course, you have to consider our working environment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所认识的大多数哑巴要么是白痴要么是精神病？当然，你不得不考虑下我们的工作环境。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna get to the point, kid. What the hell are you doing here? Is this about Zimmer? The loot? I thought we had an agreement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该言归正传，小子。你他妈的来这干什么?关于吉玛？战利品？我想我们达成共识了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm &PCName;, pleased to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是&PCName;，很高兴见到你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Likewise. That name of yours isn't exactly what I was expecting. Funny how expectations don't always correspond to, you know, reality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是。你的名字一点也不是我所期望的。有趣的是，你知道的，实际上期望通常不符合现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I'm gonna get to the point, kid. What the hell are you doing here? Is this about Zimmer? The loot? I thought we had an agreement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我该言归正传，小子。你他妈的来这干什么?关于吉玛？战利品？我想我们达成共识了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd prefer to keep that to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿保守秘密。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, fair enough. It wasn't anything diabolical. I already know more about you than you may realize.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，说得好。这不是什么恶毒的事情。我所知道的超出你可能认为的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been keeping tabs on you since you crawled out of that grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从你爬出坟墓之后我们一直在关注你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I'm gonna get to the point, kid. What the hell are you doing here? Is this about Zimmer? The loot? I thought we had an agreement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我该言归正传，小子。你他妈的来这干什么?关于吉玛？战利品？我想我们达成共识了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm &PCName;, and I'm the last person you'll ever see if you don't tell me what I want to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是&PCName;，而如果你不说出我想知道的，那么我将是你见到的最后一人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Unimpressed}Whoa, whoa, whoa, just take it down a notch, alright. We're not making a fuckin Western here.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Unimpressed}哇，哦，哦，放低调点，好吧。我们他妈的不是在拍西部片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may be scaring those pissant raiders and shitkickers in the wasteland, but don't try that bullshit on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许吓唬住那些没用的袭击者和废土上的土人，但是请不要对我说那些废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna get to the point, kid. What the hell are you doing here? Is this about Zimmer? The loot? I thought we had an agreement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该言归正传，小子。你他妈的来这干什么?关于吉玛？战利品？我想我们达成共识了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001313F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want that stash. Zimmer shouldn't have taken it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要宝藏。吉玛不该拿走它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, if all else fails, you can always count on greed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，如果其他都失败了，你总能指望贪婪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013146_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It can only end two ways. Either you walk away, or you get buried in the fucking desert again, and this time... you don't come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只会以两种方式结束。要么你离开，要么你会再次被埋葬在该死的沙漠之中，而这次...你不会活过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013146_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got heart, kid. But that ain't enough. You don't realize what you're up against... you only think you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有胆量，小子。但是这还不够。你没意识到你面对的是什么...你只考虑你做所的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013146_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zimmer fucked himself when he played with my life. I'm nobody's puppet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当吉玛玩弄我的生命的时候他就该死。我不受任何人的摆布。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's just fucking dumb. We all answer to somebody, kid. Even Zimmer answers to... well, he answers to somebody you don't want to meet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真他妈的愚蠢。我们都服从某人，小子。尽管吉玛服从的...很好，你不会想知道他服从的人是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013148_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It can only end two ways. Either you walk away, or you get buried in the fucking desert again, and this time... you don't come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只会以两种方式结束。要么你离开，要么你会再次被埋葬在该死的沙漠之中，而这次...你不会活过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013148_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got heart, kid. But that ain't enough. You don't realize what you're up against... you only think you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有胆量，小子。但是这还不够。你没意识到你面对的是什么...你只考虑你做所的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013148_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your organization had no right to kill Bradley. I intend to settle things with Zimmer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的组织没有权利杀死布拉德利。我要跟吉玛解决点事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You realize how naive that sounds, don't you? How many have you killed? Dozens? Hundreds?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你意识到这听起来有多天真了吗，有没有？你杀死了多少人？几十个？几百个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013145_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013145_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got heart, kid. But that ain't enough. You don't realize what you're up against... you only think you do.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate the Syndicate. Reason enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恨辛迪加。理由足够了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty, but I think you used up all your luck when Benny popped you in the noggin. Acting on all that hate... it's a dangerous road, kiddo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 足够了，但是我认为在班尼爆了你头时你用完了你的全部运气。仇恨所有...这是个危险的道路，老兄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013149_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My reasons are my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自有我的理由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you might say some shit like that. Hard to figure out what makes people tick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你会说一些类似的狗屎。在一时之间很难断定一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013147_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got heart, kid. But that ain't enough. You don't realize what you're up against... you only think you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有胆量，小子。但是这还不够。你没意识到你面对的是什么...你只考虑你做所的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013147_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me your word that the Syndicate will let this go, and I'll walk away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我辛迪加将会退出这里，而我将会离开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have my word. This is the smart play, kid. You don't know us, we don't know you. Everything goes back to the way it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我惊讶。这是个聪明的把戏，小子。你不了解我们，我们也不了解你。一切恢复到之前的状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew you'd do the right thing when the dust settled. Take care of yourself out there, pal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道当尘埃落定的时候你做了正确的事情。照顾好你自己吧，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.OutfitSettled to 1 showmessage aaSyndicateSettledMessage setstage aaInheritance01 185
<Spit in his face>
ESP.TRADUIT: <往他脸上吐口水>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Apoplectic, muh-thah-fuck-ah}Motherfucker... is this really how you want to play it?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Apoplectic, muh-thah-fuck-ah}操你妈... 你确定你想要玩吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013159_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to be a prize fighter up in Reno... heavyweight, real contender. Got into this job because I could break someone down with my hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾在里诺当过职业拳击手...重量级的，货真价实的选手。我进入这一行是因为我弄死了某个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013159_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was always work, because I just knew where to hit a man to make him cry like a little fucking girl and beg for mercy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作总会有，因为我正好知道攻击一个男人的哪个部位会使他像一个该死的小女孩那样哭泣并跪地求饶...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013159_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's what I'm going to do to you... just when you think it can't get any worse, that's when the real pain's gonna start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而那会是我将会对你做的...就在你认为事情不能变的更糟的时候，而真正的痛苦才刚刚开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013159_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I won't kill you, but I'm gonna break you into tiny little fucking pieces that can't be put back together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不会杀了你，但是我会将你卸成他妈的一小块一小块的，再也不能拼回原状了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013159_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be eating food through a straw and begging in Freeside, sucking cock for cash. That's where you're headed, shit for brains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将会使用吸管来进食并会在自由城乞讨，为了金钱而吸允鸡巴。那会是你的结局，吃狗屎去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013159_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You listen to me, old man - the Syndicate can't stop me. Zimmer is a dead man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听我说，老家伙 - 辛迪加不能阻止我。吉玛将会是个死人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you won't fucking listen... {Turns bitter, clearly enraged}well, fuck you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你他妈的听不进去... {Turns bitter, clearly enraged}好吧，我操！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I won't kill you, but I'm gonna break you into tiny little fucking pieces that can't be put back together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不会杀了你，但是我会将你卸成他妈的一小块一小块的，再也不能拼回原状了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315B_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be eating food through a straw and begging in Freeside, sucking cock for cash. That's where you're headed, shit for brains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将会使用吸管来进食并会在自由城乞讨，为了金钱而吸允鸡巴。那会是你的结局，吃狗屎去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315B_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a point of fact, I've killed thousands. You might as well be next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上。我杀了几千个。你不妨做下一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you won't fucking listen... {Turns bitter, clearly enraged}well, fuck you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你他妈的听不进去... {Turns bitter, clearly enraged}好吧，我操！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to be a prize fighter up in Reno... heavyweight, real contender. Got into this job because I could break someone down with my hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾在里诺当过职业拳击手...重量级的，货真价实的选手。我进入这一行是因为我弄死了某个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was always work, because I just knew where to hit a man to make him cry like a little fucking girl and beg for mercy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作总会有，因为我正好知道攻击一个男人的哪个部位会使他像一个该死的小女孩那样哭泣并跪地求饶...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's what I'm going to do to you... just when you think it can't get any worse, that's when the real pain's gonna start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而那会是我将会对你做的...就在你认为事情不能变的更糟的时候，而真正的痛苦才刚刚开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, I've survived a lot worse than the Syndicate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，我曾在比辛迪加更坏情况下存活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you won't fucking listen... {Turns bitter, clearly enraged}well, fuck you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你他妈的听不进去... {Turns bitter, clearly enraged}好吧，我操！
