ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking mute motherfucker, you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这他妈的哑巴白痴，你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001315E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaTonyChaseFaction playerfaction aaTonyChaseRef.setav aggression 2 aaTonyChaseRef.startcombat player
Fuck you, fat man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的，死肥子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh, not original, but succinct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不是原创，但很简洁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013169_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaTonyChaseFaction playerfaction aaTonyChaseRef.setav aggression 2 aaTonyChaseRef.startcombat player
You come at me like the Marquess of Queensberry, and I'll put an iron fist through your throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你袭击我就像袭击昆斯拜瑞侯爵一样，而我将会把铁拳塞进你的喉咙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gonna be nice to face a real pugilist for once. Won't change a fucking thing, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一次面对一个真正的拳击手是一件很不错的事情。虽然不会改变任何操蛋的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013166_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaTonyChaseFaction playerfaction aaTonyChaseRef.setav aggression 2 aaTonyChaseRef.startcombat player
I'm going to carve your fat ass into bacon and serve it up to those mimes at the Ultra-Luxe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将会切下你的肥嫩屁股做出熏肉然后招待超美多的食客。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, mio dio!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，上帝啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013165_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaTonyChaseFaction playerfaction aaTonyChaseRef.startcombat player aaTonyChaseRef.CIOS TerrifyingPresenceSpell
Talk is cheap, Tony. Make a move if you're serious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光说没用，托尼。如果你是认真的那就行动吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaTonyChaseFaction playerfaction aaTonyChaseRef.setav aggression 2 aaTonyChaseRef.startcombat player
I don't want to fight you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想和你战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then this won't take long at all. Why don't you just stand there, real still-like for me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么这一点都不会花很多时间。为什么你不仅仅是站在那儿，实际上却还是像我这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaTonyChaseVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00013167_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaTonyChaseFaction playerfaction aaTonyChaseRef.setav aggression 2 aaTonyChaseRef.startcombat player
Honestly, do you know how to shut the fuck up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，你知道他妈的怎样闭嘴吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Chase [03012581] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaTonyChaseFaction playerfaction aaTonyChaseRef.setav aggression 2 aaTonyChaseRef.startcombat player
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are really persistent with that facade, aren't you? You know it's nothing special. A base coward can silently scowl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的表情说明了你事实上很固执，不是吗？你知道这没什么特别的。一个低劣的懦夫只会默默的怒视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015271_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's my money?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的钱在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, the money! It's not even ten feet from you. Enough to set you for life, perhaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错，钱！它甚至离你不足十英尺。足够你安置资金的生活了，或许。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015272_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No tricks, look past the barred door, there's a tidy stack of bullion. The Enclave had impressive printing abilities, I must admit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没耍花招，透过门闩看吧，有一整箱的金条。英克雷有令人印象深刻的印刷能力，我必须承认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015272_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you know why I came here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你知道为什么来这。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? That little episode in the vault? Quite a show. You didn't disappoint, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？那个在避难所的小插曲？相当不错的演出。尽管你没让我失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem awfully relaxed for a man who's about to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像一个将死之人那样很放松。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're half-right, Courier. I am relaxed... but I'm not afraid to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只对了一半，邮差。我在放松...而不是害怕死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what makes me strong - equanimity. I always liked that word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静使我变的强大。我永远喜欢这句话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015270_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of listening to you talk. Can we get this over with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我厌倦了听你说话。我们已经结束这一切了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patience. I know you're not that brash, otherwise you'd have come in lobbing grenades. You're smarter than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耐心点。我知道你不是那样无礼，否则你就会扔着手雷进来。你很明智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015278_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm new to the Mojave, so I've made it a priority to familiarize myself with the history, politics... the players. Somehow your name keeps coming up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我新到莫哈维，所以我得优先考虑使自己熟悉它的历史，政治...和参与者。不知怎么的你的名字不断出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015278_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been wanting to meet you for some time, really. It's another reason I didn't gas you in that vault. It would've been unseemly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上我一直想要见你。这是我没有在避难所放毒气有另一个原因。这似乎不太得体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015278_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew that cowing you would be a challenge. Odds were that you would show up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道威胁将会使你成为一个挑战。显然你极有可能来到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015278_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was looking forward to this... a worthy opponent, an opportunity to make my own name, while letting you pass... with dignity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很期待这场比试...一个相称的对手，一个让我的名字盖过你的机会...还有尊严。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015278_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who would cross "The man who killed Courier Six?" Has a ring to it, like one of those pre-war Western films.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁会错过“那家伙杀死了六号信使”这个光环呢，这简直就像那些战前的西部电影。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015278_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me guess - this is the part where you try to persuade me to walk away, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我猜猜 - 这是你试图说服我离开的计划的一部分，对不对？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no. We're {emphasizing 'well'}well past that, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不是。我们{emphasizing 'well'}好过那个，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015279_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm new to the Mojave, so I've made it a priority to familiarize myself with the history, politics... the players. Somehow your name keeps coming up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我新到莫哈维，所以我得优先考虑使自己熟悉它的历史，政治...和参与者。不知怎么的你的名字不断出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015279_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been wanting to meet you for some time, really. It's another reason I didn't gas you in that vault. It would've been unseemly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上我一直想要见你。这是我没有在避难所放毒气有另一个原因。这似乎不太得体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015279_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew that cowing you would be a challenge. Odds were that you would show up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道威胁将会使你成为一个挑战。显然你极有可能来到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015279_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was looking forward to this... a worthy opponent, an opportunity to make my own name, while letting you pass... with dignity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很期待这场比试...一个相称的对手，一个让我的名字盖过你的机会...还有尊严。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015279_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who would cross "The man who killed Courier Six?" Has a ring to it, like one of those pre-war Western films.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁会错过“那家伙杀死了六号信使”这个光环呢，这简直就像那些战前的西部电影。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015279_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are truly a disappointment. Here I was, ready to hold a lengthy conversation with the legendary Courier Six.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确实很沮丧。我在这里，为传奇的六号信使准备了一个漫长的对话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001527A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I even had the boys clean this place up, thinking you might show up. And here you are, and you can't even summon a response.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至让那些孩子们清洗了这个地方，考虑到你可能的演出。而你来到这里，但你甚至不能鼓起勇气勇敢的响应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001527A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny how rumors depart from reality. I heard you were a loquacious sort - a convenient lie. You'll just have to be content listening to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的是谣言始于事实。我听说你是一个健谈的人 - 一个方便的谎言。你只是不得不知足于听我说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001527A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm new to the Mojave, so I've made it a priority to familiarize myself with the history, politics... the players. Somehow your name keeps coming up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我新到莫哈维，所以我得优先考虑使自己熟悉它的历史，政治...和参与者。不知怎么的你的名字不断出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001527A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been wanting to meet you for some time, really. It's another reason I didn't gas you in that vault. It would've been unseemly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上我一直想要见你。这是我没有在避难所放毒气有另一个原因。这似乎不太得体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew that cowing you would be a challenge. Odds were that you would show up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道威胁将会使你成为一个挑战。显然你极有可能来到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001527A_6.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我很期待这场比试...一个相称的对手，一个让我的名字盖过你的机会...还有尊严。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are we even talking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们还在说话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm new to the Mojave, so I've made it a priority to familiarize myself with the history, politics... the players. Somehow your name keeps coming up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我新到莫哈维，所以我得优先考虑使自己熟悉它的历史，政治...和参与者。不知怎么的你的名字不断出现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, the mythical Courier is an imbecile. I've got to start lowering my expectations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，神秘的信使是个低能儿。我要开始降低我的期望了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, my employer has rewarded me for my service to the organization... I've done well. It's interesting what people do with wealth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我的老板因我对组织的贡献而奖赏我...我做的很好。有趣的是人们在面对财富的时候会做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some invest... others blow it on booze, pussy, passing pleasure. Me... I buy implants. Not comfortable going in, but {emphasizing "so good"}so good once they're settled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人投资...其他人挥霍在痛饮，性交，稍纵即逝的快乐上。而我...我买了植入体。这不太舒服，但是一旦它们安置好了后，那感觉{emphasizing "so good"}很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of my implants regulates cardiovascular performance, and it's been tweaked, for a specific purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的一个植入体用来调节心血管的性能，而它现在开足了马力，为了一个特殊的目的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I have it activated, it can operate as a sort of fail-deadly switch, connected to explosives and what not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我使它处于激活的时候，它将像一种失败即死亡的开关那样运作，连接着炸药之类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incidentally, I have the loot surrounded by high explosives. If I die, my implant will trigger enough C4 to bury every lick of gold in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺带说一嘴，我把高爆炸药放在了战利品的周围。如果我死了，我的植入体会触发足够量的C4来埋葬在那里的每一个金条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you don't care about the gold, and that's fine. But if you do, then listen closely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在也许你不在意那些黄金，那就没事。但是如果你做了，然后靠近一点听听吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528D_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will turn off my implant's signal if you agree to fight me on my terms - with a katana. If you win, then you get the gold. Otherwise... nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你同意以我的方式 - 拿一把武士刀进行战斗，那我将会关闭我的植入体信号。如果你赢了，那么你就会获得那些黄金。否则...一无所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528D_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's always nice to meet a fan. Can we get on with this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，见到一个爱好者通常很值得高兴。我们可以用这个吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... your organization... mean *nothing* to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...和你的组织... 对我来说*什么都不是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Deeply sarcastic}Now that's cutting deep, Courier. You've wounded me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Deeply sarcastic}由于砍的很深，邮差。你使我受伤了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This meeting has been such... a letdown. I was expecting so much more from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次会面太令人...失望了。我曾对你有很高的期望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed worse than you, Zimmer. You think you're tougher than the Judge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀过比你更坏的人，吉玛。你认为你比审判者更强吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! I heard that story. The Judge... so you killed that towering pervert, good for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！我听过那个故事。审判者...所以你杀死了那个卓越的变态，做的不错嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The honorable Judge Richter, who spent his days frolicking with slave boys, playing "Guess what's under Uncle Touchy's top hat." Hardly impressive!
ESP.TRADUIT: 高贵的审判者里克特，整天与奴隶男孩们作乐，玩“猜猜敏感大叔的大礼帽下有什么”的游戏。简直难以置信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, that old pederass was past his prime. Who else? Fiends? Local Tough guys? I doubt you broke a sweat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，那个老同性恋过了他的壮年期，还有谁？军团？当地的硬汉？我猜你忙的一身汗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, my employer has rewarded me for my service to the organization... I've done well. It's interesting what people do with wealth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我的老板因我对组织的贡献而奖赏我...我做的很好。有趣的是人们在面对财富的时候会做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some invest... others blow it on booze, pussy, passing pleasure. Me... I buy implants. Not comfortable going in, but {emphasizing "so good"}so good once they're settled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人投资...其他人挥霍在痛饮，性交，稍纵即逝的快乐上。而我...我买了植入体。这不太舒服，但是一旦它们安置好了后，那感觉{emphasizing "so good"}很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of my implants regulates cardiovascular performance, and it's been tweaked, for a specific purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的一个植入体用来调节心血管的性能，而它现在开足了马力，为了一个特殊的目的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I have it activated, it can operate as a sort of fail-deadly switch, connected to explosives and what not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我使它处于激活的时候，它将像一种失败即死亡的开关那样运作，连接着炸药之类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incidentally, I have the loot surrounded by high explosives. If I die, my implant will trigger enough C4 to bury every lick of gold in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺带说一嘴，我把高爆炸药放在了战利品的周围。如果我死了，我的植入体会触发足够量的C4来埋葬在那里的每一个金条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you don't care about the gold, and that's fine. But if you do, then listen closely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在也许你不在意那些黄金，那就没事。但是如果你做了，然后靠近一点听听吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will turn off my implant's signal if you agree to fight me on my terms - with a katana. If you win, then you get the gold. Otherwise... nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你同意以我的方式 - 拿一把武士刀进行战斗，那我将会关闭我的植入体信号。如果你赢了，那么你就会获得那些黄金。否则...一无所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015285_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You certainly went to a lot of trouble to get me down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定弄了很多麻烦令我生气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps, but I think it was worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许，但我认为这是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015284_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我的老板因我对组织的贡献而奖赏我...我做的很好。有趣的是人们在面对财富的时候会做什么。

ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人投资...其他人挥霍在痛饮，性交，稍纵即逝的快乐上。而我...我买了植入体。这不太舒服，但是一旦它们安置好了后，那感觉{emphasizing "so good"}很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to kill me, why haven't you made your move?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想杀我，为什么你不付诸行动呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think too little of me. At the very least, I wanted to give a proper introduction... look you in the eyes before I do you in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太小看我了。起码有一点，我会给出一个适当的引言...在我做那些之前用你的眼睛看着吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001528C_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你同意以我的方式 - 拿一把武士刀进行战斗，那我将会关闭我的植入体信号。如果你赢了，那么你就会获得那些黄金。否则...一无所有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you keep saying "My Employer?" Just say his name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你坚持说“我的老板”？说出他的名字吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I call him "My Employer" because to say his name is forbidden - an offense punishable by death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我称他为“我的老板”是因为他的名字被禁止说出 - 冒犯的处罚是死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015577_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am personally acquainted with him. He trained me in the exquisite art of the samurai sword. I am his greatest pupil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我个人十分了解他。他用那精美的武士刀训练我。我是他最好的学生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015577_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cocksucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001557D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaZimmerFaction playerfaction aaZimmerRef.startcombat playerref
This ain't feudal Japan, and you ain't Musashi. I'm going to cut your goddamn head off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是封建时期的日本，而你也不是宫本武藏。我他妈的要砍下你的脑袋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have exceeded my expectations. I'll store your weapons in a nearby locker. I've got the key on my person, in the off chance you best me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经超过了我的预期。我会把你的武器藏在旁边的锁柜里。我将随身携带锁柜的钥匙，你几乎不可能打败我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015574_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be using this katana. Let's go somewhere with a little more room...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会使用这把武士刀的。让我们去更大一点的地方玩一玩...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015574_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX aaDuelingLockerRef.enable player.RemoveAllTypedItems aaDuelingLockerRef 1 0 40 playerref.moveto aaPlayerDuelMarkerRef aaZimmerRef.moveto aaZimmerPreDuelMarkerRef player.additem NVDLC05WeapKatanaCustom 1 100 player.equipitem NVDLC05WeapKatanaCustom 0 1 set aaInheritance01.DuelStarted to 1 aaZimmerRef.evp
Fine, I'll fight you on your terms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会按照你的方式打败你...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I'll store your weapons in a nearby locker. I've got the key on my person, in the off chance you best me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我会把你的武器放在附近的锁柜里。我将随身携带锁柜钥匙，你几乎不可能打败我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015573_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be using this katana. Let's go somewhere with a little more room...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会使用这把武士刀的。让我们去更大一点的地方玩一玩...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015573_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX aaDuelingLockerRef.enable player.RemoveAllTypedItems aaDuelingLockerRef 1 0 40 playerref.moveto aaPlayerDuelMarkerRef aaZimmerRef.moveto aaZimmerPreDuelMarkerRef player.additem NVDLC05WeapKatanaCustom 1 100 player.equipitem NVDLC05WeapKatanaCustom 0 1 set aaInheritance01.DuelStarted to 1 aaZimmerRef.evp
I don't care about the money. I just want to watch you bleed out. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎那些钱。我只是想看你流血而死。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then by all means, let the bleeding begin!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么尽一切办法，让鲜血开始流淌吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015572_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaZimmerFaction playerfaction aaZimmerRef.startcombat playerref
You and your employer can fuck yourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和你的雇主可以相互干自己了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wrong answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 错误答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001557A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaZimmerFaction playerfaction aaZimmerRef.startcombat playerref
aaInheritance01ZimmerFINALESpeech
You know what would happen to me? My employer would kill my entire family... if I had one. This thing, it's all I've got. I don't have anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那样的话什么事情将会发生在我身上吗？我的老板会杀死我全家...如果我有的话。这些是我拥有的一切。我没有其他的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015575_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I do need to start over, turn away from it. I can't go back to Reno. Maybe I'll go south.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我需要重新开始，放弃这种生活。我不能回到里诺。或许我会去南方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015575_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this. I won't need it where I'm going. Sayonara, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，拿着这个。无论我去哪里我都不再需要它了。*撒有那拉*（再见），邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015575_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritance01 190 showmessage aaZimmerLeftMessage aaZimmerRef.disable player.additem aaZimmerKatana 1 100 player.additem aaZimmerKey 1
The Mojave is a dead end for you. Your only choice is to walk away - leave this life behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维是你生命的尽头。你只能选择离开 - 远离这种生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we could... but action... feels so much better than words right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们会...但是行动...现在体会比语言更强烈的感受吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001557B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk this out. Maybe we can reach an agreement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈这个。也许我们能达成共识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01ZimmerFINALEIntelligence
Do you know how many self-proclaimed badasses I've killed? How are you any different?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我杀死了多少自命不凡的混蛋吗？而你和他们有什么不同？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not afraid to die, Courier. I respect God, but I don't count on his help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不害怕死亡，邮差。我尊重上帝，但我不指望他的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know my end, and I'm at peace with it. The real question is whether or not you realize where you're headed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白我的结局，而我会很平静的接受它。真正的问题是你是否意识到你的方向所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter how many badasses you kill, how tough you think you are. One day you'll make a mistake, be negligent, or just get old.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀死了多少混蛋并不重要，你以为你有多强壮。总有一天你会犯错误，也行是粗心大意，也行仅仅只是老了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like reading old books, pre-war stuff. Ever heard of Bill Hickock? Killed all sorts of people in his day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢读老书，战前的东西。听过比尔希科克吗？他每天都要杀死各种类型的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how he died? It wasn't some grand duel in the street, an epic showdown with a worthy opponent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他是怎么死的吗？不是在街头的大绝杀，不是跟一个值得尊敬的对手进行一次史诗般的对决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some dreg, a bottom-feeding asshole, just walked into a saloon and popped Hickock in the back of the head. Payback for killing his brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是某个渣滓，一个生活在底层的混蛋，仅仅只是走进一个酒吧然后突然暴起偷袭了希科克的后脑勺。报了杀弟之仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're lucky, Courier... you'll die here, with a sword in your hand, killed by a proper foe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你够幸运，邮差...你会死在这里，被一个合适的敌人用你手上的刀杀死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might get old, die in your bed. But more than likely some punk will wait until you're drunk, high, or just distracted. Then they'll strike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会变老，死在你的床上。但是更可能是某些废物等你喝醉之后，嗑药嗨了之后，或者仅仅只是走神。然后他们将会袭击你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A warrior's death is the best you can hope for, and I'm offering it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个战士的死亡是你所能期待的最好的结局，而我会提供给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015579_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01ZimmerStartDuel
Defend yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保护好你自己吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00015580_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.DuelStarted to 2 setenemy aaZimmerFaction playerfaction aaZimmerRef.startcombat playerref
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll assume that is the sound of due rumination, and that your consent is implicit. Though, I don't care if you consent or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会认为这是沉思的声音，并且那表示你默认了。不过，我不关心你同意与否。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ChoseCut to 1
setobjectivedisplayed aaInheritance01 70 1 aaBradleyRef.setalert 1 aaBradleyRef.StartConversation playerref, aaInheritance01BradleyHubChoseCut
I'm not going to participate in your twisted contest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想参与你那扭曲的争论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something tells me Bradley might feel differently. Nothing like that survival instinct to alter someone's character.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜布拉德利会有不同的感受。没有什么像求生本能那样改变一个人的性格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye, Courier. I trust we'll never speak of this again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，邮差。我相信我们再也不会谈论这个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166F6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ChoseCut to 1
setobjectivedisplayed aaInheritance01 70 1 aaBradleyRef.setalert 1 aaBradleyRef.StartConversation playerref, aaInheritance01BradleyHubChoseCut
I'm going to eat your fucking heart, you sniveling cunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的将会吃掉你的心脏，你这哭哭啼啼的婊子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, Courier. I've got a Fiend up here with delicate sensibilities. We wouldn't want to offend him, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单，邮差。我带来了一个新鲜可口的恶魔帮成员来这里。我们不会想因起他的不快，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00016702_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you save all that aggression and angst for Mr. Bradley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你不节省下精力然后担心下布拉德利先生呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00016702_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritance01.ChoseCut to 1
setobjectivedisplayed aaInheritance01 70 1 aaBradleyRef.setalert 1 aaBradleyRef.StartConversation playerref, aaInheritance01BradleyHubChoseCut
I'm sorry too, Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很抱歉，布拉德利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you on the other side, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在另一边看到你的，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LoosettnpcSadArmsCrossedTalkA
setenemy aaBradleyFaction PlayerFaction aaBradleyRef.startcombat playerref
Let's do this. I'm sick of hearing you whine like a little bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放手一搏吧。我厌恶你像个小贱人一样抱怨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just made this a lot easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让事情变得简单多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00016700_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseMiddleFinger
setenemy aaBradleyFaction PlayerFaction aaBradleyRef.startcombat playerref
That's goddamn right. I'm going out on my terms. Just promise me you'll reckon with these fucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的好吧。我会离开我的队伍。只不过答应我，你会找这些混蛋算账的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00016701_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was saving this Mother Darkness for a special occasion. Seems like as good a time as any. See you around, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在一个特别的时刻拯救了这个表演者。看起来是个不错的时刻。再见了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00016701_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseNPCTaking
aaBradleyRef.playidle DukovDrinkStand03 aaBradleyRef.additem MotherDarkness 1 aaBradleyRef.kill aaBradleyRef.kill
Don't do this, Bradley. He wants us to fight like caged animals. We're better than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这样，布拉德利。他想要我们像困兽那样战斗。我们的情况会有好转的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not going to get gassed like a fucking insect. I'd rather go out with a weapon in my hands. Sorry, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不想像他妈的虫子那样被毒死。我更倾向于靠我手上的武器出去。对不起了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00016703_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put down the weapon, Bradley. We can find a way out of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放下武器，布拉德利。我们会找到一条出路的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Reputation Check>
Listen to me. That fuck on the intercom wants us to fight like gladiators, dogs... I won't give him the satisfaction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我说，对讲机那边的狗屎想我们战斗，就像角斗士，狗那样...我不会让他如愿的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... after everything I've done, I've got it coming. You can do this... no, you have to do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是....在我们做完所有的事情之后，我们得面对它，你可以这么做...不，你不得不这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166FF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just promise me... swear... that you'll settle with these fucks. You'll do that, won't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只不过答应我...发誓....你会跟这些混蛋做个了解。你会那样做的，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166FF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do it before I change my mind. I'll see you on the other side, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我改变心意之前你这样做吧。我会在另一边看着你，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166FF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.setalert 0 aaBradleyRef.setrestrained 1 aaBradleyRef.setav health 25 aaBradleyRef.setav aggression 0 set aaInheritance01.BradleyPassive to 1
[Reputation] I'm not going to do this, Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: [声望]我不想这样，布拉德利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you on the other side, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在另一边看到你的，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000172B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaBradleyFaction PlayerFaction aaBradleyRef.startcombat playerref
Let's get this over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们把这事了结。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a cold fuck, aren't you? Goodbye, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个冷酷的混蛋，不是吗？再见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000166FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaBradleyFaction PlayerFaction aaBradleyRef.startcombat playerref
I'm here because of what you did to Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里是因为你对布拉德利对的那些事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I did? It's fair to say that you did the... doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了什么？公平的说，是你做了...那些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zimmer [030103B5] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaZimmerVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_00016705_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... we can flip a coin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...我们可以掷硬币决定？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty fucking twisted, but that makes the most sense right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是相当的别扭，但是现在这很有意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000172B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always kept a Legion Denarius in my pocket, thinking it was good luck. Never thought it would be used like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总是在我的口袋里带着一个军团银币，认为它会带来好运。我绝没有想到它会用来做这种事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000172B7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Call it. Heads or tails?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要什么。正面还是背面？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_000172B7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see...
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's ugly mug... I should've know it would screw me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒丑陋的脸...我早该该知道它会欺负我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you can't abide a coin toss, I suppose nothing is sacred. At least that laughing fucker won't get the pleasure of watching us fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你不能忍受一枚硬币，那我想没什么是神圣的了。至少那可笑的混蛋不会在围观我们战斗而获得快感了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you do, just promise me you'll reckon with them. We didn't deserve this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不论你做什么，只不过答应我你将会解决掉他们。这不是我们应受的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was saving this Mother Darkness for a special occasion. Seems like as good a time as any. See you around, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在一个特别的时刻拯救了这个表演者。看起来是个不错的时刻。再见了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BA_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseNPCTaking
aaBradleyRef.playidle DukovDrinkStand03 aaBradleyRef.additem MotherDarkness 1 aaBradleyRef.kill
Tails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 背面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see...
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it's the three stooges. I should've known they would fuck me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是三个小丑。我早该知道他们会很操蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you can't abide a coin toss, I suppose nothing is sacred. At least that laughing fucker won't get the pleasure of watching us fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你不能忍受一枚硬币，那我想没什么是神圣的了。至少那可笑的混蛋不会在围观我们战斗而获得快感了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you do, just promise me you'll reckon with them. We didn't deserve this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不论你做什么，只不过答应我你将会解决掉他们。这不是我们应受的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was saving this Mother Darkness for a special occasion. Seems like as good a time as any. See you around, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在一个特别的时刻拯救了这个表演者。看起来是个不错的时刻。再见了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaINheritance01_000172BB_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.playidle LooseNPCTaking
aaBradleyRef.playidle DukovDrinkStand03 aaBradleyRef.additem MotherDarkness 1 aaBradleyRef.kill aaBradleyRef.kill
Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome. Have a great day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎你。祝你度过愉快的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03019677] (mod) Quest : ([03019675]aaInheritancePost02) Encounter: Courier with Revenge Letter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00019681_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaRevenge01Note 1
set aaInheritancePost02.LetterGiven to 1 aaBadNewsCourier01Ref.addscriptpackage aaCourier01ReturnPackage aaBadNewsCourier01Ref.evp
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... have a nice day?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...过得愉快吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03019677] (mod) Quest : ([03019675]aaInheritancePost02) Encounter: Courier with Revenge Letter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00019682_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaRevenge01Note 1
set aaInheritancePost02.LetterGiven to 1 aaBadNewsCourier01Ref.addscriptpackage aaCourier01ReturnPackage aaBadNewsCourier01Ref.evp
Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚蛋吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't get paid enough for this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所获得的酬劳不足以支付这个狗屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03019677] (mod) Quest : ([03019675]aaInheritancePost02) Encounter: Courier with Revenge Letter EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00019683_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaRevenge01Note 1
set aaInheritancePost02.LetterGiven to 1 aaBadNewsCourier01Ref.addscriptpackage aaCourier01ReturnPackage aaBadNewsCourier01Ref.evp
aaInheritancePost04FelixGreetPlayer01
What message?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My employer says that the initial harassers were just the first, designed to test you. I am here... to end you. To end this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的老板说那些最初的骚扰者仅仅只是开始，目的是为了测试你。我在这里...是为了解决你。解决这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B64F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will return your head to him, and it will be mounted on the wall... a trophy to the futility of defiance. That is my message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会带着你的脑袋去见他，并且将摆放在墙上...一个作为徒劳抵抗的战利品。这就是我的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B64F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to rip your guts out and put them in a briefcase. Then I'll deliver it to your boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将会撕开你的内脏然后放在公文包里。然后我会邮递给你的老板。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesucristo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 基督为你你哀悼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B649_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaFelixFaction playerfaction aaFelixCortezRef.startcombat player aaFelixCortezRef.CIOS TerrifyingPresenceSpell aaFelixThug01Ref.CIOS TerrifyingPresenceSpell aaFelixThug02Ref.CIOS TerrifyingPresenceSpell
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Smug}My employer says that the initial... harassers... were just the first, designed to test you. I am here... to end you. To end this.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Smug}我的老板说那些最初...的骚扰者...仅仅只是开始，目的是为了测试你。我在这里...是为了解决你。解决这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B651_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will return your head to him, and it will be mounted on the wall... a trophy to the futility of defiance. That is my message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会带着你的脑袋去见他，并且将摆放在墙上...一个作为徒劳抵抗的战利品。这就是我的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B651_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Taunt] Chinga te, pendejo.
ESP.TRADUIT: [嘲弄] Chinga te, pendejo.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFelixCortezRef.modav health 500 aaFelixCortezRef.modav unarmed 100 aaFelixThug01Ref.modav health 250 aaFelixThug02Ref.modav health 250 setenemy aaFelixFaction playerfaction aaFelixCortezRef.startcombat player
I'm getting tired of this. How many of you do I have to kill to end this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对此感到厌烦。我需要杀死你们多少人来结束这一切？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will only take a moment, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只需要花一点时间，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B650_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My employer says that the initial harassers were just the first, designed to test you. I am here... to end you. To end this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的老板说那些最初的骚扰者仅仅只是开始，目的是为了测试你。我在这里...是为了解决你。解决这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B650_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will return your head to him, and it will be mounted on the wall... a trophy to the futility of defiance. That is my message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会带着你的脑袋去见他，并且将摆放在墙上...一个作为徒劳抵抗的战利品。这就是我的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B650_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B653_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prepare to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好去死了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B653_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the only one delivering messages around here, asshole. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只带来一个消息，混蛋。<攻击>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaFelixFaction playerfaction aaFelixCortezRef.startcombat player
Can we get this over with? <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以开始了吗？<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gladly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乐意如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix Cortez [0301B352] (mod) Quest : ([0301B074]aaInheritancePost04) Encounter: Syndicate Assassins, Wave II EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult02\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001B655_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaFelixFaction playerfaction aaFelixCortezRef.startcombat player
Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome. Have a good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不客气。祝你度过愉快的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0301D0C9] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0D2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost05.MessageSent to 2 aaCourier02Ref.evp setstage aaInheritancePost05 5
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <The courier glares at you>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使向你怒目而视>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0301D0C9] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost05.MessageSent to 2 aaCourier02Ref.evp setstage aaInheritancePost05 5
Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚蛋吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right back at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼此彼此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0301D0C9] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0D1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCourier02Ref.playidle loosemiddlefinger
set aaInheritancePost05.MessageSent to 2 aaCourier02Ref.evp setstage aaInheritancePost05 5
To hell with this. You need to learn to solve your own problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼去吧。你需要学学怎么解决你自己的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd throw away a boy's life, just on some selfish impulse? What the hell is wrong with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让一个小男孩失去了生命，仅仅只是因为自私的冲动？你他妈的是不是有点毛病？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D6C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of my sight, you worthless cunt. Westside is better off without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开我的视线，你这卑贱的婊子。西区没有你会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D6C1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost05 200 rewardkarma -100
You'd throw away a boy's life, just on some selfish impulse? What the hell is wrong with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让一个小男孩失去了生命，仅仅只是因为自私的冲动？你他妈的是不是有点毛病？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of my sight, you worthless cunt. Westside is better off without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开我的视线，你这卑贱的婊子。西区没有你会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost05 200 rewardkarma -100 player.removeitem caps001 5000
Wait, they want 50,000 caps from me? That's my money!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，他们要我拿出5,000个瓶盖？这可是我的钱！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No shit. Look, we've been trying to get donations from the citizens, and we've managed to get some caps for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别废话了。瞧，我们一直在尝试从居民那里获得捐款，而且已经设法为你弄了点瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not much, but it should help ease the burden on your pockets. We want you to know that we're with you in this, it ain't just your problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不太多，但是可以减轻你的钱包负担。我们想让你明白我们跟你一起处理这件事，这不仅仅是你的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are my options?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有哪些选择？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even think about going in there like some gunslinging cowboy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别想着像带枪的牛仔那样去那儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a hair-trigger bunch of lunatics led by some cannibal, calls himself Chester. {Ruminates momentarily}Chester... even the name sounds twisted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这群易怒的食人族以一个疯子为首，他叫做切斯特。{Ruminates momentarily}切斯特...甚至名字听起来都很扭曲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say that you are to show up with 50,000 caps in hand, no questions asked. If you show up with 49,999, they kill the kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们声称你要无条件的带着50,000瓶盖。如果你只带了49,999个瓶盖，他们就会杀死孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you try to ninja your ass in there, they'll blow the kid to high hell. It's a thick shit sandwich, and you're going to have to bite into it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你尝试潜进那里，他们将会让那孩子下地狱。就像一个该死的厚厚的三明治，并且你将不得不啃掉它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd say show up with the caps, but see if you can talk out a compromise, maybe even get them to release the kid for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想告诉你拿出瓶盖，但是如果你们能谈妥，也许能让他们放了那孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're crazier than ever, but they were starting to thin out. The problem with paying is that they'll use those caps to buy dope and get re-armed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们愚蠢更甚从前，但他们开始变得势单力薄。赎金的关键问题是，他们将会用那些瓶盖去买麻醉剂并会再次武装起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DD_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the damnable thing, Courier. Everyone wants to see that child returned safely, but goddamn, if the Fiends get that kind of money...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那简直是灾难，邮差。所有人都想看到那个孩子平安回归，但是该死的，如果那些恶魔帮狗屎们得到那笔钱...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DD_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'd squeeze the life out of Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会在西区横行霸道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0DD_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why isn't the militia doing anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么那些民兵不做点什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen the militia? They're useless enough as it is, but you expect them to undertake a hostage rescue? They're not rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过民兵了吗？事实上他们不够有用，而你希望他们承担起拯救一个人质的责任？他们不是游骑兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我做就是了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. Just remember one thing - do not show up without the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。只是要记住一件事 - 没有瓶盖不要露面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D6C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those junkies are paranoid enough when they're strung out, but right now they're out of their minds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些吸毒者在吸毒的时候显得偏执，但是现在他们已经失去了理智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D6C0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't deliver, they'll probably assume it's a trap. Please, just do everything in your power to keep that boy alive. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不支付赎金，他们很可能会认为这是一个陷阱。拜托了，尽全力保住那个孩子的生命。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D6C0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost05 10
Did you just imply that I shouldn't pay the ransom?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是指我支付不了赎金？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm telling you to do everything you can to save that boy, but remember what's at stake if those Fiends get the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我只是告诉你做任何能拯救那个男孩的事，不过是让你记住恶魔帮是否拿到钱是很要紧的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E259_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I'll put them to good use. <Take the caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，我会好好利用它们的。<拿走瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is everything we have, Courier. Please make sure that boy is safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们拥有的全部，邮差。请确保那个小男孩的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 5000 set aaInheritancePost05.CapsTaken to 1
Tell the citizens thank you, but keep the caps. I'll cover the cost myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 替我转告那些居民谢谢他们，不过你们留着这些瓶盖吧。我会自己支付的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's... that's very large of you, Courier. None of us expected you to carry the burden yourself. This will help us more than you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...那对你来说是一大笔钱，邮差。我们都没期望你独自承担。这对我们的帮助超出你的想象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D0E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardKarma 100
Alright, here are the caps. <Give 50,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，这是瓶盖。<支付50,000瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈不错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you better tell those Westside bitches that next time we won't be so patient. Kid's in the next room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你最好告诉那些西区狗屎们下次我们不会这么有耐心。孩子在隔壁的屋子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't think about trying anything while we ease out of here. That detonator has a longer range than you think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们悄悄的离开这里的时候不要尝试做任何事情。那个雷管的有个超出你想象的长导线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Otherwise, it's been a pleasure doing business with you. C'mon boys, we're about to go on a little shopping spree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，跟你做交易真是不错。来吧，小子们，我们接着去来一次小小的购物狂欢吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 50000 aaChesterRef.disable showmessage aaFiendLeaveMessage setstage aaInheritancePost05 15 set aaInheritancePost05.ChesterPaid to 1
aaInheritancePost05ChesterCharisma
Bullshit. The Fiends are stronger than ever. Nobody fucks with us. Now give me the fucking caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说。恶魔帮的强大更甚从前。没人能搞定我们。现在他妈的把瓶盖给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E261_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holding kids for ransom... seems like the Fiends are desperate these days, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 挟持孩子要赎金...说明恶魔帮这段时间已经孤注一掷了吧，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Surprised, uneasy}What? That's bullshit, you're talking right out of your ass. I never heard anything like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Surprised, uneasy}什么？那简直是胡说，你是用你的屁股说话吧。我之前从未听说过这些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E262_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurting kids is going to make the NCR double down on you. Do you really want bounty hunters around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 伤害孩子使你在NCR的悬赏提高到了两倍。你真的想让赏金猎人跟着你吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost05ChesterSpeech
That was a bounty hunter? Look, I just want to get high, I don't want that kind of drama.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会出现赏金猎人？瞧，我只是想要过把毒瘾。我不想要那种结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E263_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, we'll let the kid go. Just tell them... tell them it was a mix-up. We don't want no fucking bounties on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我们会放那孩子走。只不过告诉他们...告诉他们这是一个误会。我们他妈的不想悬赏缠身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E263_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid's in the next room, safe and sound. Uh, we better get going, I've got some, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子在隔壁的屋子里，平安无事。额，我们离开比较好。我尽快，额...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E263_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaChesterRef.disable showmessage aaFiendLeaveMessage setstage aaInheritancePost05 15 set aaInheritancePost05.FiendsTalked to 1
Motor-Runner and the rest are dead. Hurt that child and the next bounty will be on your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摩托手和其他人都死了。你伤害孩子那下一次悬赏将会是你的脑袋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's always somebody else willing to step up, they were just weak. With this cash, It's gonna be my time to shine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有人会先行一步，只不过是他们太次。有了这份赎金，这将会是我大放光彩的时刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E264_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your leaders are all dead. Can't you see that the Fiends are finished?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的首领已经死光了。难道你看不见恶魔帮完了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost05ChesterBarter
That's fucking crazy! They're like family, why... you know... actually, they are pretty goddamn shitty, aren't they? Ok, let's make 25k.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太他妈的的疯狂了！这是个大家庭，为什么...你知道...事实上，他们是一堆相当令人厌恶的狗屎，不是吗？好吧，让我们改成25,000个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 25000 aaChesterRef.disable showmessage aaFiendLeaveMessage setstage aaInheritancePost05 15 set aaInheritancePost05.ChesterPaid to 1
If you walk out of here with 50,000 caps, the other Fiends will eat you alive to get a share of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你带着这50,000瓶盖走了，其他的恶魔帮成员将会生吞了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you not to fuck with us on the exchange. I won't warn you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我劝你他妈的不要在交易上耍把戏。我不想再警告你一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, can't we work out a payment plan or something? Let's put the kid on layaway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，为什么我们不制定一个交付计划什么的呢？把孩子放出来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have enough caps to pay the ransom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有足够的瓶盖支付赎金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I know what you're doing... this is some kind of a setup, isn't it? Well fuck that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我知道你在做什么...这是某种计划，对吗？真操蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D3E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
setenemy aaChesterFaction playerfaction aaChesterRef.startcombat playerref aaChrisBurkeRef.disable aaKidGibParentRef.enable aaChrisBurkeDeadRef.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion setstage aaInheritancePost05 200
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 28 endif
I didn't come here to negotiate. I came here to make you bleed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来这里谈判的。我来这里是为了让你流血。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looky here boys, we got ourselves a badass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小伙子们看看这里，我们遇到了一个坏蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001D3D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
setenemy aaChesterFaction playerfaction aaChesterRef.startcombat playerref aaChrisBurkeRef.disable aaKidGibParentRef.enable aaChrisBurkeDeadRef.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion setstage aaInheritancePost05 200
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 28 endif
I'm not paying the ransom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会支付赎金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I ain't about to let you live. How about them apples, bitch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我不会让你活着的。这些苹果怎么样，婊子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chester [0301D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E25F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
setenemy aaChesterFaction playerfaction aaChesterRef.startcombat playerref aaChrisBurkeRef.disable aaKidGibParentRef.enable aaChrisBurkeDeadRef.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion setstage aaInheritancePost05 200
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 28 endif
<Free him>
ESP.TRADUIT: <释放他>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Burke [0301D0C7] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaChrisBurkeRef.SetRestrained 0 set aaInheritancePost05.KidSaved to 1 aaChrisBurkeRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost05 20
<Do Nothing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <不做任何事>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Burke [0301D0C7] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I paid the ransom and the kid is safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我支付了赎金，孩子安全了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell of a thing you did, putting up that money for little Chris. I want you to know that all of Westside appreciates it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是做了一件好事，赎回了小克里斯。我想告诉你全西区的人都感激你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E26E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And don't you worry about Chris. We take care of our own. He's a touch quiet, but I think he'll be fine. Kids can be really resilient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不用担心克里斯。我们会自己搞定。他受了惊吓，但是我相信他会好起来的。孩子们很有复原能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E26E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish there were more like you, courier. I can't offer you money, but I do have a little something the Syndicate goons left behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望更多像你这样的人，邮差。我不能为你提供金钱，但是我有一点那些辛迪加暴徒留下的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E26E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was considering pawning it off, but I think you'd get better use out of it. You take care of yourself, Courier. We won't forget you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我考虑把这个作为替换，不过我认为你最好用不上它。你自己小心，邮差。我们不会忘了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E26E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost05 190 player.additem aaShotgunLupara 1 75
I paid the ransom and the kid is safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我支付了赎金，孩子安全了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fiends? Talked down? You aren't doing Jet, are you? Hell, that's better than I expected. You're really something special, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮？说完了吗？你没有吸杰特，不是吗？该死的，这比我想象中的要好。你确实比较特别，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E26F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to know that all of Westside appreciates it. We don't know how you did it, but you did it nonetheless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你知道，西区所有的人都感激你。我们不知道你是怎么办到的，然而你确实是办到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom

ESP.ORIGINAL: And don't you worry about Chris. We take care of our own. He's a touch quiet, but I think he'll be fine. Kids can be really resilient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不用担心克里斯。我们会自己搞定。他受了惊吓，但是我相信他会好起来的。孩子们很有复原能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E26F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish there were more like you, courier. I can't offer you money, but I do have a little something the Syndicate goons left behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望更多像你这样的人，邮差。我不能为你提供金钱，但是我有一点那些辛迪加暴徒留下的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E26F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was considering pawning it off, but I think you'd get better use out of it. You take care of yourself, Courier. We won't forget you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我考虑把这个作为替换，不过我认为你最好用不上它。你自己小心，邮差。我们不会忘了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Heinz [0301D0A2] (mod) Quest : ([0301CD46]aaInheritancePost05) Fiend's Ransom EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult10\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0001E26F_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost05 190 player.additem aaShotgunLupara 1 75
I want to ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想询问你一些事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_0001EDF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sean Bradley. Never had a middle name, and after my time in the service I didn't have much use for the first one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肖恩·布拉德利。我没有中间名，而在我服役之后我就不怎么用第一个名字了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I best make use of your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么才能最有效的利用你的技能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a rifleman by trade, so I fight best from a distance. I'm also trained in hand-to-hand, groundfighting and what not. I Never used knives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个职业枪手，所以我更擅长远距离作战。我通常进行进行白刃战，阵地战而不是其他。我从来不用刀子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMakeUse_00020250_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Craziest thing was when I got caught unarmed by a feral ghoul, big motherfucker. He tried to rip my throat out, so I applied a triangle choke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最疯狂的是当我徒手面对一个凶猛的僵尸的时候，真操蛋。他想要撕裂我的喉咙，所以我用了一个三角架来应付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMakeUse_00020250_2.ogg
