ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, it worked... but rest assured you don't want a feral's gaping maw that close to your balls. Guns are... so much better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，这有用...但是放心你不会想看见一个僵尸的血盆大口靠近你的脑袋。枪械会...更有效的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMakeUse_00020250_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Reno... it's one hell of a town. Maybe not as big as Vegas, but damn it's wild.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新里诺...是一个地狱般的城市。或许没有维加斯大，但是相当的疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWhereAr_0001FF69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I miss it, even with the drama between the families. Not sure if I'll ever get to go back, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想念它，尽管那是那些家族的舞台。不过，我不太确定我是否要回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWhereAr_0001FF69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up in New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么来新维加斯的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned time in the service. Why did you leave the military?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到在服役期间。为什么你离开了军队？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let's just say I had an abrupt and unceremonious departure from the NCR's armed forces. Leave it at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我只是想说在NCR军队中我总是很唐突并且随便。暂停讨论吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWhyNoMi_0001FF6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, this vocation affords a bit more freedom than one enjoys as a grunt, not to mention the pay - there's no comparison.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，这个行业与当兵相比有更多的自由，更不用说薪水了 - 这没得比。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWhyNoMi_0001FF6D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was it like growing up in Reno?
ESP.TRADUIT: 新里诺怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mom died when I was... four or five. After that I was on my own, living on the streets for a few years. I wouldn't wish that on anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的母亲在我...四五岁的时候死了。之后，我在街头独自生存了好几年。没有任何人希望过那种生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I developed a talent for pickpocketing tourists, and that got me by till I was about nine or so. Then one day I pickpocketed the wrong guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我学会了以偷窃维生，直到我9岁左右的时候，我向一个不该扒窃的家伙下了手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a made man, one of the Mordinos. Caught me going after his pocket watch. Damn near beat me to death on the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个有地位的人，莫丁诺家族的一员。在他的怀表被偷走之后，他抓住了我。他妈的差点让我死在街头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't make a noise, though. Wouldn't give that cocksucker the satisfaction. Apparently one of the Bishops saw it and liked my moxy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而我没有发出一丝声响。我没有让那狗屎太得意。似乎一个彼希家族的人看到这一幕并欣赏我的行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They got me patched up and took me under their wing, got me distributing Jet. That's the big moneymaker out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们处理了我的伤口并让我处于他们的羽翼之下，让我分发杰特，这东西在那里是财富之源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I turned into a pretty good dealer, had a a solid reputation with the Bishops. If I had stuck around, who knows? I might have gotten made.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我转变为一个相当不错的商人，在彼希家族有着可靠的声誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, like a lot of things, I fucked it up. When I was 16... young, dumb, and full of cum... I ran into that Mordino fucker again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，像很多事情那样，我诅咒它。在我16岁的时候...年轻，愚蠢，性欲强...我又碰见那个莫丁诺家族的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were in a bar, and he popped off about that beating he laid on me, tried to embarass me in front of everyone. I ignored it... for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们当时在酒吧，而他突然离席为了对我的发难，他试图在众人面前找我麻烦。我无视了...一小会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I waited till he went in the bathroom, then I put him in a chokehold. He started crying, pissing himself. Then I strangled him till he went limp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等到他去厕所，然后我在他身后扣住了他的脖子。他开始求饶，小便失禁。接着我掐到他倒下为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... you can't off a made guy and expect nobody to notice. I had to leave town. Mr. Bishop said he couldn't protect me in the city anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...你不能期望没有人察觉到。我不得不离开了城镇。彼希先生说他再也不能在城里保护我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I drifted west with a caravan, until I saw a recruiting office. When you're starving and homeless, three hots and a cot is a damn good deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我跟随着商队向西部漂流，直到我看到了一个招人广告。当你挨着饿并且无家可归的时候，三个热狗和一个小床简直棒极了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyTellMeA_00020251_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever thought about settling down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想过在这里定居吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It never suited me. Besides, that would mean getting married, and there was only ever one real woman in my life, and she's {exhaling, extending words}long gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不适合我。此外，那意味着结婚，而我的生命中只有一个女人是我心中所属，她是...{exhaling, extending words}说过头了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWhyNotS_00020252_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyBARKFiendAttack01
Fuck! Fiends from the west!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操！西边的恶魔帮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001EDFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKLinusEntrance
Fuck me, I hate caves. {Perturbed}Dark, full of critters waiting to bite your nuts off. {Disgusted}God, this place smells like... burnt piss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操，我恨洞穴。{Perturbed}黑暗，充满了等待吃你心肝的生物。{Disgusted}天呐，这地方闻起来像...燃烧的尿液。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKLinusEntr_0001EE04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKLinusBrahminHunter
Now what in the fuck is this? {Realization}Huh, three steaks and a sniper rifle - that's what I want at my funeral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他妈的的怎么啦？{Realization}哈，三个牛排和一把狙击步枪 - 我希望这些出现在我的葬礼上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKLinusBrah_0001EE09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKLinusRobots
No survivors, naturally. {Resentful}Thanks, pops! Nothing I like more than traipsing into a tomb filled with crazed robots!
ESP.TRADUIT: 理所当然的，没有幸存者。{Resentful}真是感谢！没有比拖着装满发狂的机器人的棺材更让我喜爱的事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKLinusRobo_0001EE0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBarkLambdaEntrance
Whoa, no skeletal remains or batshit robots? Place looks like it's held up pretty well. Maybe dad was looking out for me after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，没有机器人的残骸或者粪便？这地方看起来保持良好。也许是父亲处理好了一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBarkLambdaEnt_0001EE13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKLambda02
Fuck my life. Thanks a lot, dad! {Impersonating elderly man}Here, son. This is a key to a death trap full of fuckall ways to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真操蛋。太感谢了，父亲！{Impersonating elderly man}这里，儿子。这是一把开启毫无危险的危险之地的钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKLambda02_0001EE18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyBARKFiendAttack02
More inbound from that house! Light em up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从屋子里冲出了更多的人！向他们射击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001F0F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyBARKFiendAttack03
Oh, fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我操...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001F0FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a fuckload inbound from the west! Use cover and make your shots count!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从西边来了更多的人！用你的瞄准镜好好看看吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaInherita_aaInheritance01_0001F0FA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKSuicideSkeletons
Motherfucker. I guess they opted out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈。我猜他们决定退出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKSuicideSk_0001F3DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKRats
Ok, if the rats did all this, my opinion of the entire Enclave just went to shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，如果是那些老鼠做了这一切，我只想说那些英克雷吃屎去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKRats_0001F3E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKZombies
I think we can rule out rats as the culprit. I hope you brought Rad-X. Goddamn zombies. Fuck my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们可以清理掉老鼠。我希望你带着注射剂-X。该死的僵尸。我操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKZombies_0001F3E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKBallarms
Hey, I might have seen that flick. Had that guy with the moustache... Doctor... something. It was some kind of sci-fi musical. Fucking weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我也许看到晃动了。留着小胡子的家伙...博士...之类的。这是某些科幻片音乐剧。真他妈的怪异。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKBallarms_0001F3ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎样看待NCR？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good people, bad fucking leadership. Kimball's ok, but the Senate? Bunch of money-grubbing fat cats, paid off by miners and cattlemen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人民很好，但是领导层他妈的太差。金博尔不错，但是参议院呢？成群的有钱有势的人，被矿工和牧场主贿赂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyNCR_00020256_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the same in the military. Oliver is fucking useless. Too many of the officers got their rank by playing politics, not from combat experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军队也是一样。奥利弗他妈的很没用。太多的指挥官是靠玩弄权术上台的，而不是靠作战经验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyNCR_00020256_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems to me like we were damn lucky at Hoover Dam. I wouldn't count on that luck to hold two times in a row.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次我们在胡佛大坝真他妈的是运气。我不认为运气会再次降临。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyNCR_00020256_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if we can win at Zulu, maybe we can hold out at the Dam. Either way, I don't plan on being anywhere near here when the music starts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果我们能在祖鲁获得胜利，或许我们可以守住大坝。不管怎样，在号角响起的时候我不打算留在附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyNCR_00020256_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of Caesar's Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对凯撒军团的有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent most of my career chasing down raiders and slavers. From what I hear the Legion is the same thing... just on a bigger scale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的大部分职业生涯都花费在找出袭击者和奴隶身上。我听说军团也是这样的...只不过规模更大罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyLegion_00020257_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're no better than most of those other savages outside the NCR. They have organization and discipline, but not much else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不比NCR外围大多数野蛮人强到哪里去。他们有组织和领导者，但是没别的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyLegion_00020257_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But to be fair, sometimes organization and discipline are enough. The NCR tends to forget that, and just focuses on fielding warm bodies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是公平的说，有时候有组织和领导者就足够了。NCR常常忘了那一点，而只是将注意力放在混日子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyLegion_00020257_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know one thing - we sure as fuck better not underestimate them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道一件事 - 我们显然他妈的不能低估他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyLegion_00020257_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对豪斯先生的看法呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are so many bullshit rumors, I don't know what to think of him. Some ranger told me House drinks his own piss and lives in a test tube.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有太多谣传了，我不知道怎么去设想他。一些游骑兵告诉我豪斯喝他自己的小便并且在一个实验管中生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyHouse_00020258_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've also heard stories of airships, talking deathclaws, and other nonsense. I tend to be skeptical of these stories. House is in the same category.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我常常听到飞船的故事，还谈论死亡爪，或者其他废话。我常常怀疑这些故事。豪斯先生的事情在这类当中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyHouse_00020258_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你点别的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyAskSome_0001FF6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没什么问题想问了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyQuestio_0002024F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: zBradleyMilitaryWhatHappened
You're not going to let up, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不准备停下来，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent fifteen years in the infantry, was five away from my pension. I was a Staff Sergeant when I fucked it all up in Bullhead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在军队服役了15年，再有5年就有退休金了。当我他妈的在牛头城完了的时候我是个上士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was with General... {Emphasizing change in status}President Kimball's expeditionary force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟着将军...{Emphasizing change in status}金博尔总统的远征军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't the toughest fighting I'd seen, but we were pushing hard, getting leaner on supplies and manpower as we pushed ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我见过的最艰难的战斗，但是我们努力地推进，在物资和人手越来越缺乏的情况下推进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody told me the first casualty of war is innocence, and that's absolute bullshit. The first casualty is fucking sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我，在战争中的第一个受害者是无辜的，那简直是胡说！第一个受害者他妈的在睡觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marching, setting up camp, running night reconnaissance, firewatch, all these things mean next to no shuteye for the rank and file.
ESP.TRADUIT: 部队，安置着营地，晚上进行侦查，防火，所有的这一切意味着普通士兵没有睡眠时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The point is that my guys were wearing out, and I needed them alert. A dozing sentry can get an entire platoon killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题在于我的小伙伴们精疲力竭，而我需要他们警戒。一次瞌睡可能会使整个排的被杀害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I... reconnect with a few old contacts and managed to scrounge up some Jet. I thought it would be a stop-gap solution, something temporary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我...重修跟老熟人联络并设法弄了一些杰特。我认为这是个备用方案，至少是暂时的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wrong. Before I knew it half the squad was hooked, so even when I stopped distributing it the damage was done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那错了。在我意识到之前我已经用了一半的计量还上瘾了，所以即使我停止了使用，但是损害还是产生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, it did some good. It may have saved some lives in the final push when some of those boys were running on adrenaline.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会了，它还是有好处的。它可以保住那些在最后一波推进的小伙子们的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when the smoke cleared and we settled in, they were still fiending. Things went downhill pretty quick, and the brass wanted heads to roll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是当浓烟散去，我们安定下来的时候，它们就变成严重的问题。事情每况愈下，而高层想要严惩闹事者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were threatening every NCO in the company... hell, the entire division. It started with me, so I jumped on that grenade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们威胁军队的上层...该死的，全下地狱吧。这件事始于我，所以我相当于站在了炸药上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only reason they didn't line me up in front of a firing squad was because of my combat record. Instead, I got ten years in the brig. I did five.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们没有枪毙我的唯一原因是由于我的作战履历。取而代之的是，我要被关十年禁闭。已经五年过去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of my old NCO's, a man named Lancaster, did me a solid in the trial, testifying on my behalf. I'm not sure what became of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的一个上司，一个叫做兰卡斯特的人，在法庭上我为作证，为我做辩护。我不知道他发生了事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_14.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So there I was, dishonorably discharged, no pension, no real work skills outside fighting... I was a ready-made merc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我就，不光彩的出狱，没有养老金，除了战斗我没有任何实际的工作技能...我是个现成的雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyMilitar_0001FF6F_15.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not trying to break balls, but I'd like to know why you left the service. It doesn't add up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想打断你，但是我想知道你为什么离开军队。这并不划算。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said to leave it alone, and I damn well meant it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说别管它，而且我是认真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you a section 8 or something? Are you going to have a flashback and snap? I need to know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是第八小队或诸如此类的部队的一员么？你有没有过回火和炸膛？我想知道！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who did you fight against during your time in the NCR's military?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你在NCR的军团服役期间你与谁作战？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fought a lot of fucking boredom, that's for damn sure. Jokes aside, it was mainly small bands of raiders, bandits, or slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我参加过很多无聊的战斗，相当令人厌恶。抛开玩笑话，主要是与一些小规模的袭击者，土匪或者奴隶进行战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyCampaig_00020259_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta admit, there were few things more gratifying than freeing slaves. It's an awful state... slavers treat people worse than their dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得承认，没有比解放奴隶更让人感到高兴的事情了。那是个可怕的集团...奴隶连狗都不如。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyCampaig_00020259_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that's why I despise the Legion. I hear they have a giant slave camp off in Arizona, mining metal for weapons. Hundreds of slaves there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许这就是我鄙视军团的原因。我听说他们在亚利桑那有个巨大的奴隶营，为制作武器采集矿藏。那里有数百个奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyCampaig_00020259_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I digress - most of the raiders were just small bands until the 80's came along. Those fuckers are a rough bunch, and they're growing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我跑题了 - 大多数袭击者都是小股势力出现在80号公路上。那些傻瓜都是土人，而且他们日益增长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyCampaig_00020259_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ran into a few White Legs, also the Claws. Those crazy fucks drink Deathclaw blood, wear claws on gloves. They can gut you in a second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我碰见过一些白腿部落人，还有一些死亡爪。那些疯狂的家伙喝死亡爪的血，戴着死亡爪手套。他们可以在一秒钟内捣撕开你的内脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyCampaig_00020259_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Drawing out 'but'}But, most of the maniacs I fought were just murdering slobs camped in the desert, nothing special. There's a lot of them on the frontier.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Drawing out 'but'}但是，跟我战斗的绝大数疯子只能杀杀在沙漠露营的笨蛋，没什么特别的。在边境有很多他们这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyCampaig_00020259_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christ, you really want to hear this stuff? Ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基督啊，你真的想听听这件事吗？好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The woman... she was every bit a woman - was a good bit older than me when I met her. I was 16, when everything you feel is... magnified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个女人...她像每个女人那样 - 相当的好。当我遇见她的时候，她比我大一点。我当时16岁，一个会将情感...放大的年纪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Her name was Jessica Wright, married to some bigshot in the Wright family. It was freak luck meeting her, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她叫做杰西卡·莱特，跟某个莱特家族的权贵结婚了。事实上，这是她的幸运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She had an arrangement with the Bishops, where they'd secretly deliver Jet, since her husband was a control freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她与彼希家族有个协议，他们想偷偷的贩卖杰特，自此以后她的丈夫变成了一个控制狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of our guys was sick, and since I was the next slinger in line, young Bradley got the job of delivering Jet to Mrs. Wright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的一个伙计生病了，而我就接过他的工作，年轻的布拉德利负责送货给莱特夫人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember seeing her the first time, in that black dress. She had dark skin and eyes, and those hips... Jesus, I can almost feel them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得第一次见她的时候，她穿着黑色的裙子。她有着黑色的皮肤和黑色的眼睛，并且那么忧郁...耶稣啊，我能感觉到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it was just good timing, but we "connected" right away. It was like nothing I had felt before... and nothing since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这就是良辰美景，而我们立即产生了“共鸣”。这种感觉空前...且绝后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jess was the sort of woman who could put crazy thoughts in your head with just a look... not to mention her touch. Jesus, she was amazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰斯是那种只要你看一眼就会令你发狂的女人...更不用说触摸她了。耶稣啊，她是奇迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had dumb dreams about killing her husband, marrying her. She was the focus of my youth, my passion. Maybe I left it all with her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有梦到过杀死她的丈夫，然后跟她结婚。她是我青年时代的中心，或许我能为她放弃一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I had to leave Reno, I wrote her a letter, asking if she'd go with me. She never wrote back. I figured she had moved on.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Being in the military, always in camp or on campaign, I tried to forget about her. I had more than my share of whores, but it wasn't the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在军队的时候，我要么在营地要么在行军，我试图忘了她。我有更多属于我的妓女，但不是原来的那样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny thing is that after all this time, I mostly remember Jess' smell. That perfume, her hair. Not a day goes by that I don't think of her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的是，一直以来，我总会想起杰斯味道。她的香味，她的发梢。我没有一天不会想她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWoman_00020254_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who was this woman you mentioned? Seems like you have strong feelings about her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到的这个女人是谁？似乎你对她有股强烈的情感。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some things are best left in the past... in memories, not words. I hope you learn that someday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些事情最好留在过去...留在记忆力，不说出来。我希望你有一天会明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on - tell me about the woman. I want details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等 - 告诉我关于那个女人的事。我想知道细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever thought about going back to Reno and finding her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有想过回到里诺去找她吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was... almost 25 years ago. I'm sure she's moved on. I should have done the same long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...大约是25年前的事情了，我可以肯定她已经死了。我应该很久之前就这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWomanFi_00020AF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some things are best left in the past. You can't blame yourself for someone else's choices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些事情最好留在过去。你不能因为别人的选择而去责怪自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're right. When you're detached from something for so long, it's easy to let nostalgia skew your perception.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的。当你远离某件事物很久之后，你就会很容易去怀念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWomanLe_00020AF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She made her choices, I made mine. It's just that simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她做出了她的选择，我也是。这很简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWomanLe_00020AF5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep to (aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep + 1)
You should forget about that hussy. There are other fish in the sea, muchacho.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该忘了那个荡妇。天涯何处无芳草，帅哥。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch your fucking mouth. You don't know what the fuck you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的注意你的嘴。你他妈的不知道你在说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_zBradleyWomanSl_00020AF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep to (aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep - 1)
aaASKWhatFindInHere01
Hey, can I ask you a question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我能问你一个问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKWhatFindIn_00020AFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, what's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你在想什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure how I feel about this whole thing. Honestly, what do you think we'll find in here? I'm tempted just to leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太确定我对这整件事的看法。老实说，你认为我们是如何找到这里的？我都想独自离开这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKWhatFindIn_00020AFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we should keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们需要保持前进。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're probably right. Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大概是对的。带路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKWhatFindIn_00020AFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing ventured, nothing gained. You can't be meek in the face of danger, Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有投资，没有获利。你不可以在面对危险时显得懦弱，布拉德利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, who the fuck are you calling meek?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，他妈的谁是你所谓的懦弱小绵羊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKFindWorthL_00020B03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'm right behind you. But if Deathclaws lop our faces off I'm going to remind you I was right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会在你后面。但是如果死亡爪撕破了我们的脸，我将提醒你我是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKFindWorthL_00020B03_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep to (aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep + 1)
If you don't have the nerve, I'll be happy to go it out alone and keep everything to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没有胆量。我会很高兴独自上路并自行解决一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going anywhere. I wanted to see where you stood, and you just let me know. Let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会去任何地方。我只是想看看你站在哪里，并了解你让我知道的，让我行动起来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKFindAllMin_00020DE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep to (aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep - 1)
I don't know what's in there, but we're going to find out together. Good enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道里面有什么，但是让我们一起找出来。准备好了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely. I just wanted to see where you stood. That told me what I needed to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然是。我只是想看看你站在哪里。那会告诉我，我需要知道什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKFindDontKn_00020B04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep to (aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep + 1)
aaASKMoneyIntro
Hey, can I ask you a question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我能问你一个问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKMoneyIntro_00020DE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, what is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你要问什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't sure if we'd find anything, and now that we're here, I can't help but think of what's going to happen afterwards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太确定我们是否能找到任何东西，现在我们在这了，我不禁会想等会儿会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKMoneyIntro_00020DEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the sake of discussion... let's say we walk out of that place filthy rich... like Sierra Madre rich. What are you going to do with your cut?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了讨论...让我们谈谈离开这有钱人的地方吧...像马德雷山脉那样有钱。你准备去哪里处理你的伤口？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKMoneyIntro_00020DEB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we're almost to the vault. Let's keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们差不多到避难所了。让我们保持前进。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you're right. I've got your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你是对的。我会在后面跟上你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaAskMoneyIntro_00020DEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a little early to start discussing our hypothetical wealth. Let's focus on getting it first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 讨论我们设想中的财富还为时尚早。让我们首先找到再说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. Normally I'm focused on the job, but finding this... something left by my dad. I can't help but smile at the thought of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的。一般情况我很关注于工作，但是想想这个...我父亲留下的某些东西。我一想到这个就会忍不住的开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKMoneyJumpT_00020DF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep to (aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep + 1)
I was thinking of using the money to help Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在考虑用这些钱帮助自由城。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but they can fend for themselves. I've walked that road, living in the gutter, eating rats and barely surviving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但是他们能够自谋生路。我曾走过那条路，住过臭水沟，吃过老鼠并勉强维持生计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKMoneyHelpW_00020DF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you throw cash at Freeside and the end result... the Kings are carrying new guns and wearing new suits. Nothing changes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，你向自由城投资而结果是...猫王帮会带新枪并穿上新衣服。没有任何改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKMoneyHelpW_00020DF1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't about the money. It's about finishing the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是钱的问题。这是关于完成工作的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's always about the money. If you want to lie to yourself... say it's not... that's your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这通常关钱的事。如果你想欺骗自己...就说不是吧...那是你的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does it matter? You're just going to piss it away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有什么关系？你只是撒了泡尿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always gotta be the douchebag, don't you? I'm looking forward to the end of our little partnership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是这么傻逼，不是吗？我期待着我们的合作即将结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaASKMoneyPissI_00020DF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep to (aaBradleyRef.BradleyRep - 1)
aaBARKLambdaBadFeeling
You ever get that feeling in your stomach... makes you taste vomit in the back of your throat? That just happened to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的胃有过那种感觉...那种使你将食物从喉咙里呕吐出来的感觉吗？我刚刚就有过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [03001121] (mod) Quest : ([03004853]aaBradleyCompanion01) Bradley's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\aaBradleyVoiceType\aaBradleyC_aaBARKLambdaBad_0002270F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03024E25] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult03\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaEstherNote01 1 set aaInheritancePost06.MessageSent to 2 aaCourier03Ref.evp setstage aaInheritancePost06 5
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Muttering "Uhhhh"}<The Courier stares at you>
ESP.TRADUIT: {Muttering "Uhhhh"}<信使盯着你>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03024E25] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult03\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost06.CourierStared to aaInheritancePost06.CourierStared + 1
Fucking fascist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的法西斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03024E25] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult03\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaEstherNote01 1 set aaInheritancePost06.MessageSent to 2 aaCourier03Ref.evp setstage aaInheritancePost06 5
Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚蛋吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking fascist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的法西斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03024E25] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult03\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaEstherNote01 1 set aaInheritancePost06.MessageSent to 2 aaCourier03Ref.evp setstage aaInheritancePost06 5
I'm &PCName;. You wanted to discuss building an orphanage, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是&PCName;。我想讨论一下建立一个孤儿院，怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, of course! I wasn't sure if you would respond.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当然！我不确定你是否会回复我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard of you... how you took down the Syndicate, saved Westside from Fiends. I also heard you're... well off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说过你...关于你是怎样端掉辛迪加组织，还有从恶魔帮手中保住了西区。我还听说你很...富有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vegas is a town of haves and have-nots. I want to know if you'd be willing to help us give back to the less fortunate, give them a better shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯贫富悬殊。我想知道你是否愿意帮助那些不幸的人。给他们一个更好的未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already have the spot for the orphanage picked out, and Zeke can provide security. What I need... are caps. 10,000 caps, to be specific.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经选好了孤儿院的地点，而齐克可以提供保安工作。我需要的...仅仅是瓶盖。具体来说是10,000个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E39_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bitch, I got your letter. Find someone else to pay for those brats, and don't write me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 母狗，我收到了你的信。找其他人为那些小屁孩负担费用吧，别再给我写信了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why... you greedy piece of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么...你这贪心的狗屎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zeke, teach this slime a lesson in civility!
ESP.TRADUIT: 齐克，教这个软泥怪一些礼貌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00024E3A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaEstherFaction PlayerFaction aaEstherRef.startcombat PlayerRef aaZekeRef.startcombat playerRef setstage aaInheritancePost06 200
God bless you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025359_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's going to take us a few days to get the place set up, but feel free to swing by when we're up and running. I might even have work for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里建立孤儿院将会花去数天的世界，但是一旦运营起来就很随意了。我甚至可以为你工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025359_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a great service you're doing for New Vegas. We won't soon forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为新维加斯做了伟大的贡献。我们不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025359_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 10000 rewardkarma 50 setobjectivecompleted aaInheritancePost06 5 1 setobjectivecompleted aaInheritancePost06 10 1 showmessage aaEstherPaidMessage aaEstherRef.moveto aaOrphanageInteriorParentRef aaZekeRef.moveto aaOrphanageInteriorParentRef 256 aaEstherRef.evp set aaInheritancePost06.CapsGiven to 1
I'm happy to help. <Pay 10,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意帮助。<支付10,000瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. I still have business to manage here in Novac, so just speak with me when you have the caps collected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白，我在诺瓦克还有一些事务管理这里，所以当你有了瓶盖之后跟再我谈谈吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost06 10
I want to help, but I'll need more time to get 10,000 caps together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要帮助，但是我需要更多的时间来筹集10,000个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, take your time. It's a lot of caps. We'll be here when you have it collected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 慢慢来。这是一大笔瓶盖。我们会在这里等到你筹集够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but I still don't have enough caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，我还没有足够的瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why should I trust you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为什么要相信你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was an orphan myself. I know what it's like, struggling to survive, stealing just to stay alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自己就是一个孤儿。我知道这意味着什么，为生存而去奋斗，偷窃仅仅只是为了活下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002535C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've spent years just getting on my feet, working as a trader. For the first time, I'm in a position to help these children... to help New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我花了好几年的时间才变成现在这样，像一个商人那样工作。这是我第一次，能够帮助这些孩子...帮助新维加斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002535C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to spare these children the hardships of living on the street. I can't do it alone, though. I need your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让那些孩子不再沿街乞讨。但我独自一个还做不到这些，。我需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to finance your orphanage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会为你的孤儿院供应经费。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's disappointing. Is there any particular reason?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那真令人失望。有什么特别的原因吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025363_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to speak with you about funding the orphanage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你谈谈关于资助孤儿院的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was wondering if you'd say that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你那么说我会惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025358_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this means helping the children of New Vegas, I'll raise the stakes. <Pay 20,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这意味着帮助新维加斯的孩子们。我将解你燃眉之急。<支付20,000瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is... I never expected.... thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是...我从未想过的...谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002535D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's going to take us a few days to get the place set up, but feel free to swing by when we're up and running. I might even have work for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里建立孤儿院将会花去数天的世界，但是一旦运营起来就很随意了。我甚至可以为你工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002535D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a great service you're doing for New Vegas. We won't soon forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为新维加斯做了伟大的贡献。我们不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002535D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 20000 rewardkarma 100 setobjectivecompleted aaInheritancePost06 5 1 setobjectivecompleted aaInheritancePost06 10 1 showmessage aaEstherPaidMessage aaEstherRef.moveto aaOrphanageInteriorParentRef aaZekeRef.moveto aaOrphanageInteriorParentRef 256 aaEstherRef.evp set aaInheritancePost06.CapsGiven to 1 set aaInheritancePost06.CapsExtra to 1
10,000 caps?! Are you housing them at the Ultra-Luxe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 10,000瓶盖？！ 你是让他们住在超美多赌场吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't pull that amount out of thin air. The NCR doesn't help worth squat, so me and Zeke have to get the ball rolling. Everything costs money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是凭空捏造这笔数目。NCR不愿意帮贫困的维持生计。所以我跟齐克不得不让事业运营起来。所有的事情都要花钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025360_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have to get water, food, power, and extra security. Then there's the NCR permits and taxes. It takes green to cut through red tape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不得不去弄水，食物，电力，还有额外的安全工作。然后NCR才会许可并收税。这需要钱来削减财政赤字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025360_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already got the building picked out - it's a place just east of the Medical Clinic. When we're set up, you can see for yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经选好的开业地点 - 就在诊所的东边。当我们建好的时候，你可以亲眼看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025360_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up with the mutant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个变种人怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a bodyguard of sorts. I bailed him out of some trouble a while back, so he took some kind of crazy blood oath to protect me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个蹩脚的保镖。我不久前帮助他解决一了些麻烦，所以他发血誓要保护我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a big talker, but he's hell on wheels in any sort of rumble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不是在吹牛逼，但总让任何打斗变得混乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002535F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My reasons are my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自有我的理由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's unfortunate, but I respect your decision. Zeke and I will hit the road, I guess. We have a lot of money to raise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真令人遗憾，但是我尊重你的决定。我认为我和齐克该上路了。我们需要筹备更多的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025826_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEstherRef.disable showmessage aaEstherRefusedMessage setstage aaInheritancePost06 160
I don't trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're smarter than I thought. I guess you didn't get that money by accident, did you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你比我想象中的要聪明。我猜你不是偶然得到那些钱的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025828_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell, Courier. Until our next meeting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会，邮差。直到我们下次见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025828_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEstherRef.disable showmessage aaEstherRefusedMessage setstage aaInheritancePost06 160
I won't invest 10,000 caps in such a risky venture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不打算在这么一个危险的事业投入10,000个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you only knew how much a difference it would make... how it would help those children, I think you'd reconsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想知道它会造成什么不同...它将会给那些孩子提供怎样的帮助。我觉得你就会重新考虑下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025827_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's unfortunate, but I respect your decision. Zeke and I will hit the road I guess. We have a lot of money to raise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真令人遗憾，但是我尊重你的决定。我认为我和齐克该上路了。我们需要筹备更多的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025827_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEstherRef.disable showmessage aaEstherRefusedMessage setstage aaInheritancePost06 160
You strike me as an unctuous bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这狡猾的婊子欺骗了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got some nerve...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得了神经病...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025824_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll find someone else with a sense of charity to help us. Keep your money and your judgment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会找另一些有责任心慈善机构帮组我们。留着你的钱并保持你的判断吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025824_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEstherRef.disable showmessage aaEstherRefusedMessage setstage aaInheritancePost06 160
I don't like your face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢你的脸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you a child? That's the most petty, shallow thing I've ever heard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在开玩笑嘛？简直是太幼稚了，这是我听过最肤浅的事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025825_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll find someone else with a sense of charity to help us. Keep your money and your judgment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会找另一些有责任心慈善机构帮组我们。留着你的钱并保持你的判断吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025825_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEstherRef.disable showmessage aaEstherRefusedMessage setstage aaInheritancePost06 160
What's with all the security?
ESP.TRADUIT: 安全工作是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You would not believe... hobos and filthy Fiends are all over the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会相信的...流浪汉和肮脏的恶魔帮到处都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't want to take any risks that might jeopardize the children. The mercenaries work at a reduced rate, and Zeke... well, he's free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想冒任何风险，那会影响到孩子们。雇佣兵要占一份比重，而齐克...好吧，他是免费的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are all the orphans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 孤儿们都在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny thing, we just found homes for over a dozen youngsters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的事情是，我们为超过一打的孤儿们找到了家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of them were only here for a day or two. The Followers were really helpful in connecting us with good parents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而他们大多数只戴了一两天。事实上追随者帮助了我们，为我们联系到好父母。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure we'll have more in here soon. I've made sure to tell the Followers, Kings, and everyone else we're open now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信很快就会有更多的父母来。我已经告知了追随者，猫王帮，还有其他人我们已经开业了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's in the basement?
ESP.TRADUIT: 地下室里有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a mess right now - you should steer clear. We've got some cots and mattresses, and I'm working on setting up a classroom for the kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这是一片混乱 - 你应该避开。我们有一些床和垫子，而且我在努力为孩子们建立一个教室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few more days and it will be fixed up real nice. It's a sight better than living on the street, that's for certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天之后就能修建好。显然这比流落街头好的多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way I can help out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有需要我帮忙的地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've done so much already, I hate to impose any further.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经做了如此多的事情了，我不想再麻烦你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We do appreciate it, but right now I think we're all set.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很感激，但是现在我认为我们已经准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost06 20 showmessage aaOrphanageAwryMessage
aaInheritancePost06EstherOPPerception
What? How...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？怎么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like where this conversation is headed. I want you to leave. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这种谈话走向。我希望你离开，现在就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B0D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost06 20 showmessage aaOrphanageAwryMessage
You're lying to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你欺骗了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you've been using the Orphanage as a front for the slave trade, Esther.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你将孤儿院用于奴隶贩卖，以斯贴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You couldn't leave well enough alone, could you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能适可而止？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, is this a matter of money? Surely we can come to an agreement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧，这是钱的问题吗？我们显然可以达成一个协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you're thinking of making a move... don't. If you're the do-gooder type, the only way you'll save those kids is if you hear me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你可以考虑下做个让步...或者不做。如果你是个好人，那么你拯救孩子们的唯一办法就是听我把话说完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I find out you've been peddling kiddies. I'm going to bleed you slowly, you heinous twat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现你一直在贩卖儿童。我会让你慢慢流血而死，你这可恶的婊子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, hold on. Just... be reasonable!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，等等。拜托...理智点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I understand you're angry, but stop and think for a moment. If you want your money... if you want to save those kids - you'll hear me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，我理解你的愤怒，不过停下来然后仔细想想。如果你想要你的钱...如果你想挽救那些孩子 - 你就要听我把话说完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B22_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You set up a slavery den with *my* money, and you hid it? I want my cut, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你用*我的*钱办了一个奴隶场，而且你还隐瞒了这件事？我要赔偿，立刻就要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. Look, I can't be too careful these days, with the NCR and other abolitionist nuts running around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，看，我这几天太不小心了。让那些NCR还有那些废奴主义者顽固们到处跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems like you're reasonable, though, so we'll work something out. Clearly, you deserve some... restitution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你看起来是理智的，所以我们想出一些办法。显然，你应得一些...赔偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B21_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm only going to ask once: where's my money?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只问一次，我的钱去哪了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can get you your money, no questions asked. But before I do that, just hear me out on something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以将你的钱给你，不要问任何问题。但是在我这这些之前，要听我说完一些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000263E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't exactly go the bank for a startup loan on a slavery ring. I could build a front, but I needed capital to get on my feet. You provided it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能跑去银行去为奴隶场贷款。我可以建立一个地基，但是我需要首都的许可。你提供了这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000263E6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By any measure, you're now a shareholder. Instead of a lump sum, why not take a piece of the action each week?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不论以哪种标准，你现在都是个股东。相对于一次性付清，为什么不拿每周的红利呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000263E6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you're dead set on getting all the caps back right away, we can do that. But if you're smart, you'll stay on board with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，如果你坚决要拿回全部的瓶盖，我们可以那样做。但是如果你够聪明，你会跟我保持协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000263E6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll run the business. You don't have to touch it or see it, unless something big comes up. In exchange, you get ten percent of the profits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会经营生意。你不需要接触或者看着它，除非发生大事情。作为交换，你会得到一成的利润。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000263E6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's it gonna be, Courier? Are you in this for the long haul?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你的决定是什么，邮差？你要做长期打算吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000263E6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, save the kids? Where are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思，拯救孩子们？他们在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll tell you, but first you have to give me your word - in exchange for the information, I'm going to walk out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会告诉你的，不过在此之前你需要听听我的话 - 作为信息的交换，我将会离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026C9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can still save them... the question is whether or not you're willing to put their lives ahead of your disdain for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还是可以拯救他们...问题是你是否会将他们的生命安危置于你藐视我之上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026C9F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to break your spine and dump you over the dam. You'll be Lakelurk shit, you stupid cooze.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会打断你的脊椎并将你吊在大坝上。你将会变成一坨干瘪的大便，你这愚蠢的婊子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zeke! Mama needs you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 齐克！妈妈需要你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEstherRef.startcombat player setenemy aaEstherFaction PlayerFaction aaEstherRef.CIOS TerrifyingPresenceSpell aaZekeRef.CIOS TerrifyingPresenceSpell aaEstherMercenary01Ref.CIOS TerrifyingPresenceSpell
[Taunt] You take orphans and enslave them? You're lower than rat shit, cunt. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: [嘲弄]你把他们变成了努力？你连老鼠屎都不如，淫妇。<攻击>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaEstherFaction PlayerFaction aaEstherRef.startcombat player aaEstherRef.modav health 250 aaEstherRef.modav guns 100 aaZekeRef.modav health 500 aaZekeRef.modav meleeweapons 100 aaZekeRef.modav guns 100
Bitch, I'm the do-bad type, and you just shit in my hat. Good-motherfucking-night. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 母狗，我是演反派的，而你不过是坨狗屎。去你妈的晚安吧。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zeke, we got a fighter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 齐克，我们需要一个战士！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00025B2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaEstherFaction PlayerFaction aaEstherRef.startcombat player
You took my money to set this place up. That makes me a share-holder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿我的钱建立了这个地方。所以得让我成为股东。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was wondering if you'd say that - it's good to know you've got a mind for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很高兴你这么说 - 你有商业头脑是一大幸事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearly you deserve a share of the profits. I can offer you a cut each week, no questions asked. The alternative is a lump sum buyout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然你应得一份利润。我可以每周给你一份红利，不要问任何问题。另一种选择是一次付清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CAF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The smart play... is to stay with us. At the rate we're going, you'll make your money back and then some. It's up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智的选择...是跟我们合作。按照我们获得比重，你将会得到你的全部钱甚至更多。由你决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CAF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'll take a share of the weekly profits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我选择每周拿红利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very shrewd choice, if I may say so. As long as there are orphans, we will stay in the black.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常明智的选择，我想说。只有有孤儿，我们利润。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just check in with me each week, and I'll have your share of the take. Aside from that, we should keep our contact to a minimum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有每星期报到一次，而我将会分给你应有的那份红利。除此之外，我应该保持最少的接触。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll manage the business, acquisitions, everything. I'll only call on you if... complications arise. I'm not too worried about that, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会经营贸易，兼并，等其他事情。我只会在...出现重大问题的时候请求帮助。尽管我对此不太担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again, Courier. Take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢，邮差。你多保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaEstherTakeProfitsMessage setstage aaInheritancePost06 170 set aaInheritancePost06.ProfitState to 3
{Barter Check}
{Sighs, disgusted}Fine. This is going to set me back more than you know, but you have a point.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sighs, disgusted}好吧。对此我感到超出你想象的失望，不过你有很有道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After this, we're done. My debt is paid, our business is finished. I think it's best if we avoided any contact in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之后，我们了解了。我的债务还清了，我们的生意已经运营起来了。我认为我们以后最好避免接触。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CAA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 25000 setstage aaInheritancePost06 175
I gave you a loan and you turned it into gold. You owe me points on top of the lump sum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给你一笔借款，而你把它们变成了黄金。你欠我的钱要一次性付清。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighs, disgusted}Fine. This is going to set me back more than you know, but you have a point.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sighs, disgusted}好吧。对此我感到超出你想象的失望，不过你有很有道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After this, we're done. My debt is paid, our business is finished. I think it's best if we avoided any contact in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之后，我们了解了。我的债务还清了，我们的生意已经运营起来了。我认为我们以后最好避免接触。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CC1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 15000 setstage aaInheritancePost06 175
I gave you a loan and you turned it into gold. You owe me points on top of the lump sum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给你一笔借款，而你把它们变成了黄金。你欠我的钱要一次性付清。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Amused}This wasn't exactly a loan. I had good reason for my methods. I'll settle my debt, but I'm not paying a cap more.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Amused}这不完全是一笔欠款。我这么做自有我的缘由。我会付清我的债务的。但我不会多付一个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you owe me interest or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是应该给我一些利息什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want the lump sum, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一次付清，现在就要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had hoped you would opt for the long-term plan, but I respect your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你会选择长远的打算，但我尊重你的选择。
