ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here it is, every last cap. That should conclude our business. I think it would be best if we avoided any contact in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，全部都在这了。我们的协议结束了。我认为我们以后最好避免接触。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 10000 setstage aaInheritancePost06 175
I had hoped you would opt for the long-term plan, but I respect your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你会选择长远的打算，但我尊重你的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here it is, every last cap. That should conclude our business. I think it would be best if we avoided any contact in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，全部都在这了。我们的协议结束了。我认为我们以后最好避免接触。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CAE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 20000 setstage aaInheritancePost06 175
aaInheritancePost06EstherMONEYSumAndLeave
You can leave unharmed if you tell me where the children are being held. I give you my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你告诉我孩子们在哪，你就能立刻。我说到做到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Vipers have them in their new hideout, east of Nipton. It's nothing more than an old cave, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒蛇帮有了新的藏身地，在尼普顿的东边。实际上，那只不过是个古老的山洞罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supposedly they've gotten some new blood from outside the Mojave, real hardasses. They're going to sell the kids to the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我推测他们从莫哈维以外的地方吸收了新鲜血液，真是顽固。他们将儿童贩卖给军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not a bad sort, Courier... you just see things a little too... black and white. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是个坏人，邮差...你只不过看事情有点太...黑白分明。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
aaEstherRef.disable aaEstherMercenary01Ref.disable aaZekeRef.disable showmessage aaEstherRefusedMessage setstage aaInheritancePost06 30
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 29 endif
I won't agree to those terms. You have to pay for what you've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不同意这些条款。你必须交出你全部的钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sigh}Very well. Zeke?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sigh}很好。齐克？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaEstherFaction PlayerFaction aaEstherRef.startcombat PlayerRef aaZekeRef.startcombat playerRef
I keep a pair of pliers and a blowtorch handy. I bet I can make you talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带着一个钳子和焊枪。我确信我能让你开口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. But by the time I tell you, those kiddies will be sold to Caesar's Legion, never to be seen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧。但我要告诉你，那些孩子将会卖给凯撒军团，绝不会再出现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can make a move, or go save those orphans. Time is wasting, so you better choose quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以采取行动，或许可以拯救这些孩子。时间在流逝，所以你最好快点做决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care about the kids or the money. I just want to watch you die, bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎那些孩子还有钱。我只想看到你死在我面前，婊子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking psycho!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的神经病！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaEstherFaction PlayerFaction aaEstherRef.startcombat PlayerRef aaZekeRef.startcombat playerRef
I'd like to pick up my weekly cut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要拿走我的每周津贴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CB4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 6400 set aaInheritancePost06.ProfitState to 1 rewardkarma -50
What a week! If this keeps up, we're gonna have to retire early!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如此美好的一个星期！如果一直这样，我们就能提起退休了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\FemaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00026CC0_1.ogg

<Auction Chanting>

<Intelligence Check>
ESP.TRADUIT: <智力检测>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vae, eam fuisse oportet Quintum. Habet merdam pro cerebris. Stridebo super faciem suam!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D349_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost06.SeverusGreeted to 8 aaSeverusRef.evp
Erras. Diversum centurio acquiritur servorum heri.
Hoc mirabile est, tangeris per deos.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002DBE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Non habeo fortuna. Despiciam alibi.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002DBE2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vale, misera creatura.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002DBE2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost06.SeverusGreeted to 8 aaSeverusRef.evp
Me share you meat. Make muffins!
<Lie> Vendebant servis ad aliquem cum plus pecuniam.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> Vendebant servis ad aliquem cum

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interficiam omnes!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost06.SeverusGreeted to 10 setenemy aaSeverusFaction VWastelandNVBanditViperFaction aaSeverusRef.evp
aaInheritancePost06SeverusIntelligenceLow
aaInheritancePost06SeverusSpeech
<Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Edepol, stultus es.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D068_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pro tempori ultimi - ubi. sunt. servis. meis.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D068_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not with the Vipers. The slaves have been freed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和毒蛇帮不是一伙的。奴隶们已经被释放了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Malum! Qui fecerunt?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D067_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Explica tecum ipse... aut amputari cordis tui!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D067_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't understand you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听不懂你说的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hui! I forget that most of the profligates are not versed in my mother tongue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！我忘了那些游荡者大多数都不会我们的母语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D066_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am here to collect the property of Caesar, young slaves to be indoctrinated and trained. Direct me to their holding cell so I may retrieve them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里为凯撒收集财富，年轻的奴隶将被教导训练。我直接领导着他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D066_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cut the jibber-jabber and move, or I'll modus ponens my foot up your ad hominem. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 停止胡说八道，然后滚吧，否则我将踩扁你。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perite!
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0002D064_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaSeverusFaction playerfaction aaSeverusRef.startcombat player
[Taunt] Caco in Caesarem. Caco in Legionis. Caco in vos.
ESP.TRADUIT: [嘲弄]Caco in Caesarem. Caco in Legi

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaSeverusFaction playerfaction aaSeverusRef.startcombat player aaSeverusRef.modav health 500 aaSeverusRef.modav meleeweapons 100
What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighs from frustration}Trying to wait out those filthy hobos squatting on my property.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sighs from frustration}努力解决掉那些侵占着我的财产的流浪汉。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00032455_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dirty bums don't give a damn about my deed, and the NCR won't send any law to force them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肮脏的流浪汉不在乎我的死活，而NCR不愿意派遣部队来驱赶他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00032455_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost08.JamesGreeted to 1
Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: James Anderson. Most call me Jimmy. This is my wife, Jane, and children, Robert, Betty, and Billy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆斯·安德森。大多数人叫我吉米。这是我的夫人简，还有孩子们罗伯特，贝蒂和比利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003245B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you call it your property? It's an abandoned building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你称之为你的财产？这是个废弃的建筑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was an abandoned building. An NCR inspector found it uninhabited, so they put it up for sale as part of the Homestead Initiative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它确实是个废弃的建筑。一个NCR的巡视员发现它无人居住，所以他们拍卖了这栋楼的产权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003245A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My farm near Redding was about to go to the brahmin barons, so I put everything I had into this lot. Figured I could start a trading post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我那临近瑞丁城的农场将要转给那些双头牛贩毒者，所以我将我的一切付诸于此。我想在这开个贸易站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003245A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bring my entire family and everything we have, only to find this place occupied by hobos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带着全部家当来到这里，却只发现了这个被流浪汉占据的楼房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003245A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Ronnie guy is their leader, and he won't budge. I'm getting desperate here, stranger. I might have to take matters into my own hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个叫罗尼的家伙是他们的头领，而他不想让步。我已经绝望了，陌生人。我也许要自己动手解决麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003245A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it would be in your best interest to move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为离开这里更符合你的利益。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're supposed to be moving the hobos out of here! I bought and paid for this lot months ago. This is ridiculous! We're not going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你应该让那些流浪汉离开这里！我在数月以前就买下这栋楼房。这太可笑了！我们哪也不去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003345E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me try to work something out with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我想个办法解决掉他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you say so. The honcho is a loose cannon, real twitchy. I think they're on dope or mushrooms, something weird. Freaks, all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你爱怎么说就怎么说吧。那个领头的是个牛脾气，相当的神经质。我猜他们吸毒或者抽大麻等古怪的东西。他们都是怪胎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00032460_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You get rid of them without any killing, and I'll throw in some caps for you. Thanks for doing this, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不要用杀人的方式来赶走他们，我将会付给你一些瓶盖。感谢你帮助，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00032460_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost08.RonnieGreeted to 1 setstage aaInheritancePost08 5
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003245D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hobos? They're a disease, and the cure is in my holster. I'll take care of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 流浪汉？他们是个毒瘤，而医治的方法在我枪套里。我会解决掉他们的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cracking a few heads is one thing, but don't go killing people. I don't want bloodshed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教训几个人倒是可以，不过别杀人。我不想发生流血事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003245F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You get rid of them without any killing, and I'll throw in some caps for you. Thanks for doing this, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不要用杀人的方式来赶走他们，我将会付给你一些瓶盖。感谢你帮助，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003245F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost08.RonnieGreeted to 1 setstage aaInheritancePost08 5
aaInheritanceOrphanageRonnieIntro01
Look, you dumb sodbuster, I won't say it again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 看吧，你这愚蠢的土人，我不想再说第二遍...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032462_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, who the fuck are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你他妈是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032462_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost08.RonnieGreeted to 2 setobjectivecompleted aaInheritancePost08 5 1
aaInheritanceOrphanageRonnieFamilyLeft
aaInheritanceOrphanageRonnieFamilyDead
I'm &PCName;. Mr. Anderson has the rights to this property. You're going to have to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是&PCName;。受安德森先生拥有这栋房子的地契。你们必须离开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? We've been on the road for weeks, just trying to survive. We are day to day out here, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我们已经流落街头好几个星期了，只是为了活下来。我们天天都在这儿，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032475_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got sick people and a pregnant woman. You want us to uproot and go back out in the wastes? You can wipe my ass with that deed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有病人和孕妇。而你想让我们全部离开并回废土上？你可以用那契约擦我的屁股了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032475_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up. Pack your shit, and lead your band of bums out of here, right fucking now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴。收起你的废话吧，然后带着你的一帮臭虫滚吧，他妈的立刻给我滚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know your kind, just like those NCR assholes. Always pushing us around, telling us to move on. Well not anymore, you vicious fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你的心肠就像NCR那样黑。他们总是驱赶我们，叫我们离开。我们不会再妥协了，你这恶毒的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032476_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got sick people and a pregnant woman. You want us to uproot and go back out in the wastes? You can wipe my ass with that deed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有病人和孕妇。而你想让我们全部离开并回废土上？你可以用那契约擦我的屁股了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032476_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't leave right now, I'll turn your skull into a collection jar for the bums in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们不立刻离开，我将会拧下你的脑袋放进收藏罐里给自由城的游荡者们看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We-we'll find someplace else, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们-我们马上去找其他地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032474_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaHobosLeaveMessage aaRonnieRef.disable aaJimsCleanupMarkerParentRef.disable aaSweepParentRef.enable set aaInheritancePost08.FamilyMoved to 1 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosMoved to 1 setstage aaInheritancePost08 15 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosDealt to 1
I'm here to eat muffins and kill hobos. I'm all out of muffins. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里吃小松饼然后杀杀流浪汉。我已经吃完小松饼了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and me are going on a car ride to hell, and I'm riding shotgun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在一辆开往地狱的车上，而我担任司机为你保驾护航！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032471_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaOrphanHoboFaction playerfaction setenemy aaOrphanHoboFaction aaAndersonFaction aaRonnieRef.startcombat player
<Speech Check for diplomatic option>
ESP.TRADUIT: <外交选项口才检测>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? Work for him? I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？为他工作？我不知道怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033175_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... I got mouths to feed. We've done every type of odd job out there, so some steady work might be good for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...我得糊口饭吃。我们可以干做任何类型的工作，所以一些稳定的收入对我们来说还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033175_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. You tell Anderson that we'll sign on so long as he keeps the wages fair and throws in some food for us every now and then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。你可以告诉安德森只要他给我们工资还有食物，我们就为他工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033175_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost08.HobosDealt to 3 setstage aaInheritancePost08 10
What if you and your people signed on to work for Mr. Anderson? Everyone would benefit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和你人为安德森先生工作怎么样？这样所有人都受益。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Ronnie glares at you, clearly dismissing the idea>
ESP.TRADUIT: <罗尼对你怒目而视，显然对这个提议不屑一顾>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if you split the property? You could keep the top floor, and they would live downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们做而居如何？你们可以留在楼上，而他们呆在楼下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritanceOrphanageRonnieLeaveBribe
For that, we can find another spot. You're alright stranger. Take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来，我们找到了另一种解决方式。一路顺风，陌生人。保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032E7B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaHobosLeaveMessage player.removeitem caps001 500 aaRonnieRef.disable aaJimsCleanupMarkerParentRef.disable aaSweepParentRef.enable set aaInheritancePost08.FamilyMoved to 1 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosMoved to 1 setstage aaInheritancePost08 15 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosDealt to 1
Here, this ought to be enough to buy some food and shelter - somewhere else. <Pay 500 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这些足够买一些食物和衣服 - 或者别的了。<支付500瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bring... 500 caps. Then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要拿出...500个瓶盖。然后我们就可以谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003316C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you be willing to leave in exchange for caps? I could gather some and return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们愿意以一些瓶盖作为离开的交换吗？我可以负担一些路费。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritanceOrphanageRonnieLeaveIntimidate
Whoa, this was temporary, you know? Just a stopover, nothing more. We'll be out of your hair, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，这只是暂时的，你知道吗？只是个落脚处罢了。我们会离开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003316E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaHobosLeaveMessage aaRonnieRef.disable aaJimsCleanupMarkerParentRef.disable aaSweepParentRef.enable set aaInheritancePost08.FamilyMoved to 1 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosMoved to 1 setstage aaInheritancePost08 15 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosDealt to 1
If you don't leave, I'll break your neck and leave you for the rats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们不离开的话。我就会扭断你的脖子，拿你喂老鼠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bitch, don't ever try to bulldog a hobo with a shotgun. Take your threats and shove them up your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗屎，永远也不要尝试拿着一把猎枪对着一个愤怒的流浪汉。带着你的威胁见鬼去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003316F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get moving, or things will get awfully physical around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶紧滚，否则这里将会发生可怕的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritanceOrphanageRonnieLeaveIntelligence
Fiends? Damn, I thought there was just a few bandits, nothing major. I'm not very keen on tangling with those savages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮？该死的，我认为他们只不过一些土匪罢了，不是主要的问题。我不是很喜欢跟他们纠缠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003316B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't really think about the food and what not. Figured we'd leach off Westside. Damn, I guess we'll have to keep moving on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能保证食物之类的东西，也许我们会埋葬在西区。该死的，我才我们不得不离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003316B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaHobosLeaveMessage aaRonnieRef.disable aaJimsCleanupMarkerParentRef.disable aaSweepParentRef.enable set aaInheritancePost08.FamilyMoved to 1 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosMoved to 1 setstage aaInheritancePost08 15 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosDealt to 1
You've got no food or water source, and Fiends are roaming outside. You sure you want to stay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们没有水也没有食物，而且恶魔帮还在附近游荡。你确定你们能坚持下来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been scrounging every which way for months. We'll find what we need. At least here there's a roof over our heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这几个月里，我们到处在乞讨。我们会找到我们需要的物资的。至少我们这里还能有个房顶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003316D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you really want to live off roaches and rats in here? You're better off somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定你要跟老鼠还有蟑螂住在一起吗？你最好去别的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritanceOrphanageRonnieGotMoney
For that, we can find another spot. You're alright stranger. Take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来，我们找到了另一种解决方式。一路顺风，陌生人。保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033459_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaHobosLeaveMessage player.removeitem caps001 500 aaRonnieRef.disable aaJimsCleanupMarkerParentRef.disable aaSweepParentRef.enable set aaInheritancePost08.FamilyMoved to 1 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosMoved to 1 setstage aaInheritancePost08 15 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosDealt to 1
I managed to get some caps together. <Pay 500 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我弄了一些瓶盖。<支付500瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00032470_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I convinced Ronnie and the squatters to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确信罗尼和流浪汉们离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hot damn! We'll get started on renovating the place right away! Thanks so much for your help, stranger. I hope you check back in later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！我们将立刻开始整理这个地方！感谢你的帮助，陌生人。我希望你以后能回来看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033170_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost08 170 set aaInheritancePost08.FamilyMoved to 1 player.additem caps001 100
I killed the squatters. This house is clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死了那些非法居民。这个屋子已经清理干净了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, they're all dead? God, they may have been hobos, but they sure as hell didn't deserve that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，他们都死了吗？天呐，他们虽然是些流浪汉，但是不应该受到那样的对待！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033174_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to be getting the property, but please... stay away from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴得到了这栋楼房，但是请...离我们远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRonnieRef.disable aaJimsCleanupMarkerParentRef.disable aaSweepParentRef.enable set aaInheritancePost08.FamilyMoved to 1 setstage aaInheritancePost08 180
aaInheritanceOprhanageJamesMoveOnBribe
With that kind of cash, I can probably make a payment on a new lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了这笔钱，我们能够有个新的开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003345F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your money, stranger. We'll make due somewhere else. Best of luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你给的钱，陌生人。我们会用在别的地方。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_0003345F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 1000 setstage aaInheritancePost08 160 showmessage aaAndersonsLeftMessage aaJamesAndersonRef.disable
There are plenty of other spots in the Mojave. This should cover your expenses. <Pay 1,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维还有其他不错的地方。这些应该足够你们的用的。<支付1,000瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritanceOprhanageJamesMoveOnSpeech
You got no idea what we went through to get here, stranger. Dammit to hell, this what I was worried would happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道我们经历了什么才来到了这儿，陌生人。真他妈的该死，这些事情真是我最害怕发生的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033463_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a dumb, crazy dream. I should have known better. We've got enough to make it back to California, I guess. Maybe we can start over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个愚蠢，疯狂的梦想。我本该知道会这样的。我猜我们还有足够的资本回到加州。也许我们可以重新开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033463_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost08 160 showmessage aaAndersonsLeftMessage aaJamesAndersonRef.disable
This is on the edge of the frontier. It's a dangerous place. Do you really want your family here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是边境，是个危险的地方。你真想让你的家人在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we sacrificed too much to get here. That building is our future, so help me God. Nothing you say will change that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们为此牺牲了太多。这栋房子就是我们的未来，愿上帝帮助我。不管你说什么都改变不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033464_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, if you don't like it, you can get out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，如果你不喜欢这里，你可以离开！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritanceOprhanageJamesMoveOnBarter
Christ, don't do this, not with my family here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 基督啊，别这样，不要对我们这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033460_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We, we'll go. Just don't hurt us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们，我们会离开的。只不过别伤害我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033460_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost08 160 RewardKarma -50 showmessage aaAndersonsLeftMessage aaJamesAndersonRef.disable
Start moving or I'll rip your guts out in front of your entire family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶紧离开，否则我会在你的家人面前把你撕成碎片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you simple? You can't intimidate us, stranger. We've got almighty God and the NCR looking out for us. Your threats are worth panther piss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是蠢货吗？你恐吓不到我们，陌生人。万能的上帝和NCR都在注视着我们。你的威胁好比豹尿一般的威士忌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033461_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave or I'll bash your brains in like a bag of fucking carrots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开这里，否则我将像打烂一袋胡萝卜那样打烂你的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ronnie says they're willing to work for you if you let them stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗尼说，如果你让他们留下，他们可以为你工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hobos? You can't be serious. I want them gone, not living next to me! I can't imagine being around those wretches every damn day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 流浪汉？你别这么认真。我想让他们滚，而不是跟他们做邻居！我不敢设想跟那些卑鄙的人共度该死的每一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033176_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighs, groans}The hell of it is that I will need manpower to get this place up and running. I just never imagined I'd be turning to hobos.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sighs, groans}该死的是，我需要人手来打理运营这个地方。我只是没有想到我会求助于流浪汉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033176_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, stranger, you win. I'll put them on the payroll, and give them food and board. They better not slack off, though. I won't tolerate loafing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好比，陌生人，你赢了。我会付给他们薪水，并供他们吃住。他们最好别偷懒，我不能忍受游手好闲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOp_00033176_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost08 190 aaJimsCleanupMarkerParentRef.disable aaSweepParentRef.enable set aaInheritancePost08.FamilyMoved to 1 set aaInheritancePost08.HobosMoved to 1
aaInheritanceOrphangeJamesHireHobosSpeech
aaInheritanceOrphangeJamesHireHobosBribe
aaInheritanceOrphangeJamesHireHobosIntel
The Andersons want you out, but I'm not keen on helping them. What are my options?
ESP.TRADUIT: 安德森希望你离开，但是我不想帮他们。我们有什么办法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I didn't see that coming. I just assumed you were some hardass merc sent in here to give us the boot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我不希望那种事情发生。我还以为你受雇来赶我们走的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003345C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can convince them to move on, we would have this place to ourselves. I don't have much to offer, but we'd be obliged to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你可以说服他们离开，这里就能归我们所有了。我没有太多的佣金，但是我们会感激你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003345C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you do, don't get violent with them. Wiping out a family of NCR settlers would bring down a shitstorm from the government.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你怎么做，别用暴力手段对付他们。抹掉一个移民家庭会让NCR政府派来城管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003345C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just lay some charm on them, see if they'll go. If you pull it off, we'll get some type of compensation together - I can promise you that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只用情理说服他们离开。如果你办到了，我们会给你一些报酬 - 我可以做出承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_0003345C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaInheritancePost08 7 1
The Andersons have moved on. The building is yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安德森一家已经离开了。这房子是你的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just peeked outside and saw them packing up. I couldn't believe it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚才看到他们离开了。我简直不敢相信！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have much to offer in the way of caps, but I may have something better for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有太多的瓶盖作为报酬，但是我有一些更好的东西给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this shotgun. I was keeping it for close encounters, but I'm hoping we're past that point now. Take care of yourself, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这是个猎枪。我一直贴身收藏着它，但是我想我该跟它说再见了。一路保重，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost08.HoboRewarded to 1 aaRonnieRef.removeitem aaWeapHoboShotgun 1 player.additem aaWeapHoboShotgun 1 50
I'd like to see your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely. Here's what I've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对可以。这是我的全部东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu 50
aaInheritancePost08JamesMOVEDIN
Yeah, thanks to you, partner. It's not always easy going, but there's enough trade around here to keep us afloat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，谢谢你，伙计。虽然并不总是很兴隆，但是这里买卖足够让我们的事业保持良好运作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're always welcome here, any time of day. If you need to trade, I'll cut you a discount. It's the least I can do after what you've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们永远欢迎你的到来。如果你需要买东西，我可以给你打个折。这是我最起码能够报答你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like your business is up and running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你的事业已经开始运转了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I have to crack a few heads every now and then, but Ronnie and his crew are working out alright. We've been blessed with a lot of business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们时常会遇到一些挑衅的人，不过罗尼和他的小伙伴们工作很不错。我们已经有很多生意了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're always welcome here, any time of day. If you need to trade, I'll cut you a discount. It's the least I can do after what you've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们永远欢迎你的到来。如果你需要买东西，我可以给你打个折。这是我最起码能够报答你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Anderson [03030F9F] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritanceJims.JimsStatus to 5 startquest aaInheritanceJims02
It looks like everything worked out between you and Ronnie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你的事业已经开始运转了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritanceOrphanageRonniePEON
Yeah, but this ain't all it's cracked up to be. I'm working like a fucking dog for that taskmaster sonofabitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，不过不全是。我像个死狗一样为那婊子养的工头工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He drives a hard bargain, let me tell you. Some of the group already ran off to Westside, looking for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，他很会精打细算。一些人为了找工作已经离开西区了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C5E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But in the end the pay is steady and the food is good. We can't complain. Thanks for setting this up, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但总体来说稳定的收入和食物总归是好的。我们不该埋怨。谢谢你这样安排，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ronnie [0303215E] (mod) Quest : ([03032A42]aaInheritancePost08) Gimme Shelter EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritanceOr_00033C5E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like everything worked out between you and the Andersons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你跟安德森之间的已经没事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Qui tacet consentire videtur... ubi loqui debuit ac potuit.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaSeverusFaction playerfaction aaSeverusRef.startcombat player
aaInheritancePost06SeverusDontKnow
You don't understand. I freed the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不明白。我释放了那些奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quid? Morere!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Severus [0302D053] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaSeverusFaction playerfaction aaSeverusRef.startcombat player
aaInheritancePost07CourierIntro01
<The courier silently produces a letter>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使默默的递给你一封信>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [030373E1] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost07.MessageSent to 2
Wait, what is this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，这是什么？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [030373E1] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaGrantNote01 1
aaCourier04Ref.evp setstage aaInheritancePost07 5
Hold on, zombie, what is this all about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，僵尸，这是怎么回事？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [030373E1] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaGrantNote01 1
aaCourier04Ref.evp setstage aaInheritancePost07 5
<The courier stares back at you>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使盯着你>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [030373E1] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost07.CourierStared to aaInheritancePost07.CourierStared + 1
<Stare at the courier>
ESP.TRADUIT: <盯着信使>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <The courier blinks and begins to tremble>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使眨了眨眼并开始发抖>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [030373E1] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaGrantNote01 1
PlaySound UIWildWasteland showmessage WildWastelandMessage ;killactor aaCourier04Ref 1 killactor aaCourier04Ref 13 setstage aaInheritancePost07 5
RIDE THE SNAKE!
<The courier blinks, then makes an obscene gesture>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使眨眼了，然后做了一个下流的手势>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [030373E1] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaGrantNote01 1
setstage aaInheritancePost07 5
<Stare at the courier>
ESP.TRADUIT: <盯着信使>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here about the letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我因信件而来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's you! I just... I pictured you differently, you know? I'm so glad you decided to meet with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是你！我只不过...我猜想过你的不同之处，你知道吗？我很高兴你决定跟我见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The letter gave a generalized view of what I'm trying to accomplish, but I'll give you some specifics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信里只是大致的说了一下我想要做的事情，我会跟你说说具体的内容。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373FD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Syndicate gone, the Fiends are relying strictly on the Khans for their drugs, which means an uneven supply and price gouging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着辛迪加的覆灭，恶魔帮现在完全依靠着大汗帮供给的药品，这意味着不平衡的供给和哄抬物价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373FD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has had a two-fold effect: some Fiends are becoming more radical in an attempt to finance their habit, while others... are trying to get clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有着双重的影响：一些恶魔帮将会为了他们的嗜好变得更加激进，而其他的...想要戒毒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373FD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I'd like to do... with your help... is to build a clinic near Westside that would offer rehabilitation services for the Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要做的事情...需要你的帮助...我要建立一个临近西区的诊所，专门为恶魔帮提供康复服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373FD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We would also like to provide medical services to Westside residents, and host a halfway house for former Fiends trying to re-integrate into society.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还会为西区的居民提供药品，并将诊所作为恶魔帮融入社会的中转站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373FD_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over time, I believe that we can whittle away at the Fiends' ranks. Of course, this isn't going to pay for itself. That's where you come in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着时间的推移，我相信我们能够削减恶魔帮的数量。显然，这不足以负担开销。这就需要你的帮助了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000373FD_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost07.GrantGreeted to 1
Alright, I'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会帮助你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for this. We can talk money later. Right now the pressing issue is the site for the rehab center.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你这么做。我们稍后谈谈钱的事。现在最要紧的是康复中心的地点问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000387F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's an old building south of the Thorn. I've done some checking, and neither Westside, the NCR, or anyone else has a stake in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 荆棘城的南边有个废弃的建筑。我注意了一下，既没有西区居民也没有NCR的人在那里住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000387F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From what I hear, even the Fiends won't go inside. When I heard that, it got me wondering. It could be tribal superstition... or something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打听到，连恶魔帮的人都不会进那里面。当时打听的时候，我觉得很奇怪。我认为这是部落的迷信思想作怪...或者其他之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000387F0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, when you get a chance, please scout out the property and see what's behind those rumors. It's probably nothing, but I just want to be certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你可以碰碰运气，请调查一下那栋房子看看那里到底有什么。很可能什么都没有，我只不过想确定一下而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000387F0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, and thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000387F0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 10
Why should I help the Fiends? It seems counter-intuitive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为什么要帮助恶魔帮？这有种违和感。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's been the gut reaction of a lot of people, including some of the Followers. However, when you stop to think about it, this makes sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人通常都会这么想，甚至包括追随者。不管怎样，你停止猜测吧，这是有道理的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me put all my cards on the table - I used to be a Fiend. I got caught up in it at a young age, and it almost killed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你透露一下我的底吧 - 我曾是恶魔帮的一员。在我年轻的时候的我曾沉沦过，那几乎摧毁了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the Followers found me, I was beaten, broken, and strung-out. They pulled me from the brink, got me on track. Then they gave me an education.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当追随者找到我的时候，我四肢无力，身体虚弱，还有毒瘾。他们将我从悬崖边拉了回来，让我走上正轨。然后他们让我有了受教育的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't make excuses for the Fiends' actions, but they're still human - most of them. The majority are just in it for drugs and the camaraderie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想为恶魔帮的行为找借口，但是他们仍是人类 - 大多数都是。大多数人只是深陷毒品和同性恋的之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe we can save most of them with treatment. For every Fiend we rehabilitate, we save countless bystanders who would've been victims.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信我们可以治疗并拯救他们。我们每拯救一个恶魔帮的人，就能拯救数不尽的受害的路人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fiends are a disease. The only treatment is lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮是一个毒瘤。唯一的治疗方式就是死亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's... I thought you were different, but you're just another dumb drifter. New Vegas is better off without cunts like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那真是...我认为你与众不同，但是你不过只另一种愚蠢的流浪汉罢了。新维加斯没有你们这些荡妇会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039960_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 200
Why do you want my help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你要我帮忙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We saw how you handled the Syndicate. That's no everyday occurence. A lot of people are better off because of what you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们看到你是怎样处理辛迪加的。这不是每天都发生。会有许多的人因为你所做的事而过的更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got guts... and money. We need both to get this thing off the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有胆量...和金钱。我们需要这两样东西才能开始行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to help you. End of story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会帮助你。就是这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Angry, disappointed}You don't get it, do you? We could've helped these people, healed them. All you know how to do is hurt them. Fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Angry, disappointed}你不要这样，好吗？我们可以帮助这些人，治愈他们。你很清楚这样会伤害他们，去你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 200
aaInheritancePost07CadyIntro01
I hope the rats weren't too much for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望那些老鼠对你来说不算太多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably not much different than taking down the Syndicate, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然可能跟解决辛迪加没太多不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003995C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost07.CadyGreeted to 1
Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Cady. I'm with the Rangers, on my first tour here in Vegas. Hell of a place, I must admit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫凯迪。我跟随着游骑兵们，这是我第一次旅行到这里。该死的地方，我必须承认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039968_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out of my way, shitkicker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别挡道，乡巴佬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slow down, rat king. I've got some business with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 慢下来，捕鼠王。我想跟你做一些交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slow down, rat queen. I've got some business with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 慢下来，捕鼠女王。我想跟你做一些交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My job here is simple. Kill as many Fiends as possible, through any means necessary. It's a special assignment, given to me after my work up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的工作很简单。尽可能杀死更多恶魔帮，不择手段。在我来北方后，这还真是个特殊的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039969_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I got a reputation for hunting and killing raiders through unconventional methods. Some are hung up on shooting them, but dead is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，我通过非常规的手段搜索并杀死袭击者来获得声望。有些时候仅仅因为兴趣就射杀他们，但死亡就是死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039969_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the 80's, for example. Bunch of bloody heathens, spread all over. I took down one of their camps by poisoning their water supply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就拿80号公路来说吧。残忍的野蛮人到处都是。我采用向水源投毒的方式端掉了他们的一个营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039969_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That brings me to our business. I see that you're helping the Followers set this clinic up. That's good, real good. Westside could use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那使我想到了我们的交易。我知道你在帮助追随者建立诊所。那很好，真的很好。西区可以用到它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the Fiends, I have other plans. I've got a pal over in OSI who can hook me up with some "altered" Fixer and Jet. The kind used in rehab.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于恶魔帮，我有另一个计划。我有一个在OSI的朋友可以帮我订到一些“改造的”稳定剂和杰特。这种东西可以用于治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039969_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to make sure this clinic uses my supplier, and that a doctor of our choosing is put in charge. Then we'll give the Fiends their medicine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这个诊所能使用我们的供应品，而这我们的一位医生要求的。此外我们会给那些恶魔帮成员提供药品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039969_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about Grant? He wants to run the clinic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰特怎么样？他想要经营诊所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grant? That hippie thinks he can magically cure the Fiends and rescue Westside with peace and love. Bleeding heart dumbass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰特？那个可笑的家伙认为他可以治疗恶魔帮并拯救西区于水火之中。软心肠的傻蛋罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003996A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What he doesn't understand is that Westside won't forgive or forget, and most of those Fiends can't be saved, no matter what you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不明白的是，西区绝不原谅绝不忘记，而其不管你做什么事，大多数恶魔帮成员无法被拯救。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003996A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're a bunch of rabid puppies, drooling and biting, foaming out of their asses. The only cure is to stomp their little puppy skulls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是一群狂暴的野狗，留着口水呲着牙。唯一的治疗方式就是踩碎他们的狗头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003996A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it means taking out Fiends, you can count me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能解决恶魔帮，你可以算我一份。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Just keep on going with Grant's plan, getting this place set up. Once the clinic is open, look me up at McCarran. We'll go from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。继续坚持格兰特的计划吧，在这个地方建立诊所。一旦诊所建成，来麦卡伦看我。我们将从那儿赶来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaInheritancePost07.CadyGreeted to 2 showmessage aaCadyGoToMCMessage aaCadyRef.moveto McCarranFieldMarker aaCadyRef.evp set aaInheritancePost07.ChoseCady to 1
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 36 endif
I'm not interested in your plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你的计划不感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, just sleep on it. You think long and hard about what those Fiends have done to people around here, then give me answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，先搁一边吧。你仔细想想那些恶魔帮对人们所作的事情。然后再回答我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the clinic is open and you come back to your senses, look me up at McCarran. We'll go from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦诊所运营起来，而你又改变了主意，那就来麦卡伦看我。我们会从那里赶来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaInheritancePost07.CadyGreeted to 2 showmessage aaCadyGoToMCMessage aaCadyRef.moveto McCarranFieldMarker aaCadyRef.evp
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 36 endif
This plan seems to run counter to the principles of the NCR, not to mention the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个计划看起来和NCR的原则背道而驰，更不用说天启追随者了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? As opposed to let them run amuck? Fiends murder, rape, and rampage all over, and you want to talk about principles?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？难道让他们肆意妄为？恶魔帮谋杀，强奸并且四处横行。而你却跟我谈原则？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003996C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If any of those pacifist douchebags in the Followers feel so strongly about saving the Fiends, let them take a mission trip to Vault 3.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有任何追随者的和平主义者坚决要挽救恶魔帮，那让他们去3号避难所执行任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003996C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, they're nice and cozy in their little fort, curing the clap and handing out suppositories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他们放荡并舒适的住在他们的小巢穴中，治疗花柳病并分发毒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003996C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I get for going along with your plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能从你的计划中得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, besides the appreciation of the New California Republic...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，除了欣赏新加州共和国...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003996E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe some payment would be in order, and maybe even an item or two you can't get anywhere else, courtesy of the Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以提供一些符合规定的物品，甚至有游骑兵的东西，我保证你在其它地方都买不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003996E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any reason you're so cynical? It seems like the clinic would save a few Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么原因使你如此的挖苦？是这家诊所只不过来有几个恶魔帮罢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few? Maybe. But what happens for these few afterwards? Are they welcomed back into society with open arms?
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个？或许。但是然后会发生什么？欢迎他们回归社会并热情拥抱吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think will happen when some shopkeeper in Westside sees the asshole who robbed him last year? Or notices his wife's killer? Shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当一些西区的店主看到在去年抢劫他的混蛋的时候你认为会发生什么？或者注意一下他的妻子的凶手？狗屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039970_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine taking the average Fiend... clean him up and throw him in society. He'd be a walking clusterfuck. You just can't change human nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一下将那些普通的恶魔帮...清理干净并丢到社会中去。他将会成为一个行走的狗屎。你不能改变人类的天性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会考虑的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok. All I ask is that you keep this to yourself, but continue with Grant's plan for the time being, if only for appearances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。所有的决定在于你，不过暂时先跟着格兰特的计划走，面子上的工作还是要做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the clinic is open, look me up at McCarran if you change your mind. We'll go from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦诊所运营了，如果你改变了主意，那就来麦卡伦看我。我们会从那里赶来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaInheritancePost07.CadyGreeted to 2 showmessage aaCadyGoToMCMessage aaCadyRef.moveto McCarranFieldMarker aaCadyRef.evp
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 36 endif
The building had a rat problem, but I took care of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大楼里有老鼠，但我处理了这个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rats? Those filthy creatures trigger my gag reflex for some reason. Thanks for purging them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老鼠？那些肮脏的生物引起了我的呕吐反应。感谢你清除了它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But with that building secured, we can get to the real issue: funding. Specifically, 5,000 caps to get this off the ground. Are you still with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是随着防卫大楼，我们有了一个实际的问题：资金。确切的说，需要5000瓶盖来进行实施。你还会依旧帮助我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C57_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 30
You're doing a wonderful thing for the Followers, for this community. I'll begin the preparations immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为追随者和社区做了一件极好的事情。我马上开始准备工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, you should round up our first set of patients. I know of a Fiend hideout south of Westside, where a group is holed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在次期间，你需要聚集起我们的第一组病人。我知道在西区的南边有个恶魔帮的藏身处，那里躲藏了一群人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C5B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check them out, and see if you can convince them to submit to treatment. Oh, and try to avoid killing them, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 找出他们，并看看你是否能说服他们顺从治疗。噢，还有尽量避免杀死他们，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C5B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 35 player.removeitem caps001 5000
Here are the caps to fund the clinic. <Pay 5,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是资助诊所的瓶盖。<支付5,000瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's perfectly understandable. Just speak with me when you get the cash together, and we'll go from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是无可厚非的。等你有了足够的现金再跟我谈谈吧，并且我们将从那里出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have 5,000 caps with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有5,000个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07GrantDontHaveCaps
I ran into a guy named Cady. He wants to use the clinic as a means to poison the Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我碰见了一个叫做凯迪的家伙，他想利用诊所来对恶魔帮下毒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cady? That butcher is here? Jesus, I heard about what he did up north, killing groups of the 80's, even women and children. He's a monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯迪？那个该死的混蛋在这里？耶稣啊，我听说过他在北方干的事情，他在80号公路上杀戮，不论妇女儿童。他是个怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew the NCR wouldn't leave us alone. Damn them to hell for this. We'll have to find some way to deal with him. I need to think on this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道NCR不想让我们有清闲的时候。该死的。我们必须想办法解决下他。我需要思量一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C5D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, we'll continue as planned. Do you have the caps together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 与此同时，我们照计划行事。你带来瓶盖了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039C5D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost07.ChoseGrant to 1
aaInheritancePost07BuckyIntro01
Al, you better have some Jet for us...
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾尔，你最好有一些杰特给我们...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039FA2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Al? Who the fuck are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾尔在哪？你他妈是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00039FA2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost07.BuckyGreeted to 1
Rehab? You mean like quitting drugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 戒瘾？你是指消除毒瘾？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A576_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... that's a good one. Are you fucking high? You walk into a Fiend den and tell them to get clean? Sure, right after we get back from church.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...那真是巧妙的笑话。你欣喜若狂了吗？你跑进恶魔帮的巢穴并告诉他们去做清洁？当然可以，不过得等我们从教堂回来之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A576_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get the fuck out of here before the joke gets old. Fucking nutjob.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在乘这笑话乏味之前滚出这里。真他妈个疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A576_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers are opening a rehab clinic for Fiends. I want all of you to check yourselves in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追随者为恶魔帮开放了一个戒瘾诊所。我想你们所有人都去检查下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're... special. I think you're in the wrong place. Can you even understand me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你真是...特别。你认为你来错地方了？你能恰当的理解我的意思吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A582_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gaunt say you Friends. Want you to kick add dicks son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 苍白的脸色表明了你是恶魔帮的一员，你想戒掉毒瘾吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to cure your addiction. You're taking twelve steps straight to hell! <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里确保你上瘾。你那12步疗法下地狱去吧！<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, psycho!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的，神经病！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A575_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaBuckyFaction playerfaction aaBuckyRef.startcombat playerref
aaInheritancePost07BuckyMedicine
Are you fucking with me, doc?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想惹我吗，医生？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A583_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to get high, you know? I didn't think about it. None of us did. I'll get checked out, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想要上瘾的感觉，你懂吗？我不在乎这个，我们都不在乎，我会结账离开的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A583_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaBuckyLeaveMessage aaBuckyRef.disable aaBuckyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 40
Rotting teeth, boils, paranoia... the Jet is showing. Keep it up and you'll be dead within the year.
ESP.TRADUIT: 腐烂的牙齿，生疮，妄想...着就是杰特所展现的。继续这样一年之内你将会死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Save your bullshit for someone who cares, fucko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留着你的废话给在意的人吧，杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A584_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem to be suffering from Captain Trips. Using Jet will exacerbate your condition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来经常产生幻觉。继续使用杰特会使你的情况恶化。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You clearly aren't ready for treatment. I'll be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你显然没有准备好治疗，我将会采取我的方式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think you've got some caps in those pockets, not to mention all the other goodies you're lugging around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我认为你已经从那些口袋得到了瓶盖，更不用说其他你背着的东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A866_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we'll just off you and take the goods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们会干掉你并拿着东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A866_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy aaBuckyFaction playerfaction aaBuckyRef.startcombat playerref aaBuckyRef.setav aggression 2
aaInheritancePost07BuckySpeech
No shit, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别废话，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A862_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back when I joined this crew, it was a blast. Getting high all day, watching Cook-Cook roast NCR troops. Now we're barely surviving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我加入这个组织那一刻起，奇迹就发生了。每天都很嗨，每天看着库克烤着NCR军人的肉。而现在我们勉强维持生计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A862_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, me and my crew will check this place out. I ain't making any promises, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我和我的人将会离开这里。虽然我做不了任何承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A862_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaBuckyLeaveMessage aaBuckyRef.disable aaBuckyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 40
It's only a matter of time before you overdose or the NCR puts you down. Get clean or die.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR处理你只是早晚的事。要走滚要么死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My first step will be putting my boot up your ass if you don't get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不赶紧滚，那么我首先要做的是将你的头踩在脚下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A863_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first step is acknowledging you have a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先要做的是承认你有病。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you five hundred caps now, and five hundred caps after the treatment. <Pay 500 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会先付给你500个瓶盖，然后在完成治疗后再付500个。<支付500个瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done. Just don't go expecting any miracles. Vegas might change, but the Fiends never do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。不过别指望任何奇迹发生。维加斯可以改变，而恶魔帮绝对不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A57D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500 showmessage aaBuckyLeaveMessage aaBuckyRef.disable aaBuckyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 40
Here, this will get you by until you get treated. <Give three vials of Jet>
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，在你康复之前会有一只有这些东西。<交出三瓶杰特>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you are fucking lifesaver!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你真他妈的的是个救星！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A57E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna push off, then we'll check out that clinic. You got my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正准备离开，然后我们会去诊所办理手续。
