ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A57E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem jet 3 showmessage aaBuckyLeaveMessage aaBuckyRef.disable aaBuckyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 40
aaInheritancePost07BuckyIntelligence
Where do you learn this stuff? That's disgusting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪学到的这些玩意儿？真令人恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A580_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll check this place out, but I'll make no promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会离开这里的，不过我不保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A580_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaBuckyLeaveMessage aaBuckyRef.disable aaBuckyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 40
Do you know what Jet is made from? Brahmin dung. You are addicted to cowshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道杰特是由什么制成的吗？双头牛屎。你在对牛屎上瘾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck, if this is what happens to me, I need to get clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，如果这是我的未来，我愿意接受医疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [03039F9E] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A581_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaBuckyLeaveMessage aaBuckyRef.disable aaBuckyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 40
Add dicks son to Jeff is bad! Fallows of pox-lips give rehash bill, tits shun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 往杰特里面加迪克森很糟糕！嘴唇周围会长满黄色的痘痘，赶紧戒掉吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07GrantFiendsFate
I knew that some of them would be willing to get treatment. Even then, I know it can be tense negotiating with Fiends for... anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他们之中有人愿意接受治疗。尽管如此，我认为与恶魔帮谈判的气氛还是很紧张...不论谈什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A868_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With your funding, we were able to get the building cleared out, and the clinic should be open shortly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了你的资金，我们就有能力清理那栋楼房了，不久之后诊所就能建成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A868_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm heading there now. Please stop by when you get a chance, and we can see if there's any work left for you. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在办理此事。如果你有时间顺便来过来一下，看看有什么你可以帮忙的地方。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003A868_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaGrantGoneToClinicMessage aaGrantRef.moveto aaRehabOpenXMarkerRef aaRehabFiendsParentRef.enable setstage aaInheritancePost07 45 set aaInheritanceRehab.Bucky to 1 aaGrantRef.evp
I convinced some of the Fiends to enter rehab.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经让一些恶魔帮成员去接受治疗了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not what I wanted. They may be addicts, but they shouldn't be gunned down like dumb animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我想要的。他们或许是毒瘾病人，但是他们不应该像牲口那样被射杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004587C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, we were here to get the building cleared out, and the clinic should be open shortly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我们在这里清理楼房，不久之后诊所就能建成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004587C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm heading there now. Please stop by when you get a chance, and we can see if there's any work left for you. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在办理此事。如果你有时间顺便来过来一下，看看有什么你可以帮忙的地方。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004587C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaGrantGoneToClinicMessage aaGrantRef.moveto aaRehabOpenXMarkerRef setstage aaInheritancePost07 45 aaGrantRef.evp
The meeting with the Fiends went bad - I was forced to kill them out of self-defence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我碰见的恶魔帮都是坏蛋 - 我不得不为了自保而杀死他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need any more help with the new clinic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 新诊所需要更多的帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's come to my attention that the NCR wants to supplant our staff and change the purpose of this clinic. Their scheme is... disturbing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我担心的是，NCR想要取代我们的工作人员，然后改变诊所的初衷。他们的计划...令人不安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B01C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man behind it all is a Ranger named Cady. He's the NCR go-to guy for purging raiders and tribals who don't bend to the Republic's demands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幕后黑手是一个叫做凯迪的游骑兵。在清理反抗共和国意志的袭击者和土人的行动中，他起着主导作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B01C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's here to exterminate the Fiends, and from what I hear he plans on using our clinic to disperse hot doses of Fixer and Jet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他来这里是为了消灭恶魔帮，而且我还听说他计划利用诊所传播大剂量的稳定剂和杰特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B01C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the Followers need... what I need... is for this Ranger to go away. I believe you have a way with people... you can make him understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追随者需要什么...我就需要什么...我想让这个游骑兵离开这里。我相信你是很有办法的人...你能让他明白的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B01C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need any more help with the new clinic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 新诊所还需要更多的帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, with Cady out of the way, I think the NCR will leave us be. Thanks for everything, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，随着凯迪不再碍事之后，我相信NCR不会再打扰我们了。感谢你，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B307_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It should go without saying that if you need supplies, medical treatment, anything... you're always welcome here. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要什么，说就行，药品，治疗之类的不在话下...你永远受我们欢迎。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B307_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 190
Yeah, I've been thinking about Cady, the ranger you mentioned. We can't ignore him any more. Word has gotten around about his scheme.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我在想凯迪的事情，就是那个你说到的游骑兵。我们不能再忽视他了。要想办法阻止他的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B308_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the Followers need... what I need... is for this Ranger to go away. I believe you have a way with people... you can make him understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追随者需要什么...我就需要什么...我想让这个游骑兵离开这里。我相信你是很有办法的人...你能让他明白的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B308_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, are you asking me to kill Cady?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你要求我杀死凯迪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm asking you to do whatever it takes to make him back off. If he goes ahead with this plan, it could kill hundreds, many of them innocent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要求你不惜一切代价设法让他回心转意。如果他执行了这个计划，那将会杀死上百个无辜者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B029_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll make sure Cady is out of the picture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我保证让凯迪消失。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reason with the man if you can. If he won't listen... God help him. It's the life of one Ranger weighed against... hundreds. Do what you must.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果可能的话，尽量说服那个人。如果他不愿意听..上帝会保佑他的。这是一个游骑兵的生命与...数百人的性命进行权衡。你知道该怎么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B028_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 50
I don't like where this is headed. I only signed up to help the clinic, not to do your dirty work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这种趋势。我的合约上只是帮助诊所，而不是为你做脏活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like it, but this is the only way to be sure... it's the best option for the people of Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这样，但是这无疑是唯一的办法...这是西区人民最好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B027_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I understand if you have your doubts, but the Followers need you on this one. Do it, and I'll be in your debt. Just think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，我能理解你的疑惑，但是追随者此刻需要你。去做吧，而我会付报酬给你。请考虑下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B027_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07CadyOPENPlan
Of course. I've already got my man and the loaded drugs all lined up, all that needs to happen is for Grant and his crew to skedaddle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我的人和货物已经就绪，现在只欠东风 - 只要格兰特和他的人离开就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B30C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not unusual for the Followers and the NCR to butt heads, but you need to tread lightly. Don't get bloody on this. Just scare him off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是寻常的追随者与NCR之间的冲突，你需要小心处理。别发生流血事件。只让他离开就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B30C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that said, if you have exhausted every option and he still won't leave, then do what you have to, but be discreet. Now get it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着，如果你用尽了全部的办法，而他还是不肯离开的话，可以做你不得不做的失去，但是要谨慎。开始行动吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B30C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 55
The clinic is open. I've decided to go ahead with your plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诊所开张了。我决定照着你的计划行事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers know about your plan. You need to leave town, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追随者知道了你的计划。你需要离开小镇，现在就走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna save the poor, innocent Fiends and make peace with Westside, all at the same time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既要拯救那些穷，又要让无知的恶魔帮要跟西区和平相处，这可能同时做到吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B314_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's bullshit, kid. You might weaken the Fiends, but you won't stop them. Someone worse might even take their place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简直是吹牛，伙计。你可以削弱恶魔帮，但你不能让他们停止吸毒。会有更坏的人取代他们的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B314_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The solution is to destroy them, make an example for all to see. Maybe in that sense I admire old Caesar. He doesn't take half-measures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解决方案就是消灭他们，做给其他人看。从某种意义上我佩服老凯撒。他不会用不彻底方式办事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B314_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're leaving right now - in a pine box. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你马上就会离开了 - 在一个棺材里。<攻击>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCadyRef.startcombat player player.startcombat aaCadyRef
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07CadyLeaveSpeech
Maybe, but it's damn near guaranteed to work. But... I know what you're saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许，但是在有护卫的地方工作不好办。但是...我明白你的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most people are dumber than a Brahmin. Unless you decapitate one hundred Fiends in front of them, people will refuse to believe we did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人比双头牛更愚蠢。除非你让他们亲眼看见你杀死一百个恶魔帮的人，否则他们不会相信我们做到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, the brass seems committed to using bounty hunters. I thinks it's all a con, turning in nappy fingers for cash and calling it a victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，那些政客致力于雇佣赏金猎人。我觉得那是完全是种诈骗，交出手指换取赏金居然还称之为胜利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fiends are like one of those... snake things... with the head that grows back. Only way to stop it is to burn that fucker whole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮像那些...蛇之类的东西...砍掉头还会长出来。阻止他们的唯一方式就是让他们全都玩完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mark my words, Courier: you keep cutting off heads, and eventually some big, bad motherfucker will grow back and eat your ass whole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住我的话，邮差。你砍掉了他们的头，但是最终一些邪恶的混账东西会重新长出来并吃掉你的整个屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, I'll go back to hunting 80's up north. Nobody every complained about that. Take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时，我会回到80号公路上巡逻。不应该怨天尤人。你多小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaCadyLeftMojaveMessage aaCadyRef.disable aaCadyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 52
With your plan the NCR won't be credited for killing the Fiends. People will attribute it to drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的计划不会使消灭恶魔帮的功劳归于NCR，人们会归功于毒品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty hunters? Useless as tits on a gecko. I wipe my ass with those stupid fucking posters, spread all over creation by some retard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金猎人？无用的山雀之流。我用那些愚蠢的海报擦屁股，都会擦不干净某些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you think the Fiends should be left to bounty hunters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不认为恶魔帮应该交给赏金猎人处理吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would 10,000 caps convince you to leave? <Pay 10,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许10,000个瓶盖会让你离开？<支付10,000个瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ten thousand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一万？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B316_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to fund my retirement, so be it. The Followers can keep the Fiends. Nice doing business with you, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意拿钱让我退休，那就如你所愿。追随者会拯救那些恶魔帮的。祝你事业有成，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B316_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 10000 showmessage aaCadyLeftMojaveMessage aaCadyRef.disable aaCadyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 52
aaInheritancePost07CadyLeaveRep
Ok, hero. But when this goes sour, the brass will hear about it. Hippies and Fiends... you can keep them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，英雄。不过当这事出漏子的时候，那些政客就会得知的。蠢货还有恶魔帮...你都可以保护。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaCadyLeftMojaveMessage aaCadyRef.disable aaCadyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 52
[NCR Rep] You're hurting our standing in the Mojave. Go back to California, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR声望]你损害了我们在莫哈维的形象。现在会加州去，现在就走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: INCOMPLETE
aaInheritancePost07CadyLeaveIntimidate
Fuck, I'm going to California!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，我会去加州的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B318_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaCadyLeftMojaveMessage aaCadyRef.disable aaCadyRef.markfordelete setstage aaInheritancePost07 52
There's a bounty on your head: a billion unmarked traveler's checks. RUN!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的人头很值钱：一亿张无记录的商队支票。滚！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07CadyLeaveAttackCool
This is as good a day to die as any, youngster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天很适合杀人之类的，图样，图森破，年轻人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B31A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCadyRef.startcombat player player.startcombat aaCadyRef
I didn't want to do it this way, but you've left me no choice. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想按这种方式做事，但是你让我没有选择。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07CadyTURNIN
Excellent. I'll send word to my man that he can get moved in. You've done the NCR a service, and we won't soon forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我会转告我的人让他们进来。你为NCR做的事，我们不会忘记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B320_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As promised, here's your due, along with an extra "something". As for me, I'm off to California. Take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如所承诺的，这是你的报酬，还有一些特别的“东西”。是我从加州带来的。保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B320_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCadyRef.removeitem aaCadyRepeater 1

player.additem caps001 2000 player.additem aaCadyRepeater 1 75 setstage aaInheritancePost07 180 showmessage aaCadyLeftMojaveMessage aaCadyRef.disable aaCadyRef.markfordelete set aaInheritancePost07.Result to 4
I convinced Grant to hand the clinic over to the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服格兰特让NCR接管诊所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit fire, we don't need that kind of PR. Fucking maniac...
ESP.TRADUIT: 错误的射杀，我们不需要那样的人。该死的疯子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B321_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, it got the job done. Here's the payment we agreed upon. I'll see you around, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，事情办好了。这是我们协定的酬劳。后会有期，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cady [030373F3] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B321_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2000 setstage aaInheritancePost07 180 showmessage aaCadyLeftMojaveMessage aaCadyRef.disable aaCadyRef.markfordelete set aaInheritancePost07.Result to 3
I was forced to kill Grant. The clinic is yours now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被迫杀死了格兰特。现在诊所是你的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07GrantTURNIN
Good, I know it wouldn't have been easy getting through to a stubborn hick like Cady. With him out of the picture, we can focus on the clinic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我知道说服一个像凯迪那样的蠢驴不是件容易的事。随着他的消失，我们可以致力于诊所了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004587B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't hesitate to come back if you need anything. We couldn't have done this without you, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要什么东西，不要客气。如果没有你，我们不会成功，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004587B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 190
I convinced Cady to leave the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我让凯迪离开莫哈维了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighing}God, I just hope this doesn't come back on us. The Followers are under enough pressure from the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sighing}天呐，我只是希望他不在缠着我们。追随者会将会受到来自NCR的压力的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00045E53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The important thing is that this clinic stays open, for the greater benefit of Westside and New Vegas. You did a good thing, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过最为西区和新维加斯最重要的事情是，诊所依然在运营。你做了一件好事，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00045E53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need anything, don't hesitate to ask. You're always welcome here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要任何东西，不要客气。你永远受到欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00045E53_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 190
I was forced to kill Cady. He's out of the picture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被迫杀死了凯迪。他人间蒸发了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07GrantLeaveIntro
What? You mean you're actually siding with Cady? The man is a thug... a fascist!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你是说你会支持凯迪？那个家伙是个暴徒...是个法西斯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B32C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at what we've built here! Why in the hell would I leave it now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看我们建造的了什么！我他妈的为什么要离开他？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B32C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to enact Cady's plan for the Clinic. You and the Followers need to leave, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在诊所执行凯迪的计划。你和那些追随者必须离开这里，立刻就走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07GrantLEAVESpeech
We really are swimming against the current here, aren't we? Maybe it was just a dumb dream, but it was real for a little while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在逆流而上，对不对？也许这只是个愚蠢的梦想，但是它至少真实存在了一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B337_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That seems to be our destiny... getting in position to help people, only to get steamrolled by the NCR. Maybe next time, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们的命运...想帮助人们，却遭到NCR不可抗拒的力量摧毁了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B337_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 57 aaGrantRef.evp
The NCR wants this clinic. It's only a matter of time before they push the Followers out.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR想要这家诊所。他们赶走追随者只是时间问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're reaching, Courier. We've invested too many resources, too much manpower to simply leave it behind. So... fuck no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢你的帮助，邮差。我们投入了太多的资源，太多的人力，不能轻易的离开。所以...他妈的不能放弃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B338_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR, fuck yeah! Unlawful seizure, fuck yeah! Get out, fuck yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR，我操！非法没收，我操！滚出去，我操！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07GrantLEAVEIntimidate
You're an animal, just like Cady. We'll leave... but you'll have to live with this. Everything comes back to you in the end, Courier. Remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个畜生，就像凯迪一样。我们会离开...而你将不得不呆在这。最终你会得到报应的，邮差。记住我说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B335_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost07 57 aaGrantRef.evp
Get out or the Followers will be treating you for a case of curb-stomp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚出这里，否则追随者将不得不为你收尸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you can intimidate me? Have you forgotten where I came from? Fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你能吓唬我？你忘了我来自哪里？操你妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B336_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out or your buddies will be patching you up for... ass-kicked... itus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚出去，否则你的小伙伴们将不得不...一块一块的...缝合你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay Caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: <付瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't... I, I...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能... 我，我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B334_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Disgusted with himself}This stays between us. Maybe I can help some people with it, even if I've failed here. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Disgusted with himself}这仅限于我们之间。尽管我在这里失败了，但也许我能用这些钱帮助一些人。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B334_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 10000 setstage aaInheritancePost07 57 aaGrantRef.evp
10,000 caps would do a lot of good in Freeside. You sure you don't want to leave? <Pay 10,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 10,000个瓶盖能在自由城做很多事。你确定你不想离开？<支付10,000个瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost07GrantLEAVERep
aaInheritancePost07GrantLEAVEMedicine
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([0302D04D]aaInheritancePost07) Fiends Anonymous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here about the letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带着信件来这。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding! I was having trouble recruiting mercs for this. Nobody wants to come near this place, like it's cursed or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真漂亮！我想招募些雇佣兵解决些麻烦。没有人想靠近这个地方，像是被诅咒了似得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't gonna lie - what the Legion did that day hurt the Rangers... hurt the entire NCR. I intend to turn the tables on those fuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想说谎 - 那天军团袭击了游骑兵...让整个NCR都痛心。我想向那些混蛋讨回本息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6AB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you agree to take part in this operation, you'll get a signing bonus of 1,000 caps, followed by 4,000 when we're finished. Are you good to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你同意参与这个计划，你就能获得1,000个瓶盖的签约费，而且在我们胜利时候还会再有4,000个瓶盖的报酬。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6AB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost09.RangerGreeted to 1
Ok, are you with us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你要和我们共事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to discuss the contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想讨论下合同的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0303B3BB] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCourier05Ref.evp
Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚蛋吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0303B3BB] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCourier05Ref.evp
aaInheritancePost09CourierStare
<The courier returns an icy glare>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使还来一个冰冷的怒视>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0303B3BB] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost09.CourierStared to aaInheritancePost09.CourierStared + 1
<Stare at the courier>
ESP.TRADUIT: <盯着信使>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <The courier returns your wink with a snarl>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使还你一个眨眼并咆哮>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0303B3BB] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCourier05Ref.startcombat player
aaCourier05Ref.placeinfaction GeneralHostileToPlayerFaction
<Wink at the courier>
ESP.TRADUIT: <向信使使眼色>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <The courier begin gesticulating wildly, initiating an unholy ceremony...>
ESP.TRADUIT: <信使开始粗鲁的指指点点，做了一个不适宜的礼仪...>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [0303B3BB] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCourier05Ref.startcombat player aaCourier05Ref.playidle ms02AntShakingFist

aaCourier05Ref.placeinfaction GeneralHostileToPlayerFaction aaCourier05Ref.placeatme aaCourierRoach 2 0 aaCourier05Ref.placeatme aaCourierRoach 2 1 aaCourier05Ref.placeatme aaCourierRoach 2 2 aaCourier05Ref.placeatme aaCourierRoach 2 3
<Wink at the courier>
ESP.TRADUIT: <向信使使眼色>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and the NCR can wipe my ass with this letter. The Mojave is better off without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和NCR可以用这封信来擦我的屁股。莫哈维没有你会更好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another Ranger told me it would be a mistake to count on some cheesedick civilian for this gig. Guess I should have listened to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个游骑兵告诉我，在这次行动中依靠一些平民是一个错误的决定。我想我本该听他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CC9A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost09 200
So you're the guy in charge, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是负责这里的家伙，对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Beaumont, commander of this little post. I was... out on patrol when the station was hit, and it's my responsibility to make it right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵博蒙特，这个小站的指挥官。当驻地遭受攻击的时候我...在巡逻，这是我的职责所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is the NCR trying to keep Ranger Station Charlie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么NCR要试图保住游骑兵检查站驻地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie is all that stands between most of the raiding parties and Novac, and it guards an important trade route.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查站是在诺瓦克和袭击者之间的一道屏障，而且它守卫一条重要的贸易商道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More importantly, the Rangers have to hold this spot after what happened. Legion gave us a black eye, so we got to show them we're still strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更重要的是，游骑兵必须知道这个地方发生了什么。军团让我们吃了亏，所以我们必须表示我们的依旧强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would we be up against?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将会面对什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of that's classified, and I can only divulge the details when you've signed on. Suffice it to say it would be a sizeable Legion detachment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一些机密，只有在你同意签署协议的时候我才会向你透露细节。我只想说这是一个规模相当大的军团部队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll take the contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会接受这个协议的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, here's your signing bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是你的签约奖金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the situation: we believe the attack on Charlie was engineered by a pair of centurions known as the "Gemini" or "Twins".
ESP.TRADUIT: 现状就是：我们认为检查站的袭击拜一对军团的百夫长所赐，他们被人称为“双子座”或者“双胞胎”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're known as Castor and Pollux, titles granted by Caesar himself for their ferocity and cunning. We don't know much else about them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们被认为是古希腊神话中的卡斯特和帕勒克，这是凯撒为他们的凶猛和狡诈授予的头衔。我们不知道更多其他关于他们的事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not long after the attack on Charlie, one of our rangers tracked a raiding party to Sharp's Cavern, which we believe is host to the twins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查站遭受攻击之后，我们的一个游骑兵跟踪到一个袭击者小队进入了夏普的洞穴，我们认为双胞胎就在里面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your mission is to reconnoiter the cave, terminate any Legion personnel present, and kill the twins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的任务是侦察那个洞穴，终结任何军团的人，并且杀死那对双胞胎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One more thing, though. You might have surmised that this is rather... personal... for the Rangers. We want the Legion to know who was responsible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一件事。你可以认为这是一个游骑兵...私人的,,,请求。我们想让军团知道谁负责这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B5_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take this note, and pin it on a prominent place after you've killed the garrison. It's got a saying in Latin which should aggravate the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着这个便条，然后在你杀死那些花火之后，将它钉在一个显眼的地方。这上面写的是拉丁语，它可以激怒军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B5_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it. Do you have any questions before setting off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。在你行动之前还有什么要问的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 1000
I need more time to think about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一点时间考虑这件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, just don't take too long, or we'll be forced to go with a different contractor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，不过别太久，否则我们会不得不考虑另一个雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003B6B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the offer, but I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你的提议，但是我不感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I misjudged you. I guess we'll have to find someone else. Thanks for meeting with me, regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认我对你估计错误。我想我们该找其他人了。不管怎样，感谢你跟我见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost09 200
Why do you want me to mutilate their corpses? Wouldn't that make us just as barbaric as the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你要我肢解他们的尸体？这样不就让我们变得像军团那样野蛮了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you're some kind of philosopher now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你现在是某类哲学家了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't seen real barbarism. I've run LRP's into Arizona, seen shit that would make your delicate little eyes bleed out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还没见过真正的野蛮。我曾去过亚利桑那州，见过该死的能让你柔弱的小眼珠鲜血迸发场景。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What they do to women and their slaves, especially in the mines... I wish I could forget it. Butchering those twin freaks is a small dose of justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他你不知道他们怎么对待女人和奴隶，特别是在矿山上...我真希望我能忘记。肢解那对双胞胎只是一次小小的审判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没别的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, Courier. Make 'em hurt... make 'em bleed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，邮差。让他们流血...让他们流血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BC9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
setstage aaInheritancePost09 10
if SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus == 1 set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 32 endif
What's the enemy's strength?
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人的规模如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not entirely sure. It's almost certainly one of their underground complexes, probably booby-trapped to hell, so watch your step.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太确定。可以肯定是那是他们的一个地下掩体，大概有该死的地雷什么的，注意脚下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BC9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The good news is that it's likely a stopover for lightly-armored, fast-moving raiding parties. You shouldn't encounter heavy infantry or veterans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是，那里似乎是轻装部队还有游击队的中转站。你应该不会碰见重装部队还有老兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BC9C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why am I going in alone? Why not take a platoon of Rangers and track them down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我要独自上路？为什么不派一队游骑兵去消灭他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever tracked a Legion party in the desert? With their conditioning, discipline, and land navigation, it's damn difficult, even for Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾在沙漠中跟踪一个军团小队，不是吗？跟着他们整顿，训练，还有行军，这太他妈困难了，甚至对游骑兵来说也是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BC9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion excels at running, hiding, waiting for a mismatch. Then they strike fast and disappear. Did at Nelson. Did it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团擅长奔跑，隐蔽，等待时机。然后他们快速袭击并消失。在纳尔逊如此。在这也如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BC9E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The surest way to beat them is to pin them down in an open battle where our firepower and tactical flexibility can fuck them up. Like at the Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在空旷的地段利用我们灵活的战术跟他们来一场战斗，是打败他们最有效的方式。就像在大坝那次一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BC9E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could call in a company of infantry, but they'd sniff them out a mile away, would be out of there in minutes. One skilled operator is perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们派军队过去，但他们在一公里外就嗅到，然后逃跑。一个精英显然更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BC9E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you pull this off right, it should draw them into attacking Charlie... except this time we'll be waiting for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你办到了，那就跟检查站那次袭击扯平了...不过这次是我们在守株待兔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BC9E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should an opportunity arise, do you want me to take prisoners?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有机会，你需要我弄几个俘虏吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We ain't in the prisoner-takin' business; we in the killing Legion business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不负责俘虏的工作；我们只做杀军团的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003BCA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09KoestlerIntro01
Beg your pardon, Courier. I'd like a minute of your time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅，邮差。我想占用你一点时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CC9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 1
What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be brief. I work for an unnamed agency within the NCR, and I'm conducting an investigation into Ranger's Beaumont.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会长话短说的。我在为NCR的一个未知机构工作，我来这是为了调查游骑兵博蒙特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a lot of questions surrounding the Legion attack here, and my superiors are concerned about Beaumont's ability to command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有许多问题随着军团的袭击而来，而我的上司担心博蒙特的指挥能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some members of the brass want to scapegoat Beaumont for what happened, while others want to take a hard look at him first, see if it's justified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些政客想让博蒙特成为替罪羊，而其他人想先认真观察他一下，看看他是否无罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As an outsider, you're a bit more objective than the Rangers or other troops. I'd like for you to check in with me after the mission is finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个外来人，你相较于游骑兵还有骑警来说还算是站在客观立场上。我想让你在任务结束之后向我汇报一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want the facts as well as your own evaluation. Is he a capable leader? Does he seem mentally stable? Is he following command's instructions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望事实尽可能的接近你自己的观点。他是否个有能力的指挥官？他是否有心理疾病？他是否遵循命令？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just talk to me when the dust settles, let me know how he held up. If you can do that, there's a bonus waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在混乱结束后跟我谈谈，让我知道他是个什么样的人。如果你能办到，那么会有一大笔赏金等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is information, and you get paid. It's as simple as that. Can I count on you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要的是信息，而你获得酬劳。这很简单。我可以指望你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA7_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can it, shitbird. There's Legionaries that need killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 住口，傻鸟。现在最要紧的是消灭军团部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be brief. I work for an unnamed agency within the NCR, and I'm conducting an investigation into Ranger's Beaumont.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会长话短说的。我在为NCR的一个未知机构工作，我来这是为了调查游骑兵博蒙特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a lot of questions surrounding the Legion attack here, and my superiors are concerned about Beaumont's ability to command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有许多问题随着军团的袭击而来，而我的上司担心博蒙特的指挥能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some members of the brass want to scapegoat Beaumont for what happened, while others want to take a hard look at him first, see if it's justified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些政客想让博蒙特成为替罪羊，而其他人想先认真观察他一下，看看他是否无罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As an outsider, you're a bit more objective than the Rangers or other troops. I'd like for you to check in with me after the mission is finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个外来人，你相较于游骑兵还有骑警来说还算是站在客观立场上。我想让你在任务结束之后向我汇报一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want the facts as well as your own evaluation. Is he a capable leader? Does he seem mentally stable? Is he following protocol?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望事实尽可能的接近你自己的观点。他是否个有能力的指挥官？他是否有心理疾病？他是否遵循命令？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just talk to me when the dust settles, let me know how he held up. If you can do that, there's a bonus waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在混乱结束后跟我谈谈，让我知道他是个什么样的人。如果你能办到，那么会有一大笔赏金等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA8_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is information, and you get paid. It's as simple as that. Can I count on you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要的是信息，而你获得酬劳。这很简单。我可以指望你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0003CCA8_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09KoestlerInvestigate01
I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. I'll be waiting up in Novac. Speak with me after the operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我会在诺瓦克等着你。在混乱结束后跟我谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004003D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKoestlerRef.evp
I'll think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会考虑的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fine. Just see me up in Novac after the operation. Good luck out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很好。你可以在这次旅途之后来诺瓦克看我。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004003F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKoestlerRef.evp
Forget about it. I'm not a rat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了它吧。我不是个叛徒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You grunts and mercs are all the same. If you change your mind, and you actually want to get paid, just see me up in Novac after all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们雇佣兵都是一个德行。如果你改变了主意，或者只是为了报酬，就在一切结束后来诺瓦克见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00040040_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKoestlerRef.evp
I managed to kill one of the twins, but the other is still at large.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经杀死了双胞胎之一，不过另一个仍逍遥法外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We already got word. Zombies at Echo seen Castor and, {Sarcastic}here's the good part... a company-sized force heading our way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经得到了消息。回音谷的僵尸跑过来了，而{Sarcastic}好消息是... 一支整编部队正在路上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00040323_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stirred em up good, Mailman. We're gonna get some payback.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你成功的搅乱了他们，邮差。我们将给你一些报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00040323_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paying my respects, Courier. Some good men and women died here. Ran lots of ops with Stepinac, the big-nosed bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请接受我的敬意，邮差。一些善良的人死在了这里。他们跟着主 - 那个大鼻子混蛋去了天国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004032A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Choking back tears}But they're dead and gone, ain't no use dwelling on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Choking back tears}但是他们已经死去，别在想这些事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004032A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09BeaumontYouDrunk
What are we going to do next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们下一步怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand our ground, just like true Rangers. We'll make that old bitch Tandi proud!
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续坚持，就像真正的游骑兵那样。我们会让老唐迪骄傲的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00040329_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there is a platoon of regulars on patrol to the south. I reckon they could help. But I don't want no grunts taking the glory from Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，在南边有一个排的士兵。我估计他们需要帮助，但是我的游骑兵没有更多人手去做这件事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00040329_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, you drunk bastard, not all of us have a deathwish. You better have some kind of plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你这该死的酒鬼，不是所有人都想死。你最好有些计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there is a platoon of regulars on patrol to the south. I reckon they could help. But I don't want no grunts taking the glory from Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，在南边有一个排的士兵。我估计他们需要帮助，但是我的游骑兵没有更多人手去做这件事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00040328_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. We don't need any help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我赞同。我们不需要任何帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn right. We're going to butcher those plumed assholes by the bushel. However, we've got a little time until they show up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，好吧的。我们稍作整顿就去屠杀这帮带羽毛的混蛋。不管怎样，在他们出现之前我们还有一点时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to set mines or call in any buddies, this is the time to do it. Make it quick, and then check in with me when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想安置地雷或者呼唤朋友，现在正是时候。赶紧去办吧，然后你准备好了就向我报道吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX setstage aaInheritancePost09 25
aaInheritancePost09BeaumontHelpSpeech
Fuck, you're probably right. I let my ego get in the way of good sense sometimes. It comes with the territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，你也许是对的。我有时候对自己的判断力太自负了。他们来到边境了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll call em up on the radio, see if they can't send us a squad or two.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会通过电台呼叫他们的，看看他们能不能给我们派来一两队人马。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to set mines or call in any buddies, this is the time to do it. Make it quick, and then check in with me when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想安置地雷或者呼唤朋友，现在正是时候。赶紧去办吧，然后你准备好了就向我报道吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX setstage aaInheritancePost09 25 aaCharlieInfantryParentRef.enable
Nobody will question the actions of the Rangers, even if a handful of grunts are around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人会质疑游骑兵的行动，哪怕周围只有少量的士兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What good would a bunch of half-retarded conscripts do? Most of those assholes can't even march in a straight line. No way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你指望老弱残兵能做什么？那帮混蛋甚至不能站成一个笔直的横排。想都别想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More defenders make more sense, right? You shouldn't underestimate NCR Troopers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更多的守卫会创造更多的机会，不是吗？你不应该忘记NCR骑警。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I disagree with the plan, but it's your call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不赞同这个计划，这不过是你的要求。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn right it is. We're going to butcher those plumed assholes by the bushel. However, we've got a little time until they show up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，好吧的。我们稍作整顿就去屠杀这帮带羽毛的混蛋。不管怎样，在他们出现之前我们还有一点时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to set mines or call in any buddies, this is the time to do it. Make it quick, and then check in with me when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想安置地雷或者呼唤朋友，现在正是时候。赶紧去办吧，然后你准备好了就向我报道吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX setstage aaInheritancePost09 25
aaInheritancePost09BeaumontHelpIntelligence
Shit, that smarts. Ok, I'll call them up, see if they'll send us a squad or two. We better batten down the fucking hatches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，这真头疼。好吧，我会召唤他们的，看看他们是否会派一两队人来。我们他妈的最好封住入口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to set mines or call in any buddies, this is the time to do it. Make it quick, and then check in with me when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想安置地雷或者呼唤朋友，现在正是时候。赶紧去办吧，然后你准备好了就向我报道吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004036F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX setstage aaInheritancePost09 25 aaCharlieInfantryParentRef.enable
With only the Rangers, this is a ten-to-one fight. That's not courage, it's suicide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果只有游骑兵，这将会是场十对一的战斗。这不是胆量的问题，这简直是自杀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've made all my preparations for the battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经做好战斗的全部准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good timing. Scouts radioed in, said they're about to be right on top of us. Get ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好机会。发送无线电，告诉他们已经在我们的上方了。准备好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_0004064F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost09 30 aaRangerBeaumontRef.evp
I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like we won.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来是我们赢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, we did, though I'll be damned if they didn't throw everything at us. Did you see Castor charging in with that fist thing? Idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们做到了，尽管我很奇怪他们是否真的投进了全部兵力来对付我们。你看到卡斯特用他的拳头进行攻击了吗？真是蠢货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042CD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the payment I promised. I doubt we could've pulled this off without you, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我承诺的报酬。没有你，我们不会成功的，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042CD9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 4000
I didn't do too much. The Rangers made the real sacrifice here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做的不是太多。游骑兵在这做出了真正的牺牲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt, but you bled here with us. We won't soon forget it. You're a good sort - don't let the Wasteland change you, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用怀疑，你在这里与我们一起浴血奋战。我们不会忘掉的。你是个好人 - 别让废土改变你，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042CDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost09 45 aaRangerBeaumontRef.evp
It's just part of the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是工作的一部分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Job or not, you were a lifesaver. The Rangers won't forget a good turn like this. You take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是不是工作，你就是救星。游骑兵不会忘记这个恩惠。你自己多保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042CDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost09 45 aaRangerBeaumontRef.evp
Let's face it - you all would be dead if I hadn't been here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们面对现实吧 - 如果我不在这里你们都会死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, maybe. You keep your confidence up and your head down, kid. We won't forget what you did for us. Take care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，或许吧。你要摆低一点你的信心和脑袋，孩子。我们不会忘记你为我们所做的。保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042CDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaInheritancePost09 45 aaRangerBeaumontRef.evp
Ranger Beaumont was a model leader. There isn't a thing he could've done better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵博蒙特是个模范的领导。他没有一件事情办的不好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Alright, I'll put it in my report. As for you, here's the bonus we discussed. Thanks for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？好吧，我会将它写进我的报告中。至于你，这是我们协商的奖励。感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042CE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 2 aaKoestlerRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost09 190 set aaInheritancePost09.Report to 1
I'll include your statement in my report. We'll make sure he and the other defenders are posthumously decorated for their actions. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会将你的陈述写进我的报告中。我们会确保他和另一支守军在他们死后因他们的行动而被授勋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042FCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 4500 set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 2 aaKoestlerRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost09 190 set aaInheritancePost09.Report to 1
Ranger Beaumont was a model leader, and he died a hero. There isn't a thing he could've done better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵博蒙特是一个领袖楷模，而他像一个英雄一样死去。他可以做好每一件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beaumont wasn't perfect, but he was a solid commander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博蒙特不够完美，但他是个可靠的指挥官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Alright, I'll put it in my report. As for you, here's the bonus we discussed. Thanks for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？好吧，我会将它写进我的报告中。至于你，这是我们协商的奖励。感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042FCE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 2 aaKoestlerRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost09 190 set aaInheritancePost09.Report to 2
I'll include your statement in my report. We'll make sure he and the other defenders are posthumously decorated for their actions. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会将你的陈述写进我的报告中。我们会确保他和另一支守军在他们死后因他们的行动而被授勋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042FCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 4500 set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 2 aaKoestlerRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost09 190 set aaInheritancePost09.Report to 2
Beaumont wasn't perfect, but he led from the front and went down fighting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博蒙特不够完美，但是他身先士卒并作战到底。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09KoestlerENDProblems
Beaumont's arrogance is only exceeded by his stupidity. He is a danger to everyone in his command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博蒙特的自大比他的愚蠢更甚。他对于他的队伍来说是个危害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So be it. I'll include your candid assessment in my report. Here's the bonus we discussed. Thanks for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样吧。我会将你的公正的评价写入我的报告中。这是我们说好的报酬。感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042FD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 2 aaKoestlerRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost09 190 set aaInheritancePost09.Report to 4
So be it. I'll include your candid assessment in my report. Here's the bonus we discussed. Thanks for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样吧。我会将你的公正的评价写入我的报告中。这是我们说好的报酬。感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042FD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 4500 set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 2 aaKoestlerRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost09 190 set aaInheritancePost09.Report to 4
The NCR lucked out when Beaumont was killed. He was a drunken fool who endangered his troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博蒙特的死对于NCR来说是个好事。他是个愚蠢的酒鬼，葬送了他的部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got nothing to say to you. We are finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有要告诉你的。我们了结了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, have it your way. I'll just have to fill in the blanks on the report myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随你便。我只好交上去一份空白的报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042FCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 2 aaKoestlerRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost09 190 set aaInheritancePost09.Report to 5
Fine, have it your way. I'll just have to fill in the blanks on the report myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随你便。我只好交上去一份空白的报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00042FCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 4000
set aaInheritancePost09.KoestlerGreeted to 2 aaKoestlerRef.evp setstage aaInheritancePost09 190 set aaInheritancePost09.Report to 5
If we're really going up against a company of Legionaries, we'll need more reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们真的要面对一个集团的军团部队，那么我们需要更多的援兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's... no, no way. I'm a Ranger, damn it. We can hold this post. We will hold this post. Besides, nobody would get here in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...不，不可能。我是个游骑兵，该死的。我们能守住这个检查站。我们会守住检查站的。而且，没有人能及时赶到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000449BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reinforcements could be a trump card. Winners play smart, not crazy. Radio them in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 增援部队可以成为一个王牌。胜利者总是机智而不愚笨。无线电通知他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, Legion might drop a full house of fuck on us. You're right. I'll call in the backup. Let's just hope they get here in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，军团他妈的会被我们一网打尽。你是对的。我会呼叫支援。让我们期望他们及时赶来这里吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000449C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost09.Reinforcements to 1
aaInheritancePost09BeaumontBACKUPIntelligence
That might work, but I don't know if they'd get here in time. I'll call up command and see what they can send our way. Don't hold your breath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那也许有效，但是我不知道他们是否准时到达。我将会下达命令并看看他们会给我们带来什么。你不要屏住呼吸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000449C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost09.Reinforcements to 1
You would surprise the attackers with a flanking attack. They would be routed, and you'd be a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的侧翼攻击会使进攻者会感到吃惊。他们将会溃败，而你将成为英雄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, this is our fight. I won't go crying up the chain like those pussy-ass regulars at Forlorn Hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这是我们的战斗。我不想像那些脓包的正规军那样被渺茫的希望束缚住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000449C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR has manpower to spare. Stop being a stubborn ass and radio for help.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR还有多余的人力。别再像个顽固的蠢驴似得，然后用无线电求救吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. This is as good a day to die as any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。这其实跟视死如归没什么两样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. That ain't for us to decide. In the meantime, we stand tall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许。那不是我们能决定的。而在此期间，我们的形象变得高大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000449C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I'm going to get killed defending this shithole just so you can get a posthumous medal? Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以要是我杀死这破地方的守卫而你就将得到一枚追悼勋章？很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is my shithole, and nobody put a gun to your head when you signed the contract. Like they say, don't ask reasons, just die. Something like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的破地方，而且当你在死亡契约上签了字就不会有人拿枪指着你的头。像他们说的，不要问为什么，只是去死吧。就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_000449C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09BeaumontBACKUPQuit
Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rubin's the name. I'm Beaumont's replacement. This is my first assignment as a station commander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的名字叫鲁宾。我作为博蒙特的替补。这是我第一次被指派为指挥官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Beaumont?
ESP.TRADUIT: 博蒙特现在在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The brass was impressed with his leadership during the attack on Charlie, so they promoted him to Captain, put him in charge of training Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些政客对他在检查站的领导能力印象深刻，所以他们给他升了职，派他去训练游骑兵了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it that he's now on the short list of potential successors to Hanlon, as Scull and some of the other old dogs ran afoul of the bosses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小道消息说，他现在在汉伦的接班人候选名单上，就像其他跟上司犯冲的老家伙一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CBA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had just put in his twenty, and after the bloodbath here at Charlie, the brass asked him to retire. Kept his rank and pension, but still...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他刚刚20岁，而在检查站的大屠杀之后，那些政客劝他退休了，尽管他们保留了他的军衔和退休金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking brass... they gave him an admin discharge, stripped him of rank and benefits. Poor bastard got in his dress uniform and blew his brains out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操那帮政客...他们让他退休了，剥夺了他的军衔和薪水。可怜的家伙穿着他的军服鸣枪自杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was posthumously decorated. I even heard a senator showed up at his funeral. Rumor has it they're gonna name a school after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他光荣的死去了。我甚至听说一个议会出现在他葬礼上。据说他们将要以他的名字命名一个学校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did the brass say anything about Beaumont after his death?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些政客在博蒙特死后有说过什么关于他的话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much. He got a military funeral, and his widow got the flag and the death benefits. They're going to be burying more of us soon, I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没说什么，他得到了一个军人葬礼，而他的夫人得到了旗帜和死亡津贴。恐怕我们之中将会有更多人被他们埋葬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did the brass say anything about Beaumont after his death?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些政客在博蒙特死后有说过什么关于他的话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much. He got a military funeral, and his widow got the flag and the death benefits. They're going to be burying more of us soon, I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没说什么，他得到了一个军人葬礼，而他的夫人得到了旗帜和死亡津贴。恐怕我们之中将会有更多人被他们埋葬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did the brass say anything about Beaumont after his death?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些政客在博蒙特死后有说过什么关于他的话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, they stripped him of all his rank and honors, then shit on his record. His poor widow didn't even get the death benefits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他们剥夺了他所有的军衔和荣耀，然后更改了他的记录。他可怜的夫人甚至没有得到死亡津贴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking candy-ass brass sits in Shady Sands, counting beans and judging us... most of those fucks never been near combat. Cocksuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操那些坐在沙地城的胆小高官们，他们数落我们，还评判我们...他们绝大多数都从未接近战斗。这些狗杂种们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CC0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did the brass say anything about Beaumont after his death?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些政客在博蒙特死后有说过什么关于他的话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your background?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Came up out of Junktown. Came from a long line of merchants and traders. My dad had a path laid out for me, gonna have me take over the business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自垃圾镇。跟随者商队长途跋涉。我的父亲曾为我的前程做了安排，他让我接管生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But an honest day's wages never interested me. Drove dad crazy, didn't really have my head in the business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是每天领着薪水不是我的志向所在。我父亲大概疯了，我是真的木有商业头脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CC2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day on a caravan I saw a troop of Rangers ambush some slavers from a distance. I had never seen anything like it. After that my mind was made up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有次我跟着商队看见一群游骑兵在远处伏击奴隶贩子。我从未见过这样的事情。从那之后，我就下定了决心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CC2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I joined when I turned seventeen, did a tour in the infantry, then passed the Ranger screening when I was twenty. It's been a hell of a ride since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我17岁那年我参军了，在步兵队服役，然后在我20岁那年我通过了游骑兵的审核。这是地狱的开始。
