ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CC2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need any help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid not. Funds for contractors have dried up, and the Legion has backed off after that last dustup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不需要了。部队的的资金已经枯竭了，而军团在上次躁动后退避了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Rubin [03044CB1] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09RubinGOODBYE
What's your background?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grew up on a farm near Dayglow, joined up in '59. Spent some time with the grunts before I made Ranger. Then I hunted raiders for a spell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出生在达隆镇附近的农场，我曾加入过59号公路劫匪。在我是一名游骑兵以前我跟他们厮混在一块儿。不过后来我还追捕过袭击者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I marched into Bullhead with Kimball back in '70, and did my last tour picking up the pieces at Zulu. Got here a few months back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟着金博尔回到70号公理，在祖鲁收拾残局是我最后一次行军。我是几个月之前来这的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem to have a lot of hatred for the Legion. Don't you worry about it affecting your decisions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来对军团有很大的仇恨。你不担心这会影响到你的判断吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I'll tell you what it does. It gives me reason to wake up in the morning when I'm out here, hundreds of miles away from my wife and kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。我会告诉你为什么。这是我为什么起早，与我的妻儿相隔千里跑来这里的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear assholes saying hate is always a bad thing. You almost have to hate to kill a man, at least the first time. To win wars, you have to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说混蛋们说仇恨是一件糟糕的事。你总会因为仇恨去杀人，至少一开始会这样。为了赢得胜利，你不得不去杀戮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CD0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Believe me, my mind is sharp and my judgment is sound. But when I put a .44 round through some Centurion's dome, I'm smiling. Hate makes you strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，我的思维是敏锐的，我的判断是合理的。不过当我将一发.44子弹射入那些百夫长的脑袋里的时候，我会很兴奋。仇恨会让你变得强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CD0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the Legion manage to pull off the raid here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团是如何在这里扎营的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you aren't going to blame me right off the bat? I'm so used to the brass crawling up my ass about it, it's made me cagey about the affair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你这是责怪我吗？我的背后站着那些政客，我需要对这件事谨慎处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion thrives on speed and surprise. It's a necessity, since they wear ancient jock straps as armor and fight with sharp sticks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团以高效率和奇袭闻名。这是必然的结果，因为他们穿着破旧的士兵盔甲，使用着棍棒进行战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brass mandates dumbass search and destroy missions in the bush, so I was out on patrol. Charlie was at half-strength when the Legion hit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些政客我们去灌木丛进行搜索破坏，所以我出去巡逻了。检查站在受军团袭击的时候只有一半的兵力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes the patrols are successful, particularly if we catch the Legion in a night ambush. Dumbasses don't use night vision, ya know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 巡逻从某种程度上来说是成功的，特别是如果我们赶上军团的夜袭。只有笨蛋才不用夜视仪，年轻人你明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But generally the Legion out-maneuvers us in the field. Their raiding parties are hard to track, much less catch. Command didn't give a shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过通常军团只在旷地作战。我们很难追踪他们的侦察队，基本上抓不到。司令部简直在放屁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told them we were undermanned, but they just sit back in their comfortable chairs, in their air-conditioned offices, and yell, "Drive on!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他们我们人手不足，但是他们只是坐在舒服的老爷椅上，呆在他们的空调办公室里，并大叫着“马上去办”！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Generals want the kills to pad their stats. Body counts make for nice headlines and help you get promoted. {Sarcasticly enthusiastic}Gotta climb that ladder!
ESP.TRADUIT: 将军们需要杀戮作为他们的基石。杀敌人数能上新闻头条并帮你获得选票。{Sarcasticly enthusiastic}步上青云！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But something I learned long ago... is that a commander's first responsibility is take care of his troops. That was my charge, and I failed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我很久之前就学到了一件事....一个指挥官的首要职责就是关心他的士兵。那是我的责任，我辜负了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't bring them back, but I guaran-damn-tee you I'm going to send some Legionaries straight to hell before I hang it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能把他们带回来，但是我他妈的要告诉你，我会在我挂了之前让那些军团士兵下地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CDF_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you worried at least a little bit that this plan might backfire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道你一点都不担心这个计划会起反效果吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Backfire? As in the Legion sends more than a raiding party? It's doubtful, but if they do, we'll be ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反效果？军团会派出更多突袭小队吗？这值得怀疑，不过如果他们这么做了，我们会有所准备的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zulu? What happened there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 祖鲁？那里发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much until my tour was winding down. I missed the big rodeo back in '79, when the Legion made real try for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我先放松一下。在军团做了那件事的时候，我因回到了79号公路而错过了那场战役。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a sliver of rock overlooking a pass south of Bullhead. Politicians want the base because it protects the silver mines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一条碎石小径，可以俯视牛头城的南部。那些政客想要那个堡垒，因为它起着保护银矿山的作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Problem is they underestimated how bad the Legion would want it. Caesar's southern commander, Marcellus, just about wiped Zulu off the map.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是他们低估了军团想要占领那里的欲望。凯撒的南方指挥官马塞勒斯来到了那里，就是他毁掉了祖鲁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't much left when I got there. We had to rebuild the defenses, replenish the garrison, and even now... I don't know if it's secure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去了那里没多久。我们不得不重建了防御工事，补充兵力，尽管如此...我仍不确实那里是否安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before I left, Legion scouts started showing up, sniping our troops. Rumor has it that Marcellus is gonna attack Zulu again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我离开之前，军团斥候出现过，狙杀了我们的骑警。有传言说，马塞勒斯将要再次攻击祖鲁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's true, I'm sorry for the poor bastards who are going to be there. Marcellus is just... dangerous. God help them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是真的，我同情那些在祖鲁的可怜家伙。马塞勒斯...很危险。愿上帝保佑他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCD_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes Marcellus so dangerous?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马塞勒斯为什么这么危险？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's unpredictable, which separates him from most of Caesar's boys. A lot of them are just thugs who got rank by stomping half-assed tribals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他难以琢磨，这将他与大多数凯撒的手下区分开来。大多数凯撒的手下不过是会跺脚鲁莽土人罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marcellus, though... he doesn't follow a lot of the same rules as other commanders... he only cares about winning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马塞勒斯，可是...他不像其他指挥官那样守规矩...他只在乎如何取胜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuckwit Lanius might be a giant mongoloid badass, but his tactical approach is the same as the others. Fodder, primes, veterans. Rinse, repeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的特使勒留斯也许是个高壮的蒙古混蛋，但他的战术手却段和其他的一样。炮灰，壮丁，老兵。清洗，如此反复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marcellus doesn't do that shit. He actually tries to keep his men alive, and grants them some flexibility. They operate in heavily-armed squads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而马塞勒斯不会那样狗屎。他竟然试图让他的人保持生气，并允许他们一些适当的休闲时间。他们以全副武装的小队为军事单位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll feign attacks, retreat, then hit you in flanks. I seen it happen to a patrol. No survivors. On top of that, he does things that just... well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会佯攻，然后撤退，然后侧翼攻击你。我在一次巡逻中碰见过，没有幸存者。最重要的是，他做的...很出色...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCF_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen some awful shit that will haunt my dreams, but the worst might have been at Zulu, when a group of escaped slaves approached the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些可怕的事情经常在梦里困扰着我，而最坏的一次是发生在祖鲁，当时一些逃跑的奴隶靠近了营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCF_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Men ran down to help them, even as I told them to back off. It was a bunch of kids. Just as they had crowded around them, there was an explosion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们跑来救他们，尽管我叫他们回来。正当他们围住了那些奴隶的时候，一场爆炸发生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCF_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't just a mess. It was sulphur, crying, body parts, and smoke, right outside the base. We picked up the pieces of six kids and eight troopers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不只是一团糟。营地外面到处是火焰，哭泣声，尸块还有烟雾。我们一块一块的拼凑好六个孩子和那八个骑警。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was before his scouts even showed up. It was his way of letting us know that he still had his sights on Zulu. He won't stop until he gets it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之前他的斥候尽管露过面。这是以他的方式让我们知道他在祖鲁仍有耳目。他不会停止除非他攻下祖鲁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044CCF_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm an employee of the NCR. That's all you need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是NCR的一员。这是你所需要知道的全部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Koestler [0303B6B6] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult01DefaultB\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00044FC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I might be addicted to something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我或许对某些东西上瘾了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It happens to the best of us. Let me have a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这常常发生在我们身上。让我们看一看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantAddictio_00045E65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll tough it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我将勇敢接受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna try the "Pain don't hurt" routine? It doesn't work with an addiction. But I'm just a doctor, right? What the fuck would I know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想尝试“痛不会让人受伤”的惯例？这对上瘾不起作用。但是我只不过是个医生，对不对？但他妈的别让我知道？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantAddictio_00045E66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, cure me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，请治疗我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your faith... in medicine... has healed you. Go in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的信念...在药物的作用下...使你康复了。平安的走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantAddictio_00045E69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setav variable01 2 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 50
I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受伤了。医生，我需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't treat Hypochondriasis. You're perfectly fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我不治疗疑难杂症。你状态良好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical_00045E6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This doesn't look too bad. We'll have you patched up in no time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这看起来不太坏。我们一会儿就能治好你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical_00045E6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, that's got to hurt. Okay, hold still, it's gonna get worse before it gets better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，一定很疼吧。忍着点，可能会不好受，但很快就能好过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical_00045E6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't going to say anything, but when you walked in here I thought you were a ghoul. We better get to work on this quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来都不想说话，不过你走进来的时候，我还以为你是尸鬼呢。咱们还是赶紧治疗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical_00045E6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, fix me. Here's 100 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，治愈我。这是100个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay as still as possible. This may cause some... discomfort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽可能的镇定。这可能引起一些...不适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical3_00045E6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetAv Variable01 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 100
I give free treatment to the indigent and needy. You aren't one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我提供免费的治疗给贫困和需要的人。你不是其中之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical3_00045E6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have 100 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我没有100瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, fix me. Here's 75 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，治愈我。这是75个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay as still as possible. This may cause some... discomfort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽可能的镇定。这可能引起一些...不适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical6_00045E70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetAv Variable01 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 75
I give free treatment to the indigent and needy. You aren't one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我提供免费的治疗给贫困和需要的人。你不是其中之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical6_00045E71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have 75 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我没有75瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, fix me. Here's 50 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，治愈我。这是50个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay as still as possible. This may cause some... discomfort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽可能的镇定。这可能引起一些...不适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical9_00045E72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetAv Variable01 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 50
I give free treatment to the indigent and needy. You aren't one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我提供免费的治疗给贫困和需要的人。你不是其中之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedical9_00045E73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have 50 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我没有50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乐意效劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedicalC_00045E74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was something else I needed...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这还有些我需要的……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedicalC_00045E75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, I'll be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重新考虑后，我很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的生命你做主。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantMedicalN_00045E76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you heal my radiation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治疗我的辐射吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely, it's a snap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，这小菜一碟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantRadiatio_00045E77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you say. If you're lucky you might develop super powers, but you'll probably just die a slow, agonizing death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的算。如果你够幸运的话，你可能会产生超能力，不过你最可能会慢慢的死去，痛苦的死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantRadiatio_00045E78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's 100 caps. Do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是100个瓶盖，开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will feel like... well, you don't want to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这感觉像是...好吧，你不会想知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantRadiatio_00045E79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RestoreAV RadiationRads 1000 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 100
I need medical supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要医疗物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来看看我的东西吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantSupplies_00045E7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowBarterMenu 50
I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grant [030373F0] (mod) Quest : ([03045E55]aaGrantDoctor) Grant's Doctor Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult08\aaGrantDoc_aaGrantGOODBYE_00045E68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look awfully familiar...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很面熟...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was wondering if you'd remember me. I used to run with the Fiends till you convinced me to check into rehab. It worked out pretty well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很想知道你是否还记得我，我过去跟随着恶魔帮直到你说服我去做一个康复检查。这很不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [0303AA56] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritanceBU_0004643E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR? Really? I didn't see that coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR？你确定？我没有看见他们来过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I left rehab, the only thing left was to find work in Westside, but they're not eager to have ex-Fiends around, so I enlisted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我解瘾之后，唯一想做的一件事就是在西区找一份工作，但是他们对一个前恶魔帮不太感冒，所以我参军了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [0303AA56] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritanceBU_00046441_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It got me out of that dump, at least. I might die at the Dam, but at least I'll die clean. I can handle that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这至少使我远离了那个垃圾场。我或许会死，但是至少死的体面。我可以处理好这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [0303AA56] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritanceBU_00046441_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never thanked you for what you did. You saved my life, Courier. Nobody gave a damn about me until that point. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未对你所做的表示感谢。你拯救了我的生命，邮差。直到那一刻之前没有人在乎过我。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [0303AA56] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritanceBU_00046441_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [0303AA56] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritanceBU_00046440_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a pussy. I liked you better when you were a junkie. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个狗屎。我更喜欢你作为瘾君子时的样子。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You... I'll tear you a new asshole, motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你...我要撕碎你这个混蛋，操！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bucky [0303AA56] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult06\aaInherita_aaInheritanceBU_0004643F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBuckCleanRef.startcombat player
aaInheritancePost09BARKStart
Rangers! Remember the brothers and sisters who died in this spot! We have bled for this ground, and we will die before the Legion takes it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵们！我想起了那些死在这里的兄弟姐妹！在军团拿下这片土地之前，我们会为它留下鲜血和牺牲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaInheritancePost09.Barked to 1 aaRangerBeaumontRef.sayto player aaInheritancePost09BARKFirstWave 0 1
Caesar will cry when he sees what we have done to his men! They will weep for their mothers and beg for mercy! Kill them all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果凯撒看到我们对他的人所作的事情，他将会哭泣！他们将会向他们的母亲哭泣并祈求原谅！杀光他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09BARKSecondWave
More recruits from the east! Bury those maggots!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从东边过来更多的新兵！埋葬这些蛆虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09BARKFourthWave
Primes incoming! Mow them down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 壮年跟上！割掉他们的头颅！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09BARKSeventhWave
Veterans on the way! Hold your positions, keep fighting!
ESP.TRADUIT: 老兵在路上！守住你的阵地，保持战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritancePost09BARKFinalWave
They breached the north wall! This is it, so dig deep and hold the fucking line!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们攻破了北墙！就是这样，这样深挖战壕并守住那该死的防线！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does this note say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 笔记上说了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My translation is a little rough, but I think it means, "Enemies and Friends, I fuck them all in full." Only the Legion would get excited by that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的翻译有点粗心,而我认为是这样的,"敌人和友军，我操他们全部。"只有军团才会对此感到高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Beaumont [0303B339] (mod) Quest : ([0303B322]aaInheritancePost09) Repaid in Full EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaInherita_aaInheritancePo_00046CEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The trees have a way of putting me at ease... and the cool air is easier on my lungs. It just seems more alive up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些树木让我感到舒适...而凉爽的空气使我的肺更舒坦。这里显得更有生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakWhatDo_00048C91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you a merchant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个商人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a manner of speaking, yeah. People come to me with questions, and I provide answers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从某种意义上说，是的。人们带着问题来找我，而我提供回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakMercha_00048C92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakGOODBY_00048C94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you elaborate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能解释下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I can answer very specific questions... about the future. People place a lot of value in these answers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我能回答非常明确的问题....有关于未来的。人们为了这些答案付出了许多有价值的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakExplai_00048C97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, I can't do it too often because of the strain. I tend to get headaches when I concentrate on finding answers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，由于力竭我不能经常这么做。当我集中精力寻找答案的时候我会感到头痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakExplai_00048C97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like watching history in reverse... not everything comes through clearly. Even so, people always want to know what I see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这像是反向看历史...不是所有的事情都很清晰。虽然这样，但人们总想知道我看到了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakExplai_00048C97_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People pay you for this? Good scam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们为了这个给你报酬？真是好骗局。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Amused by player's assumption}It's not like that. I sell information that they probably can't find anywhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Amused by player's assumption}不是那样的。 我向他们出售很可能他们从其他任何地方都找不到的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakExplai_00048C98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you answer any of my "Questions"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能回答一些我的“问题”吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Anxious}I guess I could. It will cost you 100 caps per question, with no refunds. I can only answer one question per day.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Anxious}我猜我可以。每个问题将会花费你100个瓶盖，不会退款的。我每天只能回答一个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakCanYou_00048C9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard enough of this mumbo-jumbo. Sell your snake oil to someone else, freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听够这些废话。将你骗人的玩意儿卖给其他人吧，怪人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Unperturbed, indifferent}Fine by me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Unperturbed, indifferent}对我来说没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakHeardE_00048C9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fine. <Pay 100 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。<支付100个瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, what's your question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakAnswer_00048C9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 100
I'm sorry, please come back when you've got enough caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，等你有了足够的瓶盖再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakAnswer_00048CA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have 100 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有100个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, I'll be going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仔细考虑了一下，我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Good luck out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakAnswer_00048CA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will I come close to death again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会再次濒临死亡吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The machine saved you, your head, bleeding in the dirt. Yes, it will happen again, but not the same. I see your blood... on snow and ice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人救了你，你的脑袋，在尘埃中流出了鲜血。是的，这再次发生了，但不一样。我看见你的血....在冰雪之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESMa_00048CAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is death around you, and you are powerless, unable to move. You fight, you scream, but your hands... he makes you watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡围绕着你，并且你无力回天，无法行走。你战斗，你尖叫，但是你的手...他让你看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESMa_00048CAB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man in black tortures you... he laughs. He will break you. You will never be the same. I cannot... go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个穿着黑色衣服的人折磨你...他嘲笑着。他要摧残你，你绝不会再像这样了。我不能...继续了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESMa_00048CAB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaOther.QuestionCount to aaOther.QuestionCount + 1
Will I ever be enslaved?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会成为奴隶吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cannot tell. But you are near it, you see them, amidst the rocks, dying in the sun. They rise, and you see it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我知道，你在附近，你在火箭之间看到了他们消失在阳光之下。他们上升了，而你看见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESSl_00048CAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They will fight against their master, the bull. It is wounded, but its vengeance is awful. You see them nailed into the crosses, screaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们要与他们的主人“公牛”战斗。这后果惨重，而报复是可怕的。你看见他们被钉在十字架上惨叫了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESSl_00048CAC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They beg you, and... I cannot see. It, I... I don't know. I'm spent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们祈求你，并且...我不能直视.这..我..我不知道，我说完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESSl_00048CAC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaOther.QuestionCount to aaOther.QuestionCount + 1
Will I deliver any important messages?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会递送任何重要的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Straining}Hold still, and I'll find an answer. Yes, to a distant place, untouched by Bull or Bear, but divided between the brand and the plow.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Straining}不要动，我将会寻找答案。是的，去一个遥远的地方，未被“公牛”和“棕熊”所触及，但是被烙印和犁所分割。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESTh_00048CAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your message will wait, you question your actions, the way of the gun, look for peace. I can't see... it's too much, I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的消息将耽搁，你怀疑你的行动、枪械之道并寻求和平。我不能看了...太多信息了，抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESTh_00048CAD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaOther.QuestionCount to aaOther.QuestionCount + 1
Will I go to war?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会去参战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Straining}War is always murky, deep in blood. Stay still. There is fighting... explosions, death. You are near the great river, you will decide it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Straining}战争总是阴暗的，并深陷于流血之中。那是战火...炸药和死亡。你靠近了那条大河，你将会做出决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESZu_00048CAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, there is another, sooner. There is dust, rocks, screaming. You are surrounded, and they come... they come by the hundreds. The Bull is strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，还有另一个，更早的时候。那是沙子，岩石和尖叫。你被包围了，而他们来了....他们成百上千的来了。“公牛”是强大的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESZu_00048CAE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will fight the Bull... and you will fight each other. The man with one eye, he wants to change the Bull, but must win first. No more!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将会和“公牛”战斗...并且你们相互作战。那个独眼的男人，他想改变“公牛”，但是必须赢得第一，没有更多信息了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESZu_00048CAE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaOther.QuestionCount to aaOther.QuestionCount + 1
Who will be my greatest enemy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁将会是我最大的敌人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see a man with a mask, strange hair, and talking. So much talking. He will not stop talking. But it is not him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见一个带着口罩的男人，奇怪的头发，并在说话。很多的话。他不会停止说话。但是这不是他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESMa_00048CAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is another. It is cold, bitterly cold. All is white, you are numb. There are graves everywhere. He wears black. He laughs at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个景象，这里很冷，刺骨的冷。白茫茫的一片，你失去了知觉。到处都是坟墓。他穿着黑色的衣服，他嘲笑你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESMa_00048CAA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is silent, and laughs before he pulls the gun. That's all I can bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他沉默了，并在拔出枪之前哈哈大笑。这是我能承受的极限了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nowak the Wanderer [0303A28D] (mod) Quest : ([0303A571]aaOther) Other Dialogue and Encounters EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\TheInheritance.esp\MaleAdult05\aaOther_aaOtherNowakQUESMa_00048CAA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaOther.QuestionCount to aaOther.QuestionCount + 1
aaInheritanceOrphanageJamesB
Are you a physician?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个医生吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're not a doctor, what do you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不是医生，那你是干什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaOtherRocksteinGOODBYE
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Esther [03024E33] (mod) Quest : ([03024589]aaInheritancePost06) Think of the Children! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other Dialogue and Encounters
Grant has traveled to the newly-opened Westside Clinic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰特已经前往最近新开张的西区诊所了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cady has traveled to Camp McCarran.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯迪已经前往麦卡伦营地了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What floor would you like to go to?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去几楼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Choose A Floor
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择楼层

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay Here
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lower Brimstone
ESP.TRADUIT: 硫磺火俱乐部。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Main Level
ESP.TRADUIT: 主楼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: 3rd Floor
ESP.TRADUIT: 三楼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suites Level
ESP.TRADUIT: 客房。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've discovered evidence that Esther has been using the Orphanage as a front to acquire and auction child slaves. You should confront her immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经发现了以斯贴使用孤儿院进行收购并贩卖儿童奴隶的证据。你应该马上去见她。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
THIS SUMMER...
From the minds that brought you "The Underground Creature" and "Santa's Dilemma" comes an epic tale of mystery, adventure, and romance. Albert Breach, in association with John Goodman, proudly presents...
CAPTAIN BALLARMS!
Captain Ballarms!
Bradley has left the Mojave Wasteland. You're uncertain if you'll ever encounter him again in your travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布拉德利已经离开了莫哈维废土。你不太确定你是否还会在以后的旅途中碰见他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have agreed to remain a shareholder in Esther's slavery business. This entitles you to regular income available each week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经同意成为以斯贴奴隶事业的股东。这使你每个星期可以有权获得固定的收入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon after entering the basement, you discover evidence that Esther is operating an underground sweatshop and child slavery ring. You should confront her immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入地下室不久之后，你发现了以斯贴运营着一个地下血汗工厂并奴役孩子的证据，你需要马上跟她见面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without Bradley in your company, it would be pointless to meet with Sellers. You should return after re-hiring Bradley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当布拉德利不是你的同伴时，跟塞拉斯见面是毫无意义的。你需要重新招募他再回到这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without Bradley in your company, you cannot access this facility. You should return after re-hiring him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当布拉德利不是你的同伴时，你不能使用这个设备。你需要重新招募他再回到这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bradley has returned to Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布拉德利遇见回到了废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
"Nec amicus officium nec hostis iniuriam mihi intulit, quo in toto non reddidi."
- Ranger Beaumont
ESP.TRADUIT:
"Nec amicus officium nec hostis iniuriam mihi intulit, quo in toto non reddidi."（拉丁语）
-游骑兵博蒙特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zimmer has left the Mojave Wasteland. You're uncertain if you'll ever encounter him again in your travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吉玛遇见离开了莫哈维废土。你不确定在以后的旅途中是否还会见到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a fine reprint of a magnificent pre-war painting. It would be an excellent spot to pin Beaumont's note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一副战前华丽油画的优秀翻版。也是个极佳的地方用来钉住博蒙特的笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pre-War Painting
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前油画

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave It Alone
ESP.TRADUIT: 不去动它

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pin the note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 定住笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ronnie and his band of wastelanders quickly exit the abandoned building for parts unknown. The property is now accessible for the Andersons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗尼和他的流浪者伙伴们很快的离开了废弃的建筑群去了未知的地方。财产现在是安德森的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Esther and Zeke immediately set off to establish the New Vegas Orphanage. It should be open within a few days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以斯贴和齐克立刻动身去新维加斯运营孤儿院。它将会在几天后开张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've gotten word that the New Vegas Orphanage is now open. Travelers merrily report that helpless children are finding succor and sustenance there. Perhaps you should speak with Esther and determine if you can be of further assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说新维加斯的孤儿院开张了。旅行者们很高兴的告诉你，那些无助的孩子们在那里找到了援助和生计。或许你可以跟以斯贴谈谈并决定你是否会进一步援助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no response from the intercom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对讲机中没有任何回应。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon after Bradley crumples to the floor, you hear Zimmer chortling through the intercom, followed by the shutter of the door as the locks turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久之后布拉德利倒在了地板上，你听到吉玛在对讲机中得意的笑，接着门上的百叶窗和门锁都被关上了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Castor's death signals the defeat of the Legion force. However, Ranger Beaumont's untimely death dictates that you must report to Koestler to complete your contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡斯特死亡的讯息击垮了军团部队。然而，你必须向凯斯特勒汇报游骑兵博蒙特的早逝以完成你的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Esther has departed the Mojave Wasteland for parts unknown. It remains uncertain if your paths will ever cross again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 以斯贴离开了莫哈维去了一个没人知道的地方。说不定你们的人生之路会再次交叉...

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fiends quickly abscond, leaving you to free the child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮快速的逃走了，你释放了那些孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legionaries have bound the slave for transportation. The ropes are digging into the his wrists. He's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团士兵束缚住奴隶赶路。绳子深深的陷入了他的手腕里。他显然遭受过他们的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to his fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他自生自灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮他松绑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legionaries have bound the slave for transportation. The ropes are digging into the her wrists. She's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团士兵束缚住奴隶赶路。绳子深深的陷入了她的手腕里。她显然遭受过他们的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to her fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让她自生自灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮她松绑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have elected to leave the Syndicate be, ensuring their increased presence in the Mojave, and also eliminating any prospects for recovering the spoils of the Las Vegas Arsenal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你放任辛迪加发展，确保他们在莫哈维的扩张，并消除任何寻找拉斯维加斯军械库战利品的潜在可能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hastings has died, taking any hopes of finding Zimmer with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海斯廷斯已经死了，从他着手寻找吉玛已经没有任何希望了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: James Anderson has led his family to parts unknown, leaving the property to Ronnie and the squatters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆斯·安德森带着家人去了未知的地方，他将他的财产给了罗尼和流浪汉们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have defeated Zimmer in single combat, thereby gaining access to Sellers' inheritance. The full effects of Zimmer's death are uncertain, but you have stymied the Syndicate's presence in the Mojave - for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在一场战斗中打败了吉玛，因此得到了塞勒斯的遗产。吉玛的死亡造成的全面影响还不太清楚，但是你已经阻碍了辛迪加存在于莫哈维 - 至少是现在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zimmer's death has triggered a powerful explosion in the adjacent vault, burying Sellers' inheritance. The full effects of your actions are uncertain, but you have stymied the Syndicate's presence in the Mojave - for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吉玛的死亡导致了附近的避难所发生了强烈的爆炸并埋葬了塞勒斯的遗产。对于你的行动所造成的全面影响你不是很确定，但是你已经阻碍了辛迪加存在于莫哈维 - 至少是现在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cady has left the Mojave Wasteland for California. It is uncertain if your paths will ever cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯迪已经离开莫哈维废土去了加州。或许你们的人生旅途会再次交叉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awed by your forceful oratory, Hawkins has renounced his profession and fled the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于敬畏你强有力的演讲，霍金斯已经宣布放弃他的事业并逃离莫哈维。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Following your conversation with Esther, you have a strong suspicion that something is awry at the orphanage. Perhaps you should investigate further and determine what is afoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着你会谈了以斯贴，你十分怀疑孤儿院在做一些扭曲的事情。或许你应该进一步调查并确定发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bucky and his accompanying Fiends have left to enter the rehabilation clinic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巴基和伴随他而来的恶魔帮已经离开进入了重建的诊所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the metallic crash of the door registers from behind, you realize the hub will now be inaccessible. It would behoove you to search the shack for information regarding the Syndicate's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过毁坏的金属门后面的登记簿，你了解到仓库现在进不去了。看来你需要在棚屋中搜索关于辛迪加去向的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Esther is dead, and all her secrets have perished with her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以斯贴死了，而她所有的秘密都跟她一起消亡了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Vipers have bound the slave for transportation. The ropes are digging into the her wrists. She's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒蛇帮束缚住奴隶赶路。绳子深深的陷入了她的手腕里。她显然遭受过他们的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to her fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让她自生自灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮她松绑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Vipers have bound the slave for transportation. The ropes are digging into the his wrists. He's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团士兵束缚住奴隶赶路。绳子深深的陷入了他的手腕里。他显然遭受过他们的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to his fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他自生自灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮他松绑。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
THIS SUMMER... Albert Breach, in association with John Goodman, proudly presents a tale of mystery, adventure, and romance... CAPTAIN BALLARMS!
Brace yourself for suspense, action, and drama as our metallic hero lumbers through the wasteland in the pursuit of justice! Lives will be lost, Brahmin will be slain, and Corgis will run amock! You'll laugh! You'll cry! You'll embrace the frigid, steel pincers of a timeless hero! Attend an early screening to recieve free muffins and Goo Goo bars!
DISCLAIMER: Consult your physician before viewing "Captain Ballarms" and consuming Breach Brand Muffins and/or Goo Goo Bars. Side effects may include epilepsy, rabies, nymphomania, autofellatio, diabetes, and anal leakage. Please direct any legal inquiries to Jizz Ferret, Attorney at Law.
Captain Ballarms!

You've heard rumors of an aloof, elderly gentleman in Novac who is offering a considerable sum for a delivery job. Uncertain of his origins or motives, locals only mention the mysterious man in hushed tones.
As an experienced courier long accustomed to making deliveries in hazardous conditions, you would likely be well-suited for the task. Perhaps you should speak with the man in Novac and determine if you stand to profit from the offer.
The Inheritance is recommended for experienced Couriers (Level 20+).
ESP.TRADUIT:
你听说在诺瓦克有一个冷漠的老绅士，他提供了一份报酬相当可观的邮递工作。你不确定他的动机，当地人只说那个神秘的老人很沉默。
作为一个长期在危险情况下工作的老牌信使，你很适合做这份工作。或许你该去诺瓦克跟那个老人谈谈，然后再决定是否接受这份协议。
推荐经验丰富邮差接手“遗产”任务。(等级 20+).

ESP.TRADUIT: 遗产
